chunks.original_text: 日有三十二人，以直芳香之炁，散秽召真，是效职男女本生六甲之炁所化也。 直日香官，如左右官使者状。 各三十二人，　自玉清文移至丑寅卯辰巳文，剔出再归玉文，至几前放。 玄师日：凡诸百灵，非止三十二人，但召奏止以四方天数。 三十二人，是一天有三五功曹各一人，左右官使者各一人，侍香金童传言玉女各一人，五帝直符各一人，直日香官一人。 每一天计一十二人，三十二天统有三百八十四人。 其诸一人，惟功曹是二人，乃三天五帝各一人。 功曹上应一千二百官君，下合三万六千神炁。 一云：皆身中之神，唯直日香官乃三十二天各一官，下来监察而复上奏。 关启所言， 启白所祈之事，心中欲言也。 贵在简当，至诚默奏。 今日吉庆， 三元八节、五腊十直三会之日，名曰良日。 若天赦甲子、庚申，与节会元腊同日，名日吉日。 长斋清堂， 玄师曰：非正月、七月、十月长斋， 不得言长齐，止言今某日吉庆，斋戒清堂。 行修至经， 若知三洞中盟之道，见行事则言修行至经，自非此人即不言。 无量度人。 若谓十方幽冥，乃可言无量度人，常时即言为某事诵经。 臣及甲乙， 某人之理也。 受法箓则称法位，未受法箓则称奉道弟子臣某，今某日吉庆，齐戒清堂，为某事诵经。 若为他人，则言臣某为某人某事诵经，奏述诵经之意旨。 转经受生， 转经者，十转回灵之义。 愿所启上彻，径御无上三十二天元始上帝至尊几前。 放诀。 薛幽栖注：元始上帝即非元始天尊也。 夫上帝高尊亦位齐元始，故得称焉。 是知元始之号，非一尊之称。 发炉毕，次存三十二天之炁如玉霞之辉，灌注顶中。 密咒曰： 贪罗郁罗，无须流陀。 太冲太极，阴阳抱和。 出有入无，鬼神莫测。 出死入生，变化自然。 元始混炁，玄中之玄。 上干有顶，下洞太渊。 诵之一遍，沈痾自痊。 炼魂育魄，真阳自全。 斋戒礼诵，万过飞仙。 无上密咒，万神绵绵。 心中心咒，重复宣传。 贪罗洞盟，与道合真。 玉清上极，梵炁氤氲。 分灵布炁，降注臣身。 形神俱妙，变化飞升。 一如令格，统摄万灵。 急急如元始上帝律令。 引炁三十二过。 《存思口诀》：收三十二天之炁入兆身中，想身如元始，方始转经，摄行元始事也。 依前式，自皇曾天为始，次第依色取炁，以鼻吸引入口而咽之。 东八天 黄绿青赤苍黑碧紫之炁，归肝胆筋脉之间。 其精化生无英公子。 紫衣莲华冠，住於肝中。 南八天 白黄绿青赤苍黑碧色之炁，归心包络血脉之间。 其精化生司命君。 元始状芙蓉冠，住於心中。 西八天 紫白黄绿青赤苍黑色之炁，归肺脏皮肤之间。 其精化生白元尊神。 素衣莲华冠，住於肺中。 北八天 碧紫白黄绿青赤苍色之炁，归肾脏骨节之间。 其精化生桃孩君。 紫衣莲华冠，住於肾中。 玄师曰：灵宝正炁即三十二天正真道炁，若不探纳此炁，内修无功成之基，外施无感应之验。 空尸行上道，下鬼诵灵章，徒尔施为。 并先叩齿九通，自天门入元纲流演图，至宿分步之，存各天本色之炁，布於兆口中，东八天步斗、牛、女、虚、危、室、壁之罡，南八天步角、亢、氐、房、心、尾、箕之罡，西八天步井、鬼、柳、星、张、翼、轸之罡，北八天步奎、娄、胃、昴、毕、紫、参之罡。

On each day, thirty-two attendants are present to direct the fragrant *qi*, dispel impurities, and summon the true. They are the manifestations of the *qi* of the sixty *jiazi* days from the original births of men and women. The Direct-Day Incense Officials resemble the Left and Right Official Envoys in form. Each group consists of thirty-two persons. From the Jade Clarity script, they move to the scripts of *chou*, *yin*, *mao*, *chen*, and *si*, then return to the Jade script, releasing it before the altar.

The Mysterious Master states: Among the myriad spirits, they are not limited to thirty-two persons. However, when summoning and reporting, only the celestial numbers of the four directions are used. The thirty-two persons comprise: for each day, one Celestial Clerk of the Three and Five, one Left Official Envoy, one Right Official Envoy, one Golden Youth of Incense Transmission, one Jade Maiden of Message Conveyance, one Direct Talisman of the Five Thearchs, and one Direct-Day Incense Official. Each day thus accounts for twelve persons, and across thirty-two days, they total three hundred eighty-four. Among them, only the Celestial Clerks are two in number, representing the Three Heavens and Five Thearchs. The Celestial Clerks correspond above to the twelve hundred Official Lords and below to the thirty-six thousand spirits and *qi*. Another tradition holds that all are spirits within the body, except for the Direct-Day Incense Officials, of whom there is one for each of the thirty-two heavens, descending to oversee and ascending to report.

Matters to be communicated or requested—what one wishes to express—should be concise and earnest, silently presented. Today is an auspicious day, one of the Three Origins, Eight Festivals, Five La Days, Ten Direct Days, or Three Assemblies. If it coincides with a Heavenly Amnesty *jiazi* or *gengshen* day, or aligns with a festival, Origin, or La day, it is called a propitious day. In a prolonged fast within a purified hall, the Mysterious Master notes: Unless it is the long fast of the first, seventh, or tenth month, one should not speak of a "long fast," but simply state, "Today, on this auspicious day, I fast and purify the hall."

When engaging in advanced scriptural practice, if one knows the covenant of the Three Caverns, one may speak of "practicing the advanced scriptures"; otherwise, such language is not used. For the deliverance of boundless beings, if referring to the ten directions of the netherworld, one may say "deliverance of boundless beings"; otherwise, one should state, "I recite scriptures for such-and-such a matter."

As for the petitioner, if it is oneself, one refers to one’s own case. Those who have received the register of methods address themselves by their ritual rank; those who have not received it call themselves "devoted Daoist disciple, your servant so-and-so." On this auspicious day, having fasted and purified the hall, I recite scriptures for such-and-such a matter. If acting on behalf of another, one states, "Your servant so-and-so recites scriptures for so-and-so’s such-and-such matter," and presents the purpose of the recitation.

For the turning of scriptures and the reception of life, "turning scriptures" signifies the tenfold circulation of numinous efficacy. May what is hereby presented ascend directly to the august presence of the Most High Primordial Thearch of the Thirty-Two Heavens. Release the mudra.

Xue Youqi’s annotation: The Primordial Thearch is not the same as the Most High Lord of Primordial Beginning. The Thearch, though supremely exalted, holds a rank equal to the Primordial Beginning, hence the title is fitting. Thus, the name "Primordial Beginning" is not exclusive to one honorific.

After kindling the incense burner, next visualize the *qi* of the thirty-two heavens as radiant jade mist, pouring into the crown of the head. The secret incantation reads:

*Tanluo yuluo, wuxu liutuo.
Taichong taiji, yinyang baohe.
Chu you ru wu, guishen moce.
Chu si ru sheng, bianhua ziran.
Yuanshi hunqi, xuanzhong zhi xuan.
Shang gan you ding, xia dong taiyuan.*

Recite once, and deep-seated ailments heal of themselves. Refine the hun and nurture the po, and true yang is preserved whole. Through fasting, ritual, and recitation, ten thousand repetitions lead to transcendence. This most secret incantation binds the myriad spirits. Recite the heart incantation again:

*Tanluo dong meng, yu Dao he zhen.
Yuqing shangji, fanqi yinyun.
Fenling buqi, jiangzhu chenshen.
Xingshen ju miao, bianhua feisheng.
Yiru lingge, tongshe wanling.
Jiji ru Yuanshi Shangdi lüling.*

Draw in the *qi* thirty-two times.

**Visualization and Oral Instructions:**
Gather the *qi* of the thirty-two heavens into one’s body, envisioning oneself as the Primordial Beginning, then begin the scripture recitation to undertake the affairs of the Primordial Beginning. Follow the previous method, starting with the Heaven of August Sovereigns, sequentially drawing in the *qi* by color through inhalation and swallowing.

**Eastern Eight Heavens:**
The *qi* of yellow, green, cyan, red, dark green, black, azure, and purple enters the liver, gallbladder, sinews, and vessels. Its essence transforms into the Venerable Lad of No-Flower, clad in purple and crowned with a lotus, residing within the liver.

**Southern Eight Heavens:**
The *qi* of white, yellow, green, cyan, red, dark green, black, and azure enters the pericardium and blood vessels. Its essence transforms into the Lord of Life’s Destiny, crowned in the manner of the Primordial Beginning, residing within the heart.

**Western Eight Heavens:**
The *qi* of purple, white, yellow, green, cyan, red, and dark green enters the lungs and skin. Its essence transforms into the White Prime Honored Spirit, clad in white and crowned with a lotus, residing within the lungs.

**Northern Eight Heavens:**
The *qi* of azure, purple, white, yellow, green, cyan, and red enters the kidneys and bones. Its essence transforms into the Peach Lad, clad in purple and crowned with a lotus, residing within the kidneys.

The Mysterious Master states: The true *qi* of the Numinous Treasure is the orthodox Dao *qi* of the thirty-two heavens. Without absorbing this *qi*, internal cultivation lacks a foundation for accomplishment, and external practice yields no responsive verification. Those who merely perform rituals as empty corpses or recite scriptures as ghosts below labor in vain.

First, knock the teeth nine times. From the Gate of Heaven, enter the Primordial Net’s flowing evolution diagram, proceeding to the lodging station. Visualize the *qi* of each heaven’s original color, filling the mouth. For the Eastern Eight Heavens, pace the stars of Dipper, Ox, Girl, Void, Rooftop, House, and Wall. For the Southern Eight Heavens, pace the stars of Horn, Neck, Root, Chamber, Heart, Tail, and Winnowing Basket. For the Western Eight Heavens, pace the stars of Well, Ghost, Willow, Star, Spread, Wings, and Chariot. For the Northern Eight Heavens, pace the stars of Straddler, Harvester, Stomach, Pleiades, Net, Purple, and Three Stars.

chunks.original_text: 太上三五都功职箓弟子陈椿荣集注 元始无量度人上品妙经 皇人日：此乃道君标目。 前题太上洞玄灵宝者，玉晨道君序经，故以道言标首。 此题直云元始元量度人者，是天尊自说，以元始为题。 又自然已前，亦是道君小序，混洞已后，方是天尊本章。 洞玄章 元始洞玄灵宝本章， 此是皇人标题内名也。 上品妙首， 玄师曰：元者，万道之祖； 始者，众炁之宗； 洞者，神应灵感； 玄者，变景莫测； 灵者，有求必化； 宝者，仙真圣根。 此之六字，以为万道之祖，众炁之宗，归於大洞之中，则为上品妙首也。 十回度人， 此天尊十遍，说经十转，回灵之法也。 百魔隐韵，离合自然。 此四句，皇人总明一经宗旨大意，二十四字乃洞玄本章之首。 玄师曰：其章中之旨，乃百魔隐韵，或离或合，皆在自然。 百魔者，九霄大魔帝君之王，与上帝元始同化玉清元炁，皇冑之胤嗣也。 神霄玉清王、紫霄玉清消魔王、丹景中极保景王、青霄玉清洞明照王、玉霄妙化王，次太霄、碧霄、景霄、琅霄玉清王，亦大魔之帝也。 次九天大魔、三天大魔、三界大魔、三清大魔、五帝大魔、诸天大魔、梵天灵君之魔。 次三省天相太玄之魔，比魔、非魔、灵魔、制魔、神魔等至六天大魔隐韵，皆典二章之中，以洞妙百魔之音，离合而成章。 赤文章 太极妙化神灵混洞赤文章 元始开运，太玄肇灵。 虚极无象，一炁流形。 化生二景，五纬凝精。 混合自然，怛除结婴。 总真布景，焕赫九清。 炎池廓奕，七纪齐并。 祈师卢浩，丹天耀晶。 朱光炼度，赤霭散明。 三华郁秀，辉映帝晨。 太极妙化神灵混洞赤文章者，摄化九阳而明天度，以成九霄九天之境。 是以神霄玉清虚皇天，泛上灵景华九阳清真虚梵之炁，而成天境。 丹霄南极玉文天，泛丹灵妙华洞阳景真元梵之炁，而成天境。 碧霄太虚真极天，泛广灵太华上阳元真灵一之炁，而成天境。 玉霄玉灵素华天，泛玉灵素华纯阳至真元一之炁，而成天境。 太霄太灵真元天，泛太灵洞华三阳九真太一之炁，而成天境。 琅霄素灵皓元天，泛素灵皓华六阳洞真至一之炁，而成天境。 紫霄元灵上极天，泛元灵紫华清阳妙真天一之炁，而成天境。 景霄妙灵宝华天，泛妙灵宝华景阳精真虚一之炁，而成天境。 青霄玉华无极天，泛青灵玉华元阳天真纯一之炁，而成天境。 此九霄九天，皆混洞赤文之所化梵天天境者也。 混洞赤文，　双手拾玉清文。 无无上真。 混者，混沌之名； 洞者，洞阳之炁。 五字生於大梵之先，至赤明劫，元始运洞阳之火，冶炼而成。 赤文，言玉字赤文，齐混沌之初，在天地之先，凝化空洞之上，郁结太元之中。 太元之元，亦元其元，既元其元，故曰 无无上真也。 元始祖劫，化生诸天。 祖，始也。 玄元始熙於始初之劫，欻然化生五亿诸天。 始劫者，世界初生未经成败也。 《内象丹旨》曰：元始者，乃先天虚无自然祖炁。 在人，谓之自己曩劫不坏元神。 开明三景，是为天根。 二仪分形，三光垂耀，皆禀始炁，故为天根。 《内象丹旨经》曰：道生一、一生二、二生三，三生万物。 故《虚无自然本起经》曰：夫道得三乃成。 故言三合成德，自不满三，诸事不成。 《击辞》曰：《易》有太极，是生两仪。

**The Supreme Scripture of the Primordial Beginning’s Unbounded Deliverance of Humanity, Upper Grade: Annotated by Disciple Chen Chunrong of the Register of the Three-Five Capital Meritorious Offices**

The August Person says: This is the title designated by the Lord of the Dao.

The preceding title, *"The Supreme Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure,"* is the preface to the scripture composed by the Lord of the Dao of Jade Dawn, hence beginning with *"Dao"* as its marker. This title, *"The Primordial Beginning’s Unbounded Deliverance of Humanity,"* is spoken by the Heavenly Worthy Himself, taking *"Primordial Beginning"* as its heading. All before *"Naturally"* is the Lord of the Dao’s brief preface, while from *"Chaotic Abyss"* onward is the Heavenly Worthy’s original chapter.

**The Cavernous Mystery Chapter**
*"The Primordial Beginning’s Cavernous Mystery, Numinous Treasure: Original Chapter"*—this is the title designated by the August Person within the heading.

**The Wondrous Beginning of the Upper Grade**
The Mystic Master says: *"Primordial"* is the ancestor of the myriad Dao; *"Beginning"* is the origin of the host of qi; *"Cavernous"* is the numinous response of divine resonance; *"Mystery"* is the unfathomable transformation of luminous scenes; *"Numinous"* is the certain fulfillment of all prayers; *"Treasure"* is the sacred root of immortals and perfected beings. These six characters, as the ancestor of the myriad Dao and the origin of the host of qi, converge within the Great Cavern to become the wondrous beginning of the upper grade.

**Ten Revolutions to Deliver Humanity**
This is the Heavenly Worthy’s method of reciting the scripture ten times, revolving the numinous through ten transformations.

**The Hidden Rhymes of the Hundred Demons, Separating and Merging Naturally**
These four lines, as stated by the August Person, summarize the essential purport of the entire scripture. The twenty-four characters form the opening of the Cavernous Mystery’s original chapter.

The Mystic Master says: The purport of this chapter lies in the hidden rhymes of the hundred demons, which separate and merge naturally. The *"hundred demons"* refer to the kings of the Great Demon Lords of the Nine Empyreans, who, together with the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning, transform into the primordial qi of Jade Purity, the imperial descendants of the August Lineage. They are:
- The Jade Purity King of Divine Empyrean,
- The Jade Purity King of Purple Empyrean, Vanquisher of Demons,
- The Preserver of Scenery, King of the Crimson Horizon’s Central Pole,
- The Jade Purity King of Azure Empyrean, Illuminator of Cavernous Clarity,
- The Wondrous Transformer, King of Jade Empyrean,
followed by the Jade Purity Kings of Grand Empyrean, Azure Empyrean, Scenic Empyrean, and Resonant Empyrean—all emperors of the great demons.
Next are the Great Demons of the Nine Heavens, the Three Heavens, the Three Realms, the Three Clarities, the Five Thearchs, the various heavens, and the demons of the Brahmā Heaven’s Numinous Lords. Then come the demons of the Three Ministries of Heavenly Assistants and the Great Mystery, along with the demons of comparison, negation, numinosity, restraint, and divinity—culminating in the hidden rhymes of the Great Demons of the Six Heavens. All are recorded within the second chapter, composing verses through the separation and merging of the wondrous sounds of the hundred demons.

**The Crimson Writings**
*The Crimson Writings of the Numinous Chaos of the Wondrous Transformation of the Supreme Ultimate*

The Primordial Beginning inaugurates the kalpa,
The Supreme Mystery initiates the numinous.
Vacuous and boundless, without form,
A single qi flows into shape.
Transforming to give birth to the two luminaries,
The five wefts congeal into essence.
Naturally merging and harmonizing,
The fetters of the embryo are forever dissolved.
The assembly of perfected beings deploys its radiance,
Resplendent throughout the Nine Clarities.
The Flaming Pool expands in brilliance,
The seven epochs align in unison.
Pray to Master Lu Hao,
As the Cinnabar Heaven gleams crystalline.
Crimson light refines and delivers,
Vermilion mists scatter their clarity.
The three flowers flourish in splendor,
Illuminating the dawn of the Thearch.

*"The Crimson Writings of the Numinous Chaos of the Wondrous Transformation of the Supreme Ultimate"*—this encompasses the transformation of the nine yangs to illuminate the celestial deliverance, forming the realms of the Nine Empyreans and Nine Heavens. Thus:
- The Divine Empyrean of Jade Purity, Heaven of the Vacuous August, arises from the qi of the nine yangs of the numinous, radiant, and pure void of Brahmā.
- The Heaven of the Jade Script of the Southern Culmen of Cinnabar Empyrean arises from the qi of the cinnabar numen, wondrous radiance, and cavernous yang of the true primordial Brahmā.
- The Heaven of the True Culmen of the Great Void of Azure Empyrean arises from the qi of the vast numen, great radiance, and primordial true unity of the upper yang.
- The Heaven of the Pure Radiance of Jade of Jade Empyrean arises from the qi of the jade numen, pure radiance, and perfect yang of the true primordial unity.
- The Heaven of the True Primordiality of the Grand Empyrean arises from the qi of the grand numen, cavernous radiance, three yangs, nine perfected beings, and Grand Unity.
- The Heaven of the Luminous Primordiality of Resonant Empyrean arises from the qi of the pure numen, luminous radiance, six yangs, and cavernous true unity.
- The Heaven of the Upper Culmen of Primordial Numinosity of Purple Empyrean arises from the qi of the primordial numen, purple radiance, pure yang, and wondrous true unity of Heaven.
- The Heaven of the Wondrous Numinosity of Scenic Radiance of Scenic Empyrean arises from the qi of the wondrous numen, radiant radiance, and true void of the yang essence.
- The Heaven of the Jade Radiance of the Boundless of Azure Empyrean arises from the qi of the azure numen, jade radiance, and primordial true unity of the yang of Heaven.

These Nine Empyreans and Nine Heavens are all celestial realms transformed from the Crimson Writings of the Chaotic Abyss.

**The Crimson Writings of the Chaotic Abyss**—both hands gather the Jade Purity script.
The True One Beyond the Utterly Non-Existent.

*"Chaos"* is the name of the primordial undifferentiation; *"Abyss"* is the qi of the cavernous yang. These five characters originated before the Great Brahmā. By the Crimson Clarity kalpa, the Primordial Beginning employed the fire of the cavernous yang to refine and forge them. *"Crimson Writings"* refers to the crimson script of the jade characters, which, at the dawn of primordial chaos and before the existence of heaven and earth, congealed above the empty void and coagulated within the Supreme Primordiality. The *"primordial"* of the Supreme Primordiality is also the primordial of the primordial; having primally originated the primordial, it is thus called *"the True One Beyond the Utterly Non-Existent."*

**The Primordial Beginning’s Ancestral Kalpa, Giving Birth to the Myriad Heavens**
*"Ancestral"* means *"beginning."* The Mysterious Primordial flourished in the initial kalpa, suddenly giving birth to the five hundred million heavens. The *"initial kalpa"* refers to the world’s inception before any formation or dissolution.

The *Inner Image of the Cinnabar Purport* states: *"Primordial Beginning"* is the primordial qi of the precelestial void and spontaneity. In humans, it is called the indestructible primordial spirit of one’s former kalpas. The revelation of the three luminaries is the root of heaven. The division of the Two Modes and the illumination of the Three Radiances all receive the qi of the beginning, hence it is the root of heaven.

The *Inner Image of the Cinnabar Purport Scripture* says: The Dao gives birth to the One, the One gives birth to the Two, the Two gives birth to the Three, and the Three gives birth to the myriad things. Thus, the *Scripture of the Spontaneous Arising of the Vacuous and Natural* states: The Dao achieves completion through the Three. Therefore, it is said that the Three unite to form virtue; without the full Three, no affair can be accomplished.

The *Striking Rhymes* says: The *Book of Changes* has the Supreme Ultimate, which gives birth to the Two Modes.

chunks.original_text: 盖由一熙而分清浊，是为三也。 《九天生神章经》云：三炁合生九炁，三炁为天地之尊，九炁为万物之根。 三因成九，为万物之根，是为三生万物。 三合成德，在道为三炁，在物为三才，在天为三光，在人为三元。 皆元始之祖炁，作万物之本根。 故开明三景，是为天根。 以内而言，假设法象则曰铅汞砂也。 直指其物，则是本有之性、与夫日用妙化、阴阳之二炁也。 人虽知此本有之性则明妙，而莫知本有之性继种於坤宫两肾之间，即先天虚无自然纯精真一之炁，阴阳妙化，自此发生。 详见於《丹旨》混洞赤文元始祖劫注。 夫天地之间，万物先有本而后有根。 若果之有核，是其本也； 种之於土，阴阳激薄，则坼萌芽而生根，故能长茂华实，生生不穷。 苦无根株而欲其本之久存者，未之有也。 故天尊先指祖炁而为道之本，次明三景而为道之根。 大法灵宝有开明三景之道，兆於日初出时，平心向太阳祝《郁仪咒》曰：日魂朱景照韬绿英回霞赤童玄炎飙象。 引日紫炁，八十一咽。 月初出时，向太阴祝《结璘咒》曰：月魄爱萧芳艳翳寥婉虚灵兰郁华结翘淳金清莹炅容台标。 引月黄色炁一百二十咽。 夜戌末时，仰视北斗，祝北斗内讳□、□、□、□、□、□、□，吸七星金光，四十九咽。 服此三景真炁，还精复胎。 三年功满，受书为三景真人。 又有内朝三景飞仙分形之道，辰、戌、丑、未四时，朝中元心中司命神，字玄坚，中极太一君也，主养兆一身之形质，下在脾中。 脾为玉堂，一名玉房。 叩齿五通，存脾中黄炁，有一真人，如初生小儿，黄衣冠。 祝曰：中极玄坚，太一真君。 甲欲得真人神仙黄庭之道，寅、卯、午、申四时，期上元太一神君，号南极老人，主兆魂魄胞神，命炁胎府之父也。 叩齿九通，存头上直入一寸，名太极宫，又名太一宫，赤、黄炁满宫，有一真人如童子状，绛衣，祝曰：南极元老，太一真君。 甲欲得神丹长生不死之道，子、酉、巳、亥四时，朝下元北极玄道母，字玄妙，下在双合宫中。 肾为双合宫，主兆精炁生死，符籍之母也。 叩齿四通，存臀中有白炁，炁中有神龟，龟上有玄女，即灵妃坐龟也。 青白衣，如初生小女子，右有司录君，左有司命君。 祝曰：下元元神北极玄道母，字玄妙，甲欲得金体玉泉可饮食者，乞敕司命司录削甲死籍，更注长生。 日久行之，常念勿忘。 乃洞玄三皇帝君所行，实灵宝之密机，亦盟天告师而行矣。 上无复祖，唯道为身。 禀元如妙炁之自然，而化成人道之法身。 夫道以虚无为宗，以自然为本，以道为身，无复先祖也。 五文开廓， 皇人曰：五文者，五方五老赤书玉字内音也。 普殖神灵。 无文不光，无文不明，无文不立，无文不成，无文不度，无文不生。 玉清文放诀。 五篇真文开廓形状，普生天地，安置神灵。 无真文则日月不得光，星辰不得明，乾坤不得立，世界不得成，幽魂不得度，枯骨不得生。 大梵章 是为大梵，天中之天。 《龙蹻经》曰：三清天者，四梵天以上，太极官所治； 太清十二天，九仙所居，九老所都，金阙后圣所治； 次上清十二天，九真所居，玉晨道君所治； 次无上大罗玉清十二天，九圣所居，元始天尊所治。 是天中之天，三十六天也。

Indeed, from the One Radiance the clear and turbid divide—this is the Three. The *Scripture of the Nine Heavens’ Chapters on Generating the Divine* states: The Three Qi conjoin to generate the Nine Qi; the Three Qi are the honor of heaven and earth, while the Nine Qi are the root of the myriad things. The Three, through multiplication, become Nine, the root of the myriad things—thus it is said that the Three give birth to the myriad things. The Three unite to form virtue: in the Dao, they are the Three Qi; in things, they are the Three Powers; in heaven, they are the Three Luminaries; in man, they are the Three Origins. All are the primordial ancestral qi of the Originating Beginning, the fundamental root of the myriad things. Hence, the revelation of the Three Luminaries is the root of heaven.

Speaking inwardly, if one borrows the metaphor of alchemical imagery, they are called lead, mercury, and cinnabar. Pointing directly to the thing itself, they are the inherent nature, the wondrous transformations of daily use, and the dual qi of yin and yang. Though one may know this inherent nature to be luminous and wondrous, one does not know that this inherent nature continues its seed in the Kun Palace between the two kidneys—this is the primordial, vacuous, and spontaneous pure essence of the True One, from which the wondrous transformations of yin and yang arise. This is detailed in the *Red Writ of the Primal Kalpa of the Chaotic Epoch* in the *Purport of the Cinnabar Scripture*.

Within heaven and earth, all things first possess a root and only afterward a stem. As with fruit that has a pit—this is its root; when the pit is sown in soil, yin and yang interact and press upon it, causing it to split and sprout, thus generating roots. Only then can it grow luxuriantly, flourish, and bear fruit, perpetuating life without end. If there were no rootstock and one desired the root to endure, such a thing has never existed. Therefore, the Heavenly Worthy first pointed to the ancestral qi as the root of the Dao, then clarified the Three Luminaries as the stem of the Dao.

The Great Rites of the Numinous Treasure possess the Dao of the Revelation of the Three Luminaries. At the time of sunrise, with a calm heart, face the sun and recite the *Incantation of Yu Yi*:

*"Sun-soul, Vermilion Radiance, Illuminating the Green Bloom, Returning Rosy Clouds, Crimson Youth, Mysterious Blazing Whirlwind-Image."*

Draw in the sun’s purple qi, swallowing eighty-one times. At the time of moonrise, face the moon and recite the *Incantation of Jie Lin*:

*"Moon-spirit, Luminous Mist, Fragrant Splendor, Veiled Loneliness, Graceful Emptiness, Orchid’s Profound Bloom, Jade Petals, Pure Gold, Limpid Radiance, Resplendent Countenance, Towering Standard."*

Draw in the moon’s yellow qi, swallowing one hundred twenty times. At the end of the *xu* hour of the night, gaze upward at the Northern Dipper and recite the inner names of the Northern Dipper: □, □, □, □, □, □, □. Inhale the golden light of the Seven Stars, swallowing forty-nine times. By ingesting this true qi of the Three Luminaries, one returns essence and restores the embryo. After three years of practice, one receives the scripture and is named a True Person of the Three Luminaries.

There is also the Dao of the Inner Audience of the Three Luminaries and the Flying Immortal’s Division of Form. During the *chen*, *xu*, *chou*, and *wei* hours, one pays audience to the Controller of Destiny in the Central Origin within the heart, whose name is *Xuan Jian*, the Supreme Unity Lord of the Central Ultimate. He governs the nourishment of one’s entire bodily form and resides below in the spleen. The spleen is the Jade Hall, also called the Jade Chamber. One clicks the teeth five times, visualizing the yellow qi in the spleen, within which there is a true person, like a newborn infant, clad in yellow robes and cap. One recites:

*"Central Ultimate, Xuan Jian, Supreme Unity True Lord. I, so-and-so, desire the Dao of the True Person, the Divine Immortal, and the Yellow Court."*

During the *yin*, *mao*, *wu*, and *shen* hours, one pays audience to the Supreme Unity Divine Lord of the Upper Origin, known as the Venerable Elder of the Southern Ultimate. He governs one’s hun-soul, po-soul, womb spirit, life qi, and the father of the embryo palace. One clicks the teeth nine times, visualizing one inch directly above the head—the Palace of the Supreme Ultimate, also called the Palace of the Supreme Unity—filled with red and yellow qi, within which there is a true person like a child, clad in crimson robes. One recites:

*"Venerable Elder of the Southern Ultimate, Supreme Unity True Lord. I, so-and-so, desire the Dao of the divine elixir and eternal life."*

During the *zi*, *you*, *si*, and *hai* hours, one pays audience to the Mysterious Dao Mother of the Northern Ultimate of the Lower Origin, whose name is *Xuan Miao*. She resides below in the Double Union Palace. The kidneys are the Double Union Palace, governing the life and death of one’s essence and qi, and the mother of the talismanic register. One clicks the teeth four times, visualizing white qi in the buttocks, within which there is a divine turtle. Upon the turtle sits a Mysterious Woman, the Numinous Consort, seated upon the turtle. She wears blue and white robes, like a newborn girl. To her right is the Controller of Records, and to her left is the Controller of Destiny. One recites:

*"Mysterious Dao Mother of the Northern Ultimate of the Lower Origin, named Xuan Miao. I, so-and-so, desire to attain a golden body and jade spring for sustenance. I beseech you to command the Controllers of Destiny and Records to erase my name from the register of death and inscribe it anew for eternal life."*

With prolonged practice and unwavering mindfulness, this becomes the practice of the Three August Emperor Lords of the Cavernous Mystery. It is indeed the esoteric mechanism of the Numinous Treasure, undertaken only after forming a covenant with heaven and informing one’s master.

Above, there is no further ancestor—only the Dao is one’s body. One receives the primordial and wondrous qi of spontaneity, thereby transforming into the dharmakāya of human Dao. The Dao takes vacuity and non-being as its essence, spontaneity as its root, and the Dao as its body—there is no further ancestor.

The Five Scripts unfold and expand. The August Person says: The Five Scripts are the inner sounds of the vermilion characters of the Five Elders of the Five Directions. They universally propagate the divine spirits. Without script, there is no illumination; without script, there is no clarity; without script, there is no establishment; without script, there is no completion; without script, there is no deliverance; without script, there is no generation. This is the *Jade Clarity Scripture’s Method of Releasing the Scripts*. The Five Chapters of True Script unfold their forms, universally generating heaven and earth and establishing the divine spirits. Without true script, the sun and moon would not shine, the stars would not gleam, the cosmos would not stand, the world would not be completed, the hidden souls would not be delivered, and the withered bones would not live.

The *Great Brahmā Chapter* is the Great Brahmā, the heaven within heaven. The *Scripture of the Dragon’s Ascent* says: The Three Clarities Heaven comprises the Four Brahmā Heavens and above, governed by the Palace of the Supreme Ultimate. The Twelve Heavens of the Grand Clarity are the abode of the Nine Immortals and the capital of the Nine Elders, governed by the Golden Gates and the Later Sage. Next are the Twelve Heavens of the Highest Clarity, the abode of the Nine Perfected, governed by the Jade Dawn Dao Lord. Above them are the Twelve Heavens of the Great Ultimate and Jade Clarity, the abode of the Nine Sages, governed by the Originating Beginning Heavenly Worthy. This is the heaven within heaven—the Thirty-Six Heavens.

chunks.original_text: 郁罗萧台， 萧台是七宝玄台，有九层映郁大罗之上。 玉山上京。 太玄都玉山上京，祖师元始天尊治玄都玉京。 上极无上，大罗玉清， 大罗玉清京，玉清祖师元始天尊宴三景而为道之根。 大法灵宝有开明三景之道，兆於日初出时，平心向太阳祝《郁仪咒》曰：日魂朱景照韬绿英回霞赤童玄炎飙象。 引日紫炁，八十一咽。 月初出时，向太阴祝《结璘咒》曰：月魄爱萧芳艳翳寥婉虚灵兰郁华结翘淳金清莹炅容台标。 引月黄色炁一百二十咽。 夜戌末时，仰视北斗，祝北斗内讳□、□□、□、□、□、□，吸七星金光，四十九咽。 服此三景真炁，还精复胎。 三年功满，受书为三景真人。 又有内朝三景飞仙分形之道，辰、戌、丑、未四时，朝中元心中司命神，字玄坚，中极太一君也，主养兆一身之形质，下在脾中。 脾为玉堂，一名玉房。 叩齿五通，存脾中黄炁，有一真人，如初生小儿，黄衣冠。 祝曰：中极玄坚，太一真君。 甲欲得真人神仙黄庭之道，寅、卯、午、申四时，期上元太一神君，号南极老人，主兆魂魄胞神，命炁胎府之父也。 叩齿九通，存头上直入一寸，名太极宫，又名太一宫，赤、黄炁满宫，有一真人如童子状，绛衣，祝曰：南极元老，太一真君。 甲欲得神丹长生不死之道，子、酉、巳、亥四时，朝下元北极玄道母，字玄妙，下在双合宫中。 肾为双合宫，主兆精炁生死，符籍之母也。 叩齿四通，存臀中有白炁，炁中有神龟，龟上有玄女，即灵妃坐龟也。 青白衣，如初生小女子，右有司录君，左有司命君。 祝曰：下元元神北极玄道母，字玄妙，甲欲得金体玉泉可饮食者，乞敕司命司录削甲死籍，更注长生。 日久行之，常念勿忘。 乃洞玄三皇帝君所行，实灵宝之密机，亦盟天告师而行矣。 上无复祖，唯道为身。 禀元如妙炁之自然，而化成人道之法身。 夫道以虚无为宗，以自然为本，以道为身，无复先祖也。 五文开廓， 皇人曰：五文者，五方五老赤书玉字内音也。 普殖神灵。 无文不光，无文不明，无文不立，无文不成，无文不度，无文不生。 玉清文放诀。 五篇真文开廓形状，普生天地，安置神灵。 无真文则日月不得光，星辰不得明，乾坤不得立，世界不得成，幽魂不得度，枯骨不得生。 大梵章 是为大梵，天中之天。 《龙蹻经》曰：三清天者，四梵天以上，太极官所治； 太清十二天，九仙所居，九老所都，金阙后圣所治； 次上清十二天，九真所居，玉晨道君所治； 次无上大罗玉清十二天，九圣所居，元始天尊所治。 是天中之天，三十六天也。 郁罗萧台， 萧台是七宝玄台，有九层映郁大罗之上。 玉山上京。 太玄都玉山上京，祖师元始天尊治玄都玉京。 上极无上，大罗玉清， 大罗玉清京，玉清祖师元始天尊宴居无上大罗之天，圣师玉皇上帝治太微玉清宫，总治种民天。 眇眇劫仞，若亡若存，三华离便， 诸天之上有三华堂离便宫。 三华者，玉清三元宫也。 上元玉华，中元金华，下元九华，皆三元上皇道君居之。 离便者，玉清之境离宫便殿也。 大有妙庭， 上清妙庭宫，宗师玉晨道君安处无色世界上清大有之天。 金阙玉房， 宗师玉晨道君，治金阙寥阳宫，真师太上老君，治太清宫。 玉房者，上清玉房宫。

Draw in the sun’s purple qi with eighty-one inhalations. Draw in the moon’s yellow qi with one hundred twenty inhalations. At the end of the hour of Xu at night, gaze upon the Northern Dipper, recite the Dipper’s inner names □, □□, □, □, □, □, and absorb the golden light of the Seven Stars with forty-nine inhalations. By ingesting these Three Radiant True Qi, one returns essence and restores the embryo. There is also the Dao of the Inner Audience’s Three Radiant Flying Immortals, who divide their forms. chunks.original_text: 森罗净霐。 森罗上馆，净霐二沼，乃玉清殿下两池也。 玄师曰：以内言之，泥丸九宫也。 此正是内朝元始之道也。 御注：此九宫乃玉京雌雄九宫之名。 比人泥丸中太华、中华、少华三华，属木，有玉清坤母居之。 离便属火，有上清玉妃居之。 大有属土，有黄素紫灵元君居之，妙庭属水，有太玄神女居之。 此四宫为雌宫，在玉京之北。 金阙宫有太素元老居之。 玉房宫有华阳帝君居之。 森罗宫有流珠真人居之，净妙宫有太一元王居之，太灵宫有上元赤子居之。 此五宫为雄官，在玉京之南。 已上九宫在玉京山之上，列布区象，如人之脑也。 以身推之，元不相契。 但人窒昧而不知矣。

The Luminous Array and Pure Abyss.
The Luminous Array’s Upper Mansion and the Pure Abyss’s Two Pools are the two ponds beneath the Jade Clarity’s Hall. The Mysterious Master states: speaking inwardly, these are the Nine Palaces of the Mud-Pill. This is precisely the Dao of the Primordial Beginning’s inner court. The Imperial Commentary says: these Nine Palaces are the names of the Jade Capital’s feminine and masculine Nine Palaces. In human terms, within the Mud-Pill’s Great Hua, Central Hua, and Lesser Hua Three Flowers—belonging to Wood—dwells the Jade Clarity’s Earth Mother. The Departure and Convening, belonging to Fire, is inhabited by the Highest Clarity’s Jade Consort. The Wondrous Court of the Great Existence, belonging to Earth, is inhabited by the Yellow Plain’s Purple Spirit Primordial Lord. The Wondrous Court, belonging to Water, is inhabited by the Grand Mystery’s Divine Woman. These four palaces are the feminine palaces, located in the north of the Jade Capital.

The Golden Gates Palace is inhabited by the Grand Plain’s Primordial Elder. The Jade Chambers Palace is inhabited by the Flourishing Yang Emperor Lord. The Luminous Array Palace is inhabited by the Flowing Pearl Perfected. The Pure Wondrous Palace is inhabited by the Grand One’s Primordial King. The Grand Numinous Palace is inhabited by the Upper Origin’s Crimson Child. These five palaces are the masculine palaces, located in the south of the Jade Capital.

The aforementioned Nine Palaces lie atop the Jade Capital Mountain, arrayed in ordered patterns like the human brain. When mapped onto the body, none fails to correspond—only humans, benighted and unaware, do not perceive it.

**Vast Radiance Chapter**

Form the Mudrā of Jade Clarity’s Script with both hands.
The Great Practice of Vast Blackness—
The Mystic Master says: The Great Practice of Vast Radiance is one’s own primordial radiance. Its details are elucidated in the diagram.

**Diagram of the Great Practice of Vast Blackness**
*Diagram of the Great Practice of Vast Blackness at Western Tortoise Mountain*

The Mystic Master says: The Ancestor of Vast Qi is the Queen Mother of the West. The Ninefold Numinous, Most Wondrous White Jade Tortoise-Terrace Jade-Light Golden Perfected Vast Qi Ancestral Mother Primordial Lord, and the Azure-Golden Elixir August Dao Lord Metal Mother, dwell upon Western Tortoise Mountain—also called Dragon Mountain. This is the root and pivot of the Nine Qi, the profound palace of true earth, situated at the northwest corner, between the *hai* and *zi* positions, bordering Jade Clarity and connecting to the Mud Pill Palace. To the south, it adjoins the Scarlet Palace of Penetrating Yang, linking above to the lung qi and below to the inner gate of the sun and moon. The Cinnabar Chamber and Golden Palace lie within the kidneys, three *cun* square, northward aligned with the inner kidneys, flanked by the Twelve Spirit Chambers. At its center resides the sovereign of Vast Qi, the Feminine One True Mother.

Vast Qi ascends in daily audience; if the mind harbors dust, the Great Practice is lost, and Vast Qi cannot suffuse the entire body, circulating through the ten directions. The *Inner Image Elixir Principles* states: This is the precelestial pure essence of True Unity’s qi, stored between the kidneys in the Palace of Earth. Wondrously transforming and arising, it ascends to the Palace of Heaven; when yang reaches its apex, yin is born, descending to return to the origin. Ascending and descending in ceaseless circulation, it flows without end—hence it is called "circulating through the ten directions." The circulation of Vast Qi is detailed in the *Diagram of the Flowing Evolution of the Primordial Net*.

Within it dwells the spirit who delivers people from death—
The spirit who delivers people from death is named Flying Life, governing the affairs of transcending the world and avoiding death.
*Imperial Commentary*: The spirit of immortality is a transformation of the Primordial Beginning. His taboo name is Father Tranquil Presence, his style conjoins Mother’s Essence.

Within it dwells the Lord of Southern Culmen and Longevity—
In the Southern Culmen Palace resides the Lord of Delivered Destiny, styled Exhale Complete, who governs the registers of longevity.
*Imperial Commentary*: This is the Great Emperor Lord of Longevity, also called the Southern Culmen Life-Registering Great Emperor.

Within it dwells the deliverer of the world—
The Lord of World-Deliverance, whose taboo name is Trustworthy Dao Awareness, styled Diligent Bright Heaven, presides over the passage through the Three Calamities and Nine Tribulations.

The Marshal Great Spirit—
*Imperial Commentary*: The Marshal Great Spirit King who delivers people and saves the world, whose taboo name is Regulate Constant Life, styled Refined Dao Zhou, commands the Red Armor Divine Soldiers, the mighty deities who subdue the yin demons and ghostly essences of the Six Heavens.

Within it dwells the Venerable Lord Han of Cherished Life—
The Lord of Cherished Life, whose taboo name is Plan, is the most revered among spirits, called the Venerable One.
*Imperial Commentary*: The Lord of Cherished Life is the Lord of Bestowed Blessings and Compassionate Life in the Azure Florescence Palace, whose taboo name is Broad Follows Aspiration, styled Heavenly Compassion.

Within it dwell the Exalted Spirits of the Southern Upper Registers of Life and Records, who extend lifespan, augment destiny, and deliver from tribulation—
These are the spirits of the Southern Upper Cavern Yang Palace, the perfected ones of the Six Southern Dipper Offices. They restore bones to life and deliver countless people.

**Release of the Jade Clarity Mudrā**
These two lines summarize the preceding text: from "within it dwells the deliverer of people" to this point, all the offices of the perfected palaces possess the power to restore bones to life and deliver people to Dao attainment.
*Imperial Commentary*: In the Celestial Bureaus of the Nine Heavens resides the Lord of Restored Bones and Revived Life, whose taboo name is Party Worthy Origin, styled Elder Attendant Perfected. The Lord of Boundless Deliverance, whose taboo name is Principle Ascends Entwined, styled Sufficient August Brightness, presides over the offices of the Northern and Southern Culmens, the Purple Tenuity of the Grand Tenuity.

The Mystic Master says: All these spirits gather qi in the Nine Heavens; the Nine Heavens gather qi in the Grand Tenuity. The Vast Qi of the Grand Tenuity is the qi of the Highest Cavern Mystery, entering and transforming the body. The above main text was spoken by the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning.

**Summoning the Perfected Chapter**

Today is the day of collation and transcription, as the myriad heavens descend to the imperial throne.
"Today" refers to the first kalpa of the Crimson Clarity, the day of unfolding the charts and collating the records in the Great Floating Black Realm. The divine kings of the ten directions should be summoned according to their respective mudrās: strike the teeth once, and bow in reverence with the heart.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Sudden; he descends on the 1st, 11th, and 21st days.

**South** – *Li* Script
The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Fly; he descends on the 8th, 18th, and 28th days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Virtuous; he descends on the 4th, 14th, and 24th days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Cloud Above; he descends on the 5th, 15th, and 25th days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Deliver Immortal; he descends on the 2nd, 12th, and 22nd days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is No Mirror; he descends on the 3rd, 13th, and 23rd days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is Wash Color; he descends on the 6th, 16th, and 26th days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—
The divine king’s inner taboo name is That Luxuriant; he descends on the 7th, 17th, and 27th days.

The Limitless Flying Heavenly Divine King, the Great Sage of Longevity and Boundless Deliverance—

chunks.original_text: 玄师曰：此十方飞天神王威德功力重大，圣化不可思议。 於赤明劫初浮黎国中，开图校录之日，奉元始至尊之命，掌三界十方一切图录，并诣帝轩，校量罪福，纪录功过，随方品 量，无极度人。 凡诸度生救死，遣飞天使者吏兵，奏告神王，乞行救度。 十方至真飞天神王、长生度世无量大神，并乘飞云，丹舆绿辈，羽盖琼轮，骖驾朱凤　午文，五色玄龙　辰文，建九色之节，十绝灵旛，前啸九凤齐唱　卯文， 前部属阳，阳数奇，故九也。 后吹八鸾同鸣。 八卦诀。 后部属阴，阴数偶，故八也。 狮子　寅文　白鹤　戌文； 啸歌邕邕　酉文，五老启涂　玉清文，群仙翼辕，　太清文至上清文挑。 亿乘万骑，浮空而来。 五老，五帝也。 十方大圣，道位尊高，乃感五帝前引，群仙参乘，开启道涂。 《五符本行经》云：东方安宝华林青灵始老青帝，姓阎，讳开，字威灵仰。 南方梵宝昌阳丹灵真老赤帝，姓洞浮，讳极炎，字赤嫖弩。 中央玉宝元灵元老黄帝，姓通班，讳元良，字含枢纽。 西方七宝金门皓灵皇老白帝，姓上金，讳昌开，字曜魄郁。 北方洞阴朔单玉宝五灵玄老黑帝，姓黑节，讳灵会，字隐候局。 五老帝者，皆天真自然之神，故曰元始五老。 倾光过驾　坤文， 倾光者，流精玉光，互相辉焕也。 回驾者，飞云轮毂，回旋法座也。 监真度生　寅文。 十方上圣朝集帝所，监领众真，校度群生。
chunks.translated_text:
The Mystic Master declares: These Ten Directions’ Flying Heavenly Divine Kings possess majestic virtue, merit, and power of profound magnitude—sacred transformations beyond all reckoning. At the dawn of the Crimson Clarity Kalpa in the Floating Li Kingdom, on the day of unfolding charts and recording registers, by command of the Primordial Most High, they were entrusted to govern all registers of the Three Realms and Ten Directions. Proceeding to the Imperial Terrace of Xuanyuan, they weigh transgressions and blessings, inscribe merits and faults, and according to each direction’s rank and measure, deliver beings without limit. Whenever living beings are to be delivered or the dead rescued, flying celestial messengers and divine soldiers are dispatched to memorialize the Divine Kings, beseeching their salvific intervention.

The Ten Directions’ Perfected Flying Heavenly Divine Kings, the Boundless Great Spirits of Longevity and World-Deliverance, all ride upon soaring clouds, crimson chariots with verdant escorts, feathered canopies and jade wheels, drawn by vermilion phoenixes bearing *Wu* script and five-colored mystic dragons bearing *Chen* script. They bear nine-hued standards and ten sacred pennants of absolute efficacy. Ahead, nine phoenixes roar in unison, chanting *Mao* script—the vanguard belongs to yang, and yang’s number is odd, hence nine. Behind, eight simurghs sing in harmony—*Bagua* formula—the rearguard belongs to yin, and yin’s number is even, hence eight. Lions bearing *Yin* script and white cranes bearing *Xu* script; their harmonious songs resound in *You* script. The Five Elders open the path—*Jade Clarity* script—while hosts of immortals flank the axle—*Supreme Clarity* script ascending to *Highest Clarity* script. Myriad chariots and ten thousand riders arrive floating through the void.

The Five Elders are the Five Thearchs. The Ten Directions’ Great Sages, exalted in Dao-rank, evoke the Five Thearchs to lead the way, with throngs of immortals attending their procession, opening the road of the Way. The *Scripture of the Five Talismans’ Fundamental Practices* states: In the east, Anbao Hualin’s Azure Numinous First Elder, the Azure Thearch, surnamed Yan, named Kai, styled Weilingyang. In the south, Fanbao Changyang’s Cinnabar Numinous True Elder, the Vermilion Thearch, surnamed Dongfu, named Jiyan, styled Chipiaonu. In the center, Yubao Yuanling’s Primordial Elder, the Yellow Thearch, surnamed Tongban, named Yuanliang, styled Hanzhuniu. In the west, Qibao Jinmen’s Radiant Numinous August Elder, the White Thearch, surnamed Shangjin, named Changkai, styled Yaopoyu. In the north, Dongyin Shuodan’s Jade Treasure Five Numinous Mystic Elder, the Black Thearch, surnamed Heijie, named Linghui, styled Yinhouju. These Five Elder Thearchs are all celestial perfected spirits of spontaneous origin, hence called the Primordial Five Elders.

Their radiance pours forth in passage—*Kun* script—
*"Pouring radiance"* denotes streaming essence and jade light, mutually illuminating and resplendent.
*"Returning passage"* denotes flying cloud wheels revolving around the Dharma-throne.
They oversee the deliverance of the true and salvation of the living—*Yin* script.
The Ten Directions’ Supreme Sages assemble at the Thearch’s abode, supervising the multitudes of perfected and assessing the deliverance of all beings.

chunks.original_text: 诸天丞相、　中指掐大指根。 丞炁相炁，能立造化万物主者，丞相大罗天之神公也。 为受度更生之宾，辅弼诸天之事。 南昌上宫　午文，韩司主录　离文， 韩君之司主监长生之录。 监生大神　寅文， 即度生真人也，字扶义。 执箓把籍，齐到帝前。 随所应度，严校诸天。 中指下文。 已上正文，玉晨道君叙述受度之旨。 普告章 四十八字普告三界之诰命，双手掐玉清文。 普告三界， 欲界、色界、无色界也。 无极神乡， 十方无极世界。 泉曲之府，北都罗酆， 北下元右宫也。 北酆在天地之北癸地，名酆都泉曲府。 罗酆是北都上山名。 《伏魔经》云：下方正北有一大海，秽恶腥黑，莫测边际。 中有一山，高十万六千里，上参碧落，下入风泉，名曰北都罗酆山。 山近水面，有一大洞，名曰阴景天宫。 周回三万六千里，中有三十七狱。 主此洞者，名曰太阴天君。 此洞之外，山上别有六洞、六天大魔，各主其一，即太阴天君外六曹也。 六曹小吏，合有三十六万人。 第一洞名曰纣绝阴天宫，第二洞名曰泰煞谅事宗天宫，第三洞名曰明晨耐犯武成天宫，第四洞名曰恬照罪炁天宫，第五洞名曰宗灵七非天宫，第六洞名曰敢司连宛屡天宫。 经云：能持此六宫名号，生敬畏者，即得魔王保举，削落死名，生死受赖，获福无量。 已上六宫与太阴天君洞中六宫互相关报，主执罪罚。 子司曹局，因事受职，千千万万，何可胜言。 三官九署， 天、地、水三官也。 三官各有三府，故曰九署。 按《三元品戒经》，上元天官隶玉清境，结青、黄、白三炁而置三宫。 中宫名元阳七宝紫微宫，宫置左右中三府，左府主生官太阳火帝考。 右府主死官太阴水帝考。 中府主生死罪福风刀之考。 左宫名太玄都元黄太极左宫，即玉清左相宫也，亦置三府。 右宫名太玄都洞白太极右宫，是清微宫也，亦置三府，主考一同中宫。 上元三宫，宫统三府，府统四曹，合三十六曹。 中元地官隶上清境，结元洞混灵之炁，凝极黄之精而成。 其中宫名洞灵清虚宫，宫置左、右、中三府，左号耐犯明晨府，右号纣绝阴天府，中号七非恬照府，主考罪福，不异上元。 左官名南极洞阳宫，宫置三府，左号谅事府，右号宗灵府，中号灵如神府。 右宫名北酆宫，一名阴天宫，宫置三府，左号连宛泉曲府，右号泰煞九幽府，中号罪炁咸池府。 中元三宫九府，合四十二曹，主考不异上元。 下元水官隶太清境，结风泽之炁，凝晨浩之精而成。 其中宫号旸谷洞泉宫，一名青华方宫，置左右中三府，左号青元灵名府，右号九泉寒夜府，中号朔单青灵府。 左宫青灵宫，宫置三府，左号灵劫府，右号长夜府，中号灵宝劫刃府。 右宫名酆都宫，宫置三府，左号开度劫 量府，右号泉曲鬼神府，中号通灵大劫府。 下元三宫九府，共四十二曹，主考不异中元。 三元总九宫二十七府、百二十曹，左主生事，右主死事。 有功曹左府青簿，有罪书右府黑簿。 若罪中涉福，福中涉罪，则不专一曹。 得道奏中宫，有功奏左府，有罪奏右府。 每至三元之日集校，列奏三官。 十二河源。 玄师曰：十二分野有十二水河之源，奏於无极，混海泄水於天河东井之源也。 成玄英注：此明黄水之华，炼度死魂之事。

Holding the registers and grasping the ledgers, they assemble in unison before the Thearch.
According to those who ought to be delivered, they strictly assess all heavens.
End of the middle finger script.

The above is the main text, wherein the Jade Dawn Dao Lord expounds the decree of deliverance.

**Universal Proclamation Chapter**
Forty-eight characters proclaiming the edicts to the Three Realms—clasp both hands in the Jade Purity script.

Proclaiming to the Three Realms:
The Realm of Desire, the Realm of Form, and the Formless Realm.
The Boundless Divine Homeland—the ten directions’ boundless worlds.
The Northern Capital of Fengdu—the Right Palace of the Lower Prime.

Fengdu lies in the *Gui* region north of heaven and earth, called the Fengdu Spring Bend Prefecture. Luofeng is the name of a mountain in the Northern Capital. As stated in the *Subduing Demons Sutra*: "In the due north of the lower realm lies a vast sea, foul and black, its bounds unfathomable. Within it stands a mountain, a hundred and six thousand leagues high, its summit piercing the azure vault, its base plunging into the windy springs, named the Northern Capital Luofeng Mountain. Near the water’s surface, there is a great cavern called the Palace of Yin Shadow Heaven. It spans thirty-six thousand leagues in circumference and contains thirty-seven prisons. The ruler of this cavern is named the Heavenly Lord of Great Yin. Beyond this cavern, on the mountain, lie six other caverns, each governed by one of the Six Great Demons of the Six Heavens—these are the Six Ministries beyond the Heavenly Lord of Great Yin. The lesser officials of the Six Ministries number thirty-six myriad. The first cavern is named the Palace of Zhou’s Severed Yin Heaven; the second, the Palace of Tai’s Slaughter and Solemn Affairs Clan Heaven; the third, the Palace of Bright Morn’s Endurance and Martial Completion Heaven; the fourth, the Palace of Tranquil Illumination and Sinful Qi Heaven; the fifth, the Palace of the Clan Spirit’s Seven Transgressions Heaven; the sixth, the Palace of Daring Governance and Linked Grievances Heaven. The scripture states: Those who hold these six palace names in reverence shall have the demon kings vouch for them, their names of death erased, and their lives spared from suffering, gaining boundless blessings." The above six palaces and the six palaces within the Heavenly Lord of Great Yin’s cavern are mutually accountable, overseeing the execution of punishments.

The *Zi* Ministry Bureau—appointed by matter, their numbers countless, beyond enumeration.

The Three Offices and Nine Bureaus:
The Three Offices of Heaven, Earth, and Water. Each office has three courts, hence the Nine Bureaus.

According to the *Scripture of the Three Primes’ Precepts and Prohibitions*:
The Upper Prime Heavenly Office is subordinate to the Jade Purity Realm, formed by the coalescence of the green, yellow, and white *qi*, establishing three palaces. The Central Palace is named the Seven Treasures Purple Tenuity Palace of Primordial Yang. Within it are the left, right, and central courts: the Left Court governs the Office of Life, the Great Yang Fire Thearch Examiner; the Right Court governs the Office of Death, the Great Yin Water Thearch Examiner; the Central Court governs the Examiner of Life, Death, Sin, and Blessing, the Wind Blade.

The Left Palace is named the Supreme Mystery Left Palace of Primordial Yellow, also the Left Ministerial Palace of Jade Purity, and likewise has three courts. The Right Palace is named the Supreme Mystery Cavern White Right Palace of Primordial Yang, also the Palace of Pure Tenuity, and has three courts, their examinations identical to the Central Palace. The Upper Prime’s three palaces govern three courts each, and each court governs four ministries, totaling thirty-six ministries.

The Middle Prime Earthly Office is subordinate to the High Purity Realm, formed by the congealing of the *qi* of Primordial Cavern and Mixed Spirit, and the essence of Ultimate Yellow. Its Central Palace is named the Cavern Spirit Pure Emptiness Palace, containing left, right, and central courts: the Left Court is named the Endurance and Bright Morn Court; the Right Court, the Zhou’s Severed Yin Heaven Court; the Central Court, the Seven Transgressions and Tranquil Illumination Court. Their examinations of sin and blessing are no different from the Upper Prime.

The Left Palace is named the Southern Culmen Cavern Yang Palace, containing three courts: the Left Court is named the Solemn Affairs Court; the Right Court, the Clan Spirit Court; the Central Court, the Spirit’s Divine Likeness Court. The Right Palace is named the Fengdu Palace, also called the Yin Heaven Palace, containing three courts: the Left Court is named the Linked Grievances Spring Bend Court; the Right Court, the Tai’s Slaughter and Nine Darks Court; the Central Court, the Sinful Qi and Salty Pond Court. The Middle Prime’s three palaces and nine courts total forty-two ministries, their examinations no different from the Upper Prime.

The Lower Prime Water Office is subordinate to the Grand Purity Realm, formed by the coalescence of the *qi* of Wind and Marsh, and the essence of Dawn’s Vastness. Its Central Palace is named the Yang Valley Cavern Spring Palace, also called the Azure Florescence Square Palace, containing left, right, and central courts: the Left Court is named the Azure Primordial Spirit Name Court; the Right Court, the Nine Springs Cold Night Court; the Central Court, the Northern Prime Azure Spirit Court.

The Left Palace is named the Azure Spirit Palace, containing three courts: the Left Court is named the Spirit Kalpa Court; the Right Court, the Long Night Court; the Central Court, the Numinous Treasure Kalpa Blade Court. The Right Palace is named the Fengdu Palace, containing three courts: the Left Court is named the Kalpa Measure of Liberation Court; the Right Court, the Spring Bend Ghost Spirit Court; the Central Court, the Great Kalpa of Communicating Spirit Court. The Lower Prime’s three palaces and nine courts total forty-two ministries, their examinations no different from the Middle Prime.

The Three Primes together comprise nine palaces, twenty-seven courts, and one hundred twenty ministries. The left governs matters of life, the right matters of death. Merits are recorded in the green register of the left court; sins are inscribed in the black register of the right court. If sins are mingled with blessings or blessings with sins, they are not assigned to a single ministry. Attainments of the Dao are reported to the Central Palace; merits to the left court; sins to the right court. Every Three Prime day, they assemble for review and submit reports to the Three Offices.

The Twelve River Sources.
The Dark Master states: The twelve celestial divisions correspond to the twelve river sources, which report to the Boundless and flow into the Heavenly River’s Eastern Well source. Cheng Xuanying’s commentary: This elucidates the flowering of yellow water and the refinement and deliverance of dead souls.

chunks.original_text: 十二者，年中十二月也。 河源者，河即天河也。 天有二十八宿，东井星是天河之源，众水之泉。 月为太阴之精，诸水之母。 月行则每月一周天，一年十二月，每月中有一日月交，皆於东井华池之境，吐水灌注。 此炼度死魂之所。 故云十二河源，以明其事。 又见《三五顺行经》。 上解祖考，亿劫种亲，疾除罪簿，落灭恶根，不得拘留，逼合鬼群。 玉清文挑。 符命章　玉清文。 元始符命，时刻升迁。 北都寒池，部卫形魂，制魔保举， 法曰：制魔保举度人。 度品南宫，死魂受炼，仙化成人。 生身受度，劫劫长存，随劫轮转，与天齐年，永度三徒、　午坤巽文。 三官，徒役也。 天徒，讳可韩明； 人徒，讳兴生转； 地徒，讳独隶迁。 断绝天徒界上尸道色欲门，免天官驱雷逐电之役。 午。 断绝地徒界中尸道爱欲门，免地官担沙负石之役。 坤。 断绝人徒界下尸道贪欲门，免水官涟汲溟波之役。 巽。 五苦　申寅亥巳酉文　八难。 玄师曰：三徒五苦，合为八难。 度第一色累苦心门，免泰山地狱苦道。 申。 度第二爱累苦神门，免风刀地狱苦道。 寅。 度第三贪累苦形门，免担沙负石苦道。 亥。 度第四华竞苦精门，免填海作河苦道。 巳。 度第五身累苦魂门，免吞火食炭镬汤苦道。 酉。 超凌三界，逍遥上清。 玉清文移至上清文挑。 已上正文，元始天尊所降告命，玉晨道君纪录。 宝讳章 上清之天，天帝玉真，无色之境梵行。 音衡，又下孟切。 玄师曰：梵行者，道中之道，玄中之玄，真空无碍也。 三界之上，玉清之下，太清之上，有天帝曰玉真天帝，乃昊天玉皇上帝、玄穹高上天尊，主治无色梵行之境，是种民天界也。 又曰玉晨道君安处 无色世界上清大有之天。 薛幽栖注：景者，身也。 色者，质也。 无色之景则有景无色，形相宛然，犹如虚空，故云梵行。 下孟切。 李少微注：无色之景，唯有大梵之炁流行。 平声。 景境二字与行字作两音，经旨皆通。 东方八天 步斗、牛、女、虚、危、室、壁之是，依色取炁，梵天中斗罡。 欲界六天，六根俱染，是名欲界。 经曰：凡人口业净，有十善功以上，得生欲界天中。 太黄皇曾天，黄黑。 帝郁褴玉明。
chunks.translated_text:
The twelve correspond to the twelve months of the year. The "river sources" refer to the Heavenly River. The heavens comprise the twenty-eight lunar lodgings, and the Eastern Well star is the source of the Heavenly River, the fountainhead of all waters. The moon is the essence of Great Yin and the mother of all waters. As the moon moves, it completes one circuit of the heavens each month, and in a year of twelve months, there is one day each month when the moon conjoins, always at the Flowering Pond of the Eastern Well, where it spouts water to irrigate. This is the place where dead souls are refined and delivered. Thus it is called the Twelve River Sources, clarifying the matter. This is also seen in the *Scripture of the Three and Five in Harmonious Motion*.

It liberates ancestral forebears and kin of countless kalpas, swiftly erasing the ledgers of sins, extinguishing the roots of evil, preventing their detention and forcing them into the company of ghosts. **Jade Clarity Writ of Summons.** **Talisman and Mandate Chapter. Jade Clarity Writ.**

The Primordial Beginning’s talismanic mandate, timed and ordained for ascension. In the Northern Capital’s Cold Pond, the departments guard the forms and souls, restraining demons and ensuring protection. The Dharma states: "Restrain demons, ensure protection, and deliver people." Deliver the ranks to the Southern Palace, where dead souls undergo refinement and are transformed into immortals. Those who receive deliverance in their living bodies endure through kalpas, revolving with the ages, their years equaling Heaven’s, forever transcending the Three Servitudes.

**Noon. Kun. Xun Writ.**

The Three Offices are servitudes. The Heavenly Servitude is named Ke Hanming; the Human Servitude, Xingshengzhuan; the Earthly Servitude, Dulixian. Sever the Heavenly Servitude’s gate of corporeal desire in the realm of the dead, sparing one from the Heavenly Office’s labor of driving thunder and chasing lightning. **Noon.** Sever the Earthly Servitude’s gate of affectionate desire in the realm of the dead, sparing one from the Earthly Office’s labor of carrying sand and bearing stones. **Kun.** Sever the Human Servitude’s gate of covetous desire in the realm of the dead, sparing one from the Water Office’s labor of dredging waves in the dark sea. **Xun.**

**Five Sufferings. Shen. Yin. Hai. Si. You Writ. Eight Difficulties.**

The Dark Master states: The Three Servitudes and Five Sufferings together constitute the Eight Difficulties. Deliver from the first suffering of the color-bond gate, sparing one from the bitter paths of the Mount Tai Hell. **Shen.** Deliver from the second suffering of the love-bond gate, sparing one from the bitter paths of the Wind-Knife Hell. **Yin.** Deliver from the third suffering of the greed-bond gate, sparing one from the bitter labor of carrying sand and bearing stones. **Hai.** Deliver from the fourth suffering of the flower-competition gate, sparing one from the bitter labor of filling seas and digging rivers. **Si.** Deliver from the fifth suffering of the bodily-bond gate, sparing one from the bitter paths of swallowing fire, eating coals, and boiling cauldrons. **You.**

Transcend the Three Realms, roam freely in the Highest Clarity. **Jade Clarity Writ transferred to Highest Clarity Writ of Summons.**

The above is the main text, the revealed mandate of the Primordial Heavenly Honored One, recorded by the Jade Dawn Dao Lord.

**Precious Taboo Chapter**

In the heavens of Highest Clarity, the Heavenly Emperor of Jade Perfection dwells in the Boundless Realm of Brahman Conduct. *Yin heng*, also pronounced *xia meng*. The Dark Master states: Brahman conduct is the Dao within the Dao, the mystery within the mystery, true emptiness without obstruction. Above the Three Realms and below the Jade Clarity, above the Grand Clarity, there is a Heavenly Emperor named the Jade Perfection Heavenly Emperor, who is the August Jade Emperor of the Vast Heaven and the Heavenly Honored One of the Lofty and Mysterious Vault. He governs the Boundless Realm of Brahman Conduct, which is the celestial realm of the seed people. It is also said that the Jade Dawn Dao Lord abides in the Boundless World of the Highest Clarity’s Great Possession Heaven.

Xue Youqi’s annotation: *Jing* means body; *se* means substance. A body without color has form yet no color, its appearance as if empty space—hence it is called Brahman conduct. *Xia meng* cut.

Li Shaowei’s annotation: A body without color has only the qi of Great Brahman flowing through it. Pronounced as a level tone. *Jing jing* and *xing* are read as two syllables, and the scriptural meaning remains coherent.

**The Eight Heavens of the East**

Step through the Dipper, Ox, Girl, Void, Danger, House, and Wall, drawing qi according to their colors, the Dipper’s stem in the Brahman heavens. The Six Heavens of the Desire Realm have all six senses defiled—hence the name Desire Realm. The scripture states: If a person’s oral karma is pure and they possess ten virtuous deeds or more, they may be reborn in the heavens of the Desire Realm.

The Grand Yellow Emperor’s Layered Heaven, yellow-black. The Emperor’s Tattered Jade Brightness.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
Proceed through the constellations Horn, Neck, Root, Chamber, Heart, Tail, and Winnowing Basket, drawing qi according to their colors. The Dipper’s Guidance resides within the Brahma Heaven.

chunks.original_text: 帝讳极，主教学者之功，居万福宫，治在西方辛之南。 清净无染，喜乐无为。 太释玉隆腾胜天，青炁。 帝眇眇行元。 胄 帝讳浮黎，主召集仙圣，居白盖宫，治在西方辛之北。 龙变梵度天，赤炁。 帝运上玄玄。 娄 帝讳恶奕，主进仙成圣，居云保宫，治在西方戌之南。 随炁升降，无复结习。 太极平育贾奕天，苍炁。 帝大择法门。 奎 帝讳精上，主度学者之身，居天保宫，治在西方戌之北。 已上四天为四民天，亦谓之种民天。 此四天人出二炁之外，无年寿之限，喜乐清净。 《太真科》曰：上升四天，洞入道境，随炁升降，灾所不及，过此乃证自然 无为大洞之境。 李少微注：三十二天炁及所系星宿帝讳主掌，见《洞神经》。 根尘染净，见《龙蹻经》。 已上正文，元始天尊所说。 三十二天，三十二帝，诸天隐讳，诸天隐名，天中空洞，自然灵章，诸天隐韵，天中之音，天中之尊，天中之神，天中大魔，天中之灵。 空洞者，诸天太空虚无之中也。 八会灵文，自然玉字，非造作而成，故曰自然灵章。 隐韵者，乃中篇隐语，三十二天内音，隐其韵调，文旨玄奥，故曰隐韵。 隐讳隐名者，乃天中至尊大神、魔王仙灵之名号也。 所谓尊者，如诃摩乃元始之称呼，宛首乃道君之内号。 神者，阿那之神，九丑之鬼是也。 大魔者，魔罗乃天中大魔，都是天中魔王也。 灵者，郁馥即斗中灵童，婆泥乃火炼灵童是也。 略举而证之，不能详释矣。 九和十合，变化上清。
chunks.translated_text:
The Emperor’s taboo name is *Jí*, who oversees the merits of scholars and learners. He resides in the Palace of Myriad Blessings, governing the south of *Xīn* in the West. Pure and unstained, he delights in non-action.

The *Tài Shì Yù Lóng Téng Shèng* Heaven, suffused with blue *qi*. The Emperor’s abstruse conduct follows the Primordial.

The Emperor’s taboo name is *Fú Lí*, who summons and gathers immortals and sages. He resides in the White Canopy Palace, governing the north of *Xīn* in the West.

The *Lóng Biàn Fàn Dù* Heaven, suffused with red *qi*. The Emperor’s movement ascends to the Mysterious of the Mysterious.

The Emperor’s taboo name is *È Yì*, who advances immortals to sagehood. He resides in the Cloud Protection Palace, governing the south of *Xū* in the West. Ascending and descending with *qi*, habitual tendencies are no more.

The *Tài Jí Píng Yù Jiǎ Yì* Heaven, suffused with gray *qi*. The Emperor greatly selects the Dharma gates.

The Emperor’s taboo name is *Jīng Shàng*, who delivers the bodies of learners. He resides in the Heavenly Protection Palace, governing the north of *Xū* in the West.

The four heavens above are the Four Peoples’ Heavens, also called the Seed Peoples’ Heavens. The people of these four heavens exist beyond the dual *qi* of yin and yang, without limits of years or lifespan, delighting in purity and stillness.

The *Tài Zhēn Kē* states: "Ascending to the four heavens, one penetrates the realm of the Dao, rising and falling with *qi*, beyond the reach of calamity. Beyond this, one attains the natural, non-active realm of the Great Cavern."

Li Shaowei’s annotation: The *qi* of the thirty-two heavens and their associated stellar lodges, emperors’ taboo names, and governance are recorded in the *Dòng Shén Jīng*. The purity or defilement of roots and dust is expounded in the *Lóng Qiāo Jīng*.

The above main text was spoken by the Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning.

The thirty-two heavens, thirty-two emperors, hidden taboos of the heavens, hidden names of the heavens, the hollow emptiness within the heavens, the natural numinous chapters, the hidden rhymes of the heavens, the sounds within the heavens, the venerables within the heavens, the spirits within the heavens, the great demons within the heavens, the numina within the heavens.

The hollow emptiness refers to the great void within the heavens. The eightfold numinous script, the natural jade characters, are not crafted but spontaneously formed—hence called the natural numinous chapters. The hidden rhymes are the concealed verses of the middle section, the sounds within the thirty-two heavens, their melodies and tones obscured, their purport profound—hence called hidden rhymes. The hidden taboos and hidden names are the titles of the most venerable great spirits, demon kings, and immortal numina within the heavens. **Flying Deliverance through the Five Gates** *(continued)*
Flying deliverance through the gate of love and encumbrances, the *yín*-text;

**Enrollment in the Great Mystery**
The *Upper Clarity* text of enrollment in the Great Mystery.
One hundred twenty numinous officials, who inscribe the names of disciples in the Heavenly Ministry of the Great Mystery.

**Demon Kings’ Supervision and Recommendation**
The *Jade Clarity* text of demon kings’ supervision and recommendation.
One hundred twenty numinous officials, who command demons to safeguard and recommend the affairs of disciples.

**The Unrestrained Heavenly Gate**
The *qián*-text of the Unrestrained Heavenly Gate.
One hundred twenty numinous officials, who issue celestial certificates for those who attain the Dao, allowing them to pass through the Heavenly Gate.

The method states: When the Great Mystery’s demon kings supervise the deliverance of people, eradicating evil roots, they restrain demons to recommend and deliver ranks to the Southern Palace. When the earthly roots are severed, the Great Mystery’s demon kings supervise and allow ascent through the Heavenly Gate.

The Mysterious Master says: In human life, above are the twelve joints—roots of the dead *qi* transmitted by parents; in the middle are the twelve knots—roots of the dead *qi* received in one’s body; below are the twelve placenta and wombs—roots of the dead *qi* transmitted to descendants. All are earthly roots. Thus, on the day of deliverance, one must sever them, internally eliminating the thirty-six roots and externally restraining the six roots from evil destinies. When the earthly roots are severed and debts sealed within the form, one may then fly through the five gates, have their name enrolled in the Great Mystery, be supervised by demon kings, and ascend through the Heavenly Gate. All flesh and bone ascend together on the day of rising to Jade Clarity—this is the essence of deliverance. The method for sealing debts and enclosing the form is detailed in separate regulations.

The above is the main text, the *Celestial Worthy of Primordial Beginning’s* passage through the barriers, recorded by the *Jade Clarity Dao Lord*.

**The Five Phases Chapter**
**Eastern Dipper Governs Lifespan**
The *mǎo*-text.
The Eastern Dipper governs lifespan, overseen by the *Controller of Records* perfected officials.
*The Scripture of the Eastern Dipper’s Longevity and Life-Protection Spoken by Lord Lao* states: Within the Dipper are five stars—*Azure Numen Prolongs Life*, *Soaring Radiance Protects Life*, *Opening Heaven Accumulates Blessings*, *Great Brilliance Harmonizes Yang*, and *Tail’s Extremity Oversees All*.

**Western Dipper Records Names**
The *yǒu*-text.
The Western Dipper records names, overseen by the *Controller of Destiny* perfected officials.
*The Scripture of the Western Dipper’s Grand Register and Body-Protection Spoken by Lord Lao* states: Within the Dipper are four stars—*White Standard*, *Lofty Origin*, *August Numen*, and *Mighty Might*.

**Northern Dipper Casts Out Death**
The *zǐ*-text.
The Northern Dipper casts out death, overseen by the *Controller of Transgressions* perfected officials.
*The Scripture of the Northern Dipper’s Original Destiny and Life-Prolongation Spoken by Lord Lao* states: Within the Dipper are seven stars—*Greedy Wolf*, *Great Gate*, *Wealth Repository*, *Literary Brilliance*, *Integrity and Chastity*, *Martial Brilliance*, and *Breaker of Armies*.

**Southern Dipper Bestows Life**
The *wǔ*-text.
The Southern Dipper bestows life, overseen by the *Controller of Calamities* perfected officials.
*The Scripture of the Southern Dipper’s Longevity and Human-Deliverance Spoken by Lord Lao* states: Within the Dipper are six stars—*Controller of Destiny*, *Controller of Records*, *Extender of Lifespan*, *Enhancer of Calculations*, *Deliverer from Calamity*, and *Bestower of Life*.

**Central Dipper, Great Chief**
The *Jade Clarity* text.
The Central Dipper, Great Chief, overseen by the *Controller of Prohibitions* perfected officials.
It oversees all numinous beings.
The *zǐ-wǔ* Dippers alternate.
It oversees all numinous beings, examining and verifying perfected officials.
*The Scripture of the Central Dipper’s Great Chief, Longevity, and Demon-Subduing Spoken by Lord Lao* states: Within the Dipper are three stars—*Illustrious Numen Delivers the World*, *Revolving Transformation of the Supreme Sage*, and *Impelling Harmony of Ultimate Virtue*.

Some identify the twenty-eight lunar lodges—seven lodges in each of the four directions—as the four directional Dippers, with what is now called the Northern Dipper as the Central Dipper. Citing *The Treatise on Celestial Offices* as evidence: "The Dipper is the Emperor’s chariot, revolving at the center and governing the four directions." Since the people of the Divine Continent dwell south of the Pole, observing from the north, it is called the Northern Dipper. *The Oral Instructions of Perfected Unity* also states: "Within the Dipper are five Dippers: *Yang Brilliance* is the Eastern Dipper, *Yin Essence* is the Western Dipper, *Cinnabar Origin* is the Southern Dipper, *Northern Culmen* is the Northern Dipper, and *Celestial Barrier* is the Central Dipper." The accounts differ, so both are preserved.

**Azure Thearch Protects the Hun**
The *zhèn*-text.
The Azure Thearch, Perfected of Hun-Protection.
The Thearch’s surname is *Constant*, personal name *Essence Brilliance*.
He resides in the East, governs Wood, internally corresponds to the liver, protects the three *hun*, enabling their numinous clarity and uprightness.
The *hun* are stored in the liver, hence "protects the *hun*."
The Azure Thearch’s hymn says:
Facing east, bowing hands in reverence,
To the Azure Thearch, Jade August Lord.
Numinous winds stir the jade flutes,
Nurturing beings, spreading primal spring.
Cloud-dragons harness the solemn chariot,
Jade guards surround the jasper wheel.
Withered sprouts float, drenched and revived,
Great kindness knows no bounds.
Myriad immortals sing of the Dao,
In intricate detail, admonishing heaven and humankind.
The root of the heart, deluded, clings fast—
With folded hands and kneeling, we bear vast benevolence.

**White Thearch Attends the Po**
The *duì*-text.
The White Thearch, Perfected of Po-Attendance.
The Thearch’s surname is *Mixed*, personal name *Mat Collector*.
He resides in the West, governs Metal, internally corresponds to the lungs, attends the seven *po*, preventing their dispersal and chaos, sealing the demonic paths.
The *po* are stored in the lungs, hence "attends the *po*."
The White Thearch’s hymn says:
Six *jiǎ* embrace the Metal Barrier,
Seven regulators guard the numinous altar.
Washing the bells, casting fire transformations,

Binding and restraining demonic ghosts,
Chilling winds sweep the celestial void.
Pernicious *qi* now stilled,
The myriad heavens swiftly pacified.
True companions bear great shelter,
Bowing foreheads, singing in joy.

**Vermilion Thearch Nurtures Qi**
The *lí*-text.
The Vermilion Thearch, Perfected of Qi-Nurturance.
The Thearch’s surname is *Blazing*, personal name *Cavern Cinnabar*.
He resides in the South, governs Fire, internally corresponds to the heart, nurturing primordial *qi*.
*Qi* arises from Fire, hence "nurtures *qi*."

Great vistas open the jade pivot,

chunks.original_text: 黑帝通血　坎文。 黑帝通血真人，帝姓玄，讳明萌。 位北，主水，内应肾脏，使血脉通利，荣盛一身。 黑帝太元，水帝也。 水在人身为血，血归於水，故曰通血。 黑帝歌曰： 无质统有物，渊兮上帝心。 不启不发道，蕴妙化机深。 恐尔漏未尽，阴想勿浸滛。 轮转无涯波，苦道相迷寻。 万年常谨约，一旦自湮沈。 无冲落鬼境，殃谴不可任。 黄帝中主　玉文。 黄帝中主真人，帝姓麻，讳忠慎。 万神无越　。 乾文 万神无越真人，位中央，主土，内应脾脏，营卫中府，拘制万神，不令错越。 一身之中则肝藏魂、肺藏魄、绛宫丹田二炁交媾，则赤炁下降，玄泉上升； 心藏血、肾藏精，二炁返复，交相生养黄庭之中，神意所在也。 黄帝歌日： 万天拱中宸，控驾玉池根。 翘机贯亿历，洞朗辟四门。 大有混皇真，纠制星宿魂，非帝道不运，有方赖之存。 威忿即霜秋，和预为阳春。 生成握元纪，仰荷戴元垠。 薛幽栖注：五帝在天，则主领五方； 神仙在地，则主领五岳； 鬼神在人，则主领五脏。 精神各有所主，人法地、地法天、天法道、道法自然。 神有所归，故无错越，三合以成其德。 卫真章 叩齿三十二通，存身为神公诵之。 青天魔王巴元丑伯，寅卯文挑。 东方青天大魔王姓赋，讳齿成巴。 与元始同生，统御九天。 丑伯，三界魔王也。 主领三界学人，识其音则享福，不识其音则被殃。 若得魔王保举，身入三清也。 青天魔王制邪玉文： 郁蔼苍晶，洞景开明。 始阳九炁，停华育魂。 流英妙府，灵真上神。 琼碧云冠，飞光羽群。 青腰玉女，太上真人。 保度仙箓，消魔却氛。 赤天魔王负天担石，巳午文挑。 南方赤天大魔王姓佛，讳由肃。 势能遏天，力能倾山，飞空三界，遏人功德，制伐众灵。 赤天魔王制邪玉文： 昌阳真老，赤灵尊神。 统御丹天，检制魔群。 严驾朱凤，三角之麟。 上道泰清，玄元之根。 火嫖三炁，盘徊绛云。 育养丹府，保制长存。 白天魔王反山六目，申酉文挑。 西方白天大魔王姓赤，讳张市，一头六目，能破山反石，总制六天鬼神，断人生生之路也。 白天魔王制邪玉文： 七灵皓炁，三素元真。 中有皇老，制摄魔精。 庚辛官将，七十万兵。 羽旗龙节，金虎云奔。 断除妖妄，炼育华英。 与道长存，历劫无倾。 黑天魔王监丑朗馥。 亥子文挑。 北方黑天大魔王姓徐，讳直事，为性凶丑而好杀。 黑天魔王制邪玉文： 北阴郁丹，玄炁之宫。 帝真灵会，驱神驾龙。 室有玉女，夜光之童。 掌握图箓，摄制魔踪。 虚危合化，紫烟激风。 宝晶炼育，后天无终。 黄天魔王横天担力，中指中文。 中央黄天大魔王姓天门，讳波往。 大魔王衣玄文之衣，头戴通天之冠，腰佩龙头之剑，乘羽轮之车，飞行云中。 常作谣歌有三千言，败乱后学，太上书其曲在《消魔经》。 薛幽栖注：魔王上四言位号，中二言讳，下二言字也。 《内象丹旨》注：旧说谓魔王作谣歌以乱后学，靖而思之，不然。 魔王非故败乱后学者，盖试之也。 色界魔王歌曰：我界难度，故作洞文，变化飞空，以试尔身。 人虽好道，信而不笃者多矣。 徒慕虚名，不为实行，魔王安得不试之？ 试之心固者，保举成真，其 败乱者，亦秉持不坚之过，於魔王亦何怪焉。 黄天魔王制邪玉文：

The Black Thearch Unfolds Blood
*Kan* Text.

The Black Thearch, Perfector of Unfolding Blood, bears the surname *Mysterious* and the personal name *Luminous Sprout*.
He resides in the North, governs Water, internally corresponds to the kidneys, and ensures the free flow of blood vessels, nourishing the entire body.
The Black Thearch is the Supreme of the Great Origin, the Water Thearch.

The Black Thearch’s hymn says:
Formless, yet it governs all things,
Abyssal—O heart of the Supreme.
The Dao neither opens nor emits,
Yet harbors profound transformative mechanisms.
Fear lest your leaks remain unstaunched,
And yin thoughts drown in excess.
Wheeling waves without bound,
The bitter path leads astray.
Ten thousand years of vigilance,
One day of self-oblivion.
Without equanimity, you fall into ghostly realms—
Calamity and retribution cannot be borne.

The Yellow Thearch, Central Lord
*Jade* Text.

The Yellow Thearch, Perfector of the Central Lord, bears the surname *Hemp* and the personal name *Loyal Caution*.
The myriad spirits do not transgress.

*Qian* Text.
The Perfector of the Myriad Spirits Without Transgression resides in the Center, governs Earth, internally corresponds to the spleen, and regulates the constructive and defensive *qi* of the central palace, restraining the myriad spirits to prevent disorder.
Within the body, the liver stores the *hun*, the lungs store the *po*; in the Crimson Palace and Cinnabar Field, the two *qi* intertwine—vermilion *qi* descends, mysterious spring ascends.
The heart stores blood, the kidneys store essence; the two *qi* cycle and reciprocally nurture within the Yellow Court, where spirit and intent reside.

The Yellow Thearch’s hymn says:
The myriad heavens bow to the central pole,
Reining the jade pool’s root.
The trigger spans eons,
Luminous clarity opens the four gates.
The Great Possession blends with the August Perfected,
Disciplining the starry souls.
Without the Thearch’s Dao, nothing moves—
All directions rely on its presence.
Wrath brings frost and autumn,
Harmony heralds spring’s warmth.
Grasping the primal record of generation,
We look up to bear the original limit.

Xue Youqi’s note:
The Five Thearchs in heaven govern the five directions;
The immortals on earth govern the five sacred peaks;
The ghosts and spirits within humans govern the five viscera.
Each spirit has its ruler.
Humans emulate earth, earth emulates heaven, heaven emulates the Dao, the Dao emulates spontaneity.
Spirits have their abode, hence no transgression—
The three harmonize to perfect virtue.

*Guarding the Perfected* Chapter
Knock the teeth thirty-two times, visualize the body as the divine lord, and recite:

The Azure Heaven Demon King *Bayuan Choubo*,
*Yin-mao* text, *tiao*.

The Great Demon King of the Eastern Azure Heaven, surnamed *Fu*, personal name *Chicheng Ba*.
Born with the Primordial Beginning, he commands the Nine Heavens.
*Choubo* is the Demon King of the Three Realms.
He oversees the disciples of the Three Realms—
Those who recognize his sound enjoy blessings; those who do not suffer calamity.
If the Demon King recommends you, your body enters the Three Clarities.

The Azure Heaven Demon King’s Jade Text for Restraining Evil:
Lush and verdant, crystalline azure,
Cavernous vistas unfold in brightness.
The first yang of the nine *qi*,
Pauses to nurture the *hun* in blossoming splendor.
Flowing essences fill the wondrous palace,
Spiritual perfected ascend as gods.
Jade-green cloud crowns,
Winged multitudes in radiant flight.
Azure-waisted jade maidens,
Supreme Perfected.
Protect and convey the immortal register,
Dispel demons and banish miasma.

The Vermilion Heaven Demon King *Futian Danshi*,
*Si-wu* text, *tiao*.

The Great Demon King of the Southern Vermilion Heaven, surnamed *Fo*, personal name *Yousu*.
His might can halt the heavens, his strength can topple mountains.
He soars through the Three Realms,
Obstructing merit and virtue,
Disciplining and subduing all spirits.

The Vermilion Heaven Demon King’s Jade Text for Restraining Evil:
Flourishing yang, true elder,
Vermilion spirit, honored deity.
Commanding the Cinnabar Heaven,
Inspecting and restraining demonic hordes.
Sternly driving the crimson phoenix,
The three-horned unicorn.
The upper Dao prospers in the Grand Clarity,
Root of the Mysterious Origin.
Fire dances with the three *qi*,
Winding through crimson clouds.
Nurturing the cinnabar palace,
Ensuring enduring restraint.

The White Heaven Demon King *Fanshan Liumu*,
*Shen-you* text, *tiao*.

The Great Demon King of the Western White Heaven, surnamed *Chi*, personal name *Zhangshi*, with one head and six eyes.
He can shatter mountains and overturn stones,
Commanding the ghostly spirits of the Six Heavens,
Severing the paths of human rebirth.

The White Heaven Demon King’s Jade Text for Restraining Evil:
Sevenfold luminous *qi*,
Threefold primordial perfected.
Within resides the August Elder,
Restraining and seizing demonic essences.
The officers of *geng-xin*,
Seven hundred thousand troops.
Feathered banners, dragon tally,
Golden tigers, cloud-borne steeds.
Severing and dispelling pernicious delusions,
Refining and nurturing blossoming essences.
Abiding with the Dao in perpetuity,
Unshaken through kalpas.

The Black Heaven Demon King *Jianchou Langfu*,
*Hai-zi* text, *tiao*.

The Great Demon King of the Northern Black Heaven, surnamed *Xu*, personal name *Zhishi*, fierce and hideous by nature, delighting in slaughter.

The Black Heaven Demon King’s Jade Text for Restraining Evil:
Northern darkness, crimson and dense,
Palace of the mysterious *qi*.
The Thearch’s true spirits convene,
Driving gods and charioting dragons.
Within the chamber, jade maidens,
Luminous youths.
Grasping the talismanic register,
Seizing and restraining demonic traces.
The Void and Danger conjoin in transformation,
Purple mists stir the wind.
Precious crystals refine and nurture—
The posterior heaven knows no end.

The Yellow Heaven Demon King *Hengtian Danli*,
*Zhongzhi* text, *zhongwen*.

The Great Demon King of the Central Yellow Heaven, surnamed *Heavenly Gate*, personal name *Bowang*.
The Demon King wears robes of dark patterns, a crown piercing the heavens, a sword with a dragon-head hilt at his waist, and rides a feathered-wheel chariot, soaring through the clouds.
He often composes ballads of three thousand words, disrupting later disciples.
The Supreme recorded his songs in the *Scripture for Dispelling Demons*.

Xue Youqi’s note:
The Demon Kings’ four-character titles denote their positions; the middle two characters are their personal names; the last two are their courtesy names.

The *Inner Image of the Cinnabar Principle* note:
Old accounts claim the Demon King composes ballads to disrupt later disciples. Upon reflection, this is not so.
The Demon King does not deliberately disrupt later disciples—he tests them.

The Demon King of the Form Realm’s hymn says:
My realm is hard to cross,
Thus I compose cavernous texts,
Transforming and soaring through space,
To test your resolve.
Though many seek the Dao,
Few are steadfast in faith.
They covet empty fame,
Neglecting true practice—
How can the Demon King not test them?
Those tested and steadfast are recommended for perfection;
Those disrupted bear the fault of weak resolve—
What blame lies with the Demon King?

The Yellow Heaven Demon King’s Jade Text for Restraining Evil:

veil the golden steps.
Soaring forests shade the jasper terraces,
Cinnabar phoenixes tread the jade trees.
Precious chambers, names of melodies resplendent,
Brightness befits the abode of spirits.
Wandering freely, the cloud paths open wide,
Gazing toward the true capital.
The celestial sun never sets,
Thick mists seal the azure hut.
The Supreme’s vermilion seal unfolds,
Silk and bamboo display the simple writ.
Favorable winds plant the mysterious transformation—
Yin and Xin surely have surplus.
