chunks.original_text: 元皇上灵，冲妙之尊。 混合真朴，造化元根。 感激幽微，挺生大神。 摄召万炁，齐会华房。 消荡百魔，与道俱昌。 保度却灾，灭试除殃。 五帝大魔，震亶兑坎中文。 万神之宗。 东方青帝大魔王、南方赤帝大魔王、西方白帝大魔王、北方黑帝大魔王、中央黄帝大魔王，此非前之五帝五天魔王也，乃五帝之下别有大魔，故严东注姓名以别之。 青帝魔王姓迫落，讳万形。 赤帝魔王姓赭，讳上栢。 白帝魔王姓邓，讳呼儿。 黑帝魔王姓臬，讳公孙。 黄帝魔王姓宛躬，讳产生。 各领官属三万八千人，与五天同生，主领三界，功等诸天，故为鬼神之宗也。 《内象丹旨》注：《玉清隐书》云五帝大魔王，领官属与天同生，恼乱学人，不欲成道。 又自矜与诸天上帝齐其圣功。 后因龙汉开图，乃服元始之化。 故《步虚颂》云：魔王敬受事，故能朝诸天。 由是而言，若学士坚持素志，功积行着，则魔王敬奉，反为之用，又何敢而魔阵也。 东方九黑青灵始老青帝消魔王咒 洞耀育元精，青华开大明。 布育九天炁，始生荐 无英。 扶阳通摄御，丹林合总真。 积霄始晖上，郁迭明霞晨。 灵光焕罗络，卫育保形魂。 混化合玄景，仁惠消魔群。 万遍道己超，功当奏上清。 南方三黑丹灵真老赤帝消魔王咒 三炁蔼灵阙，明虚焕玉丹。 朱陵有帝真，华云飞绛軿。 统御万界中，抚运超亿千。 执策按简箓，洞章敷神篇。 解结散祸根，流金摧凶奸。 志能成此道，魔试俱无前。 保度冥劫津，宴盻无穷年。 西方七炁皓灵皇老白帝消魔王咒 西灵回七度，太眇郁明华。 白元维我神，皇真御景霞。 皎皎三素晖，昭昭破百邪。 摄音延至炁，金晶育三田。 炼结固玉质，宝曜映琼鲜。 魔精当灭试，逮地 无沈连。 逸辔高清馆，齐轮太上仙。 北方五炁五灵玄老黑帝消魔王咒 北玄三秀蔼，太上紫皇居。 总炁摄幽栖，造化敷灵纲。 下统虚危精，宝育天元房。 灵通太妙神，缠罗卫百关。 豁落灭魔试，凶灾永不干。 大道保自然，寿命 无亏残。 万劫享庆会，白日登云轮。 中央一黑元灵元老黄帝消魔王咒 混化归冲妙，元皇总帝灵。 真老闭黄阙，四御齐玄钧。 圆华太张上，同携坚玉君。 结津固百骸，琼耀拥胎仙。 晨晖注明景，魔应自灭形。 万道保无亏，返老回童婴。 五会合一炁，飞驭超云京。 飞行鼓从，总领鬼兵。 玉文。 总领鬼兵三天大元师。 麾幢鼓节，玉文。 九天尚父执麾，左领神王执幢，右统大神按鼓，后部力士执节，前引天 丁。 游观太空，自号赫奕，玉文。 诸天齐功。 玉清赫奕天将大神，皆统属玉清神公太玄上相也。 与诸天大圣高灵齐功，自号玉清灵宝赫奕之司。 赫奕仙曹，专主灵宝一司。 上天度人，严摄北酆。 《内象丹曾》注云：欲界飞空之音卒章曰：北都泉曲府，中有万鬼群，但欲遏人算，断绝人命门。 阿人歌洞章，以摄北罗酆，束送妖魔精，斩馘六鬼峰。 诸天炁荡荡，我道日兴隆。 盖北酆鬼神乃职司杀，乐於遏算绝命。 天尊开度，魔王顺化，勒摄鬼帝，普告关盟，宣约处分，毋辄肆害也。 神公受命 太清神公，太玄上相，右手紫微印，左手玉清文。 叩齿九通，存神为神公之形，顶玉清大丞相金碧貂蝉之冠，衣锦霞飞羽之抱，大带、朱履、绛裙，坐三色云中。
chunks.translated_text:
The Primordial August Supreme, revered in profound subtlety,
Unites true simplicity, the root of creation’s origin.
Moved by the obscure and subtle, the Great Spirit emerges,
Commanding and summoning the myriad qi, gathering in the Flower Chamber.
Dispelling the hundred demons, flourishing with the Dao.
Preserving deliverance, averting calamity, dissolving trials and misfortune.

The Five Thearchs of the Great Demons—Zhen, Dan, Dui, Kan, and the Central Text—
are the lords of all spirits.

The Azure Thearch of the East, Great Demon King;
The Vermilion Thearch of the South, Great Demon King;
The White Thearch of the West, Great Demon King;
The Black Thearch of the North, Great Demon King;
The Yellow Thearch of the Center, Great Demon King—
these are not the Five Thearchs and Five Heavenly Demon Kings of former times,
but rather great demons distinct beneath the Five Thearchs,
hence Yan Dong records their names to distinguish them.

The Azure Thearch Demon King: surname Poluo, personal name Wanxing.
The Vermilion Thearch Demon King: surname Zhe, personal name Shangbai.
The White Thearch Demon King: surname Deng, personal name Hu’er.
The Black Thearch Demon King: surname Nie, personal name Gongsun.
The Yellow Thearch Demon King: surname Wangong, personal name Chansheng.

Each commands an official retinue of thirty-eight thousand,
born together with the Five Heavens, governing the Three Realms,
their merit equal to that of all heavens, thus they are the lords of ghosts and spirits.

The *Inner Image of the Cinnabar Principle* note:
The *Hidden Writ of Jade Clarity* states that the Five Thearchs of the Great Demon Kings,
commanding their official retinues, are born with Heaven,
vexing and disrupting practitioners, unwilling for them to achieve the Dao.
Yet they boast of equaling the sacred merit of the Heavenly Thearchs.
Later, during the Dragon Han’s unfolding of the cosmic pattern,
they submitted to the transformation of the Primordial Beginning.
Thus the *Hymn of Pacing the Void* says:
The Demon Kings respectfully receive their charge,
and so are able to attend upon all heavens.
From this, it follows that if a practitioner firmly upholds their original resolve,
accumulating merit and manifesting conduct,
the Demon Kings will revere and serve them,
how then could they dare to deploy demonic legions?

**Incantation of the Nine-Black Azure Numinous Origin Elder, Azure Thearch Demon-Quelling King of the East**
Radiant cavern illuminates the primordial essence,
Azure splendor unfolds great brightness.
Dispersing and nurturing the qi of the Nine Heavens,
At first birth, it offers the Peerless Hero.
Supporting yang, it governs and commands,
The Cinnabar Grove unites all truths.
Accumulating dawn’s first light above,
Lush and layered, the rosy morn glows.
Spiritual light shines through the net of radiance,
Nurturing and guarding form and soul.
In harmonious transformation, it merges with the mysterious scene,
With benevolence, it dissolves demonic hosts.
Reciting ten thousand times, the Dao transcends the self,
Merit duly reported to the Upper Clarity.

**Incantation of the Three-Black Cinnabar Numinous Perfected Elder, Vermilion Thearch Demon-Quelling King of the South**
Three qi suffuse the numinous portal,
Luminous and resplendent, the Jade Cinnabar glows.
The Vermilion Mound harbors the Thearch Perfected,
Vermilion clouds soar in crimson carriages.
Governing and guiding within the myriad realms,
Nurturing and transcending through boundless eons.
Wielding the staff, consulting the registers,
Proclaiming cavernous chapters, unfolding divine texts.
Untying knots, scattering the roots of misfortune,
Molten gold shatters the treacherous and wicked.
If one’s resolve can accomplish this Dao,
No demonic trial can stand before them.
Preserving deliverance across the kalpas’ ford,
Reveling in boundless years.

**Incantation of the Seven-Qi Radiant Numinous August Elder, White Thearch Demon-Quelling King of the West**
The Western Numinous revolves through seven cycles,
In supreme subtlety, lush brightness flourishes.
White Prime sustains my spirit,
August Perfected governs the radiant rosy clouds.
Resplendent, the Three Simplicities’ brilliance,
Luminous, it shatters the hundred evils.
Drawing sound to extend the primal qi,
Golden crystal nurtures the Three Fields.
Refining and congealing to solidify the jade substance,
Precious radiance reflects the lustrous and fresh.
Demon essence faces annihilation in trial,
Even in the nether realms, no entanglement remains.
Reining in the unbridled, ascending to the High Clarity’s halls,
Aligning wheels with the Most High Immortals.

**Incantation of the Five-Qi Five Numinous Mysterious Elder, Black Thearch Demon-Quelling King of the North**
The Northern Mystery’s Three Elegances suffuse,
The Supreme Purple Thearch resides.
Gathering qi to govern the obscure and secluded,
Creation unfolds the numinous net.
Below, it governs the Void and Danger’s essence,
Precious nurturing in the Heavenly Origin’s chamber.
Spirit communicates with the supremely subtle divine,
Enveloping and guarding the hundred barriers.
Expansive and free, it annihilates demonic trials,
Misfortunes and calamities forever cease to threaten.
The Great Dao preserves the natural,
Lifespan knows no depletion.
Through ten thousand kalpas, it enjoys blessed assemblies,
Ascending to the cloud chariot in broad daylight.

**Incantation of the One-Black Primordial Numinous Origin Elder, Yellow Thearch Demon-Quelling King of the Center**
In harmonious transformation, returning to profound subtlety,
The Primordial August unites the Thearch’s numen.
The Perfected Elder seals the Yellow Portal,
The Four Governors align the mysterious balance.
The Round Flower ascends to the Great Canopy,
Together they support the steadfast Jade Lord.
Congealing the ford to secure the hundred bones,
Jade radiance embraces the embryonic immortal.
Morning brilliance infuses the luminous scene,
Demons respond by self-annihilating their forms.
The myriad Dao preserve wholeness,
Reversing age to return to infancy.
The Five Assemblies merge into one qi,
Soaring in flight to transcend the Cloud Capital.

Soaring in flight, drumming in procession,
Commanding the ghostly legions.
**Jade Text:** Commander of the Ghostly Legions, Great Primordial Master of the Three Heavens.
Brandishing the banner, beating the drum, striking the baton,
**Jade Text:** The Nine Heavens’ August Father wields the banner,
the Left-Commanding Divine King holds the standard,
the Right-Governing Great Spirit strikes the drum,
the rear phalanx of valiant warriors wields the baton,
the Heavenly Ding lead the vanguard.
Roaming and observing the great void,
self-styled as the Illustrious and Resplendent,
**Jade Text:** All heavens equal in merit.
The Illustrious and Resplendent Heavenly Generals of the Jade Clarity,
all under the command of the Jade Clarity’s Divine Duke, Supreme Minister of the Great Mystery.
Equal in merit with the Great Saints and Lofty Numinous Ones of all heavens,
self-styled as the Jade Clarity Numinous Treasure’s Illustrious and Resplendent Office.
The Illustrious and Resplendent Immortal Bureau,
specializing in the governance of the Numinous Treasure’s singular office.
Ascending to heaven to deliver humanity,
sternly restraining the Northern Feng.

The *Inner Image of the Cinnabar Principle* note:
The concluding verse of the Desire Realm’s soaring-in-space hymn says:
The Northern Capital’s Spring and Bend Prefecture,
harbors a host of ten thousand ghosts,
all eager to obstruct human destiny,
severing the gate of human life.
Ah! People chant cavernous chapters,
to restrain the Northern Feng Luo,
binding and dispatching demonic essences,
beheading and capturing at the Six Ghost Peaks.
The qi of all heavens billows,
my Dao daily ascends in glory.
For the Northern Feng’s ghosts and spirits are charged with killing,
delighting in obstructing destiny and severing life.
The Heavenly Worthy initiates deliverance,
the Demon Kings submit to transformation,
commanding and restraining the Ghostly Thearchs,
universally proclaiming covenants and decrees,
issuing orders and arrangements,
forbidding wanton harm.

The Divine Duke receives the mandate—
the Supreme Clarity’s Divine Duke, Supreme Minister of the Great Mystery,
right hand forming the Purple Tenuity Seal,
left hand holding the Jade Clarity’s text.
Knocking the teeth nine times,
visualizing the spirit in the form of the Divine Duke,
crowned with the Jade Clarity’s Grand Chancellor’s golden and azure sable coronet,
robed in brocade and rosy flying-feathered raiment,
girded with a grand sash, vermilion shoes, and crimson skirt,
seated amidst the three-colored clouds.

chunks.original_text: 神公即地皇之臣，马祖大帝之嗣。 角龙，辰宿大神之父，位玉清神公太玄上相，号马龙氏，讳廓奕。 普扫不祥。 严东注：神公者、大罗天丞相也。 受天尊符命，扫荡魔精不善之鬼。 八威吐毒，酉文。 八威大神，随诀召降，卫护坛所。 青龙大神，震； 白虎大神，兑； 朱雀大神，离； 玄武大神，坎； 狮子大神，坤； 穷奇大神，艮； 麒麟大神，巽； 辟邪大神，乾。 猛马四张。 午文。 天马大神。 天丁前驱，玉清文。 大力天丁，前骚大神。 大师仗旛。 辰文。 命魔仗旛大师。 掷火万里，寅离午文挑。 玉清掷火大神将军。 流铃八冲。 申坤离中丑寅卯文挑。 玉清流铃大神。 敢有干试，拒遏上真，金钺前戮，玉清诀直二指。 金钺前戮大将。 巨天后刑，大指掐四指根，五指俱拳。 巨天后刑大将。 屠割鬼爽。 右手金钺诀，大指压二、三、四指，箔人．亥文，直小指。 玉清屠割使者。 风火无停，左手四丫五指，从辰至申，复巽挑高。 玉清风火大将军。 千千截首，万万剪形。 中指根艮文挑。 剪截鬼秽大神。 魔无干犯，鬼无妖精。 夫有真则有邪，有善则有恶，故邪能遏真，恶能丧善。 用此刑威，驱除剿伐，不得有相干犯也。 已上正文，玉晨道君宣迷扶卫扫荡之事、玉清大神之威神也。 三官北酆，明检鬼营。 坤高中丑寅文挑。 明检鬼营大神。 不得容隐，金马驿呈。 自午轮十二支复高至午文挑。 金马驿呈大神。 普告无穷，万神咸听。 三界五帝，死言上清。 中世二清诀，至震高兑，坎中文，复上清文挑。 列言上清录事。 玄师曰：此皆玉清天将大神，自号玉清灵宝赫奕之司，辅翼玉清，劫运改更，灭魔扫灾，升度学仙之子，检校三界，制御鬼爽，搜究鬼营，肃清道炁，皆扶卫扫荡之神也。 已上正文，皆元始天尊所降之，令玉晨道君纪录。 五劫开化元洞玉历章 真阳开化，梵炁流通。 金阙在上，玉府居东。 郁结五文，焕散九空。 妙炁自然，蕴奥难穷。 三灵共贯，万圣攸宗。 参稽学行，标纪真功。 形神俱契，与道合同。 安镇帝箓，亿劫 无终。 昔混元溟涬，大梵弥罗，诸天未分，九阳冥合，三因九转，六变七徊，元始肇形，五劫初化。 乃命梵元祖晨道君笔录天元，运乘五劫。 故元洞者，以名祖炁。 玉历者，纪乎天元。 劫运五周，复归其一。 自一炁化分，三因成九，若龙若蜓，蟠曲九道，漠漠 无极，总九阳祖炁之元。 太上以三九运梵，三五乘元，合四十二炁，以开始青天元祖炁。 明东方始青之元，应九阳木王之初。 故东方得九炁以分天境，劫号龙汉。 次九因重复阳炁，开明赤文，流光敷落，五度开图丹书。 太上以三乘五，三转朱英，合二十四炁，以开南丹天元祖炁，明南方丹光之元，应三阳火王之初。 故南方得三炁以分天境，劫号赤明。 次复九因重积，中黄化元，天纬周缠，梵元乘五。 太上以五五三徊，混阳十二，合五十二炁，以开中黄天元祖炁，明中灵黄华之元，应五阳土王之初。 故中央得一十二炁以分天境，劫号上皇。 次九元复因，素景肇阳，七明焕梵，五纬乘天。 太上以七五三乘，合三十六炁，以开素灵天元祖炁，明西华皓景之元，应七阳金王之初。 故西方得七炁以分天境，劫号延康。 次复九因周竟，混化归本，一炁肇明。
chunks.translated_text:
The Divine Duke is a minister of the Earthly Thearch and an heir of the Great Emperor of Mount Ma. The Horned Dragon is the father of the Great Spirit of the Chen constellation. His position is that of Jade Clarity’s Divine Duke, Supreme Minister of the Great Mystery, styled the Ma-Long Clan, with the personal name Kuo Yi. He universally sweeps away inauspicious forces.

*Strict Eastern Note:* The Divine Duke is the Grand Chancellor of the Great Luo Heaven. Receiving the Heavenly Worthy’s talismanic mandate, he sweeps away demonic essences and malevolent ghosts. The Eight Awes emit venom—*You* script. The Eight Awesome Great Spirits descend when summoned by the incantation, guarding the altar precinct.

The Azure Dragon Great Spirit—*Zhen*;
The White Tiger Great Spirit—*Dui*;
The Vermilion Bird Great Spirit—*Li*;
The Dark Warrior Great Spirit—*Kan*;
The Lion Great Spirit—*Kun*;
The Qiongqi Great Spirit—*Gen*;
The Qilin Great Spirit—*Xun*;
The Pixie Great Spirit—*Qian*.

The Fierce Horses Fourfold—*Wu* script. The Heavenly Horse Great Spirit. The Heavenly Ding lead the vanguard—*Jade Clarity* script. The Mighty Heavenly Ding, the Vanguard Great Spirits. The Master wields the banner—*Chen* script. The Banner-Wielding Demon-Commanding Master. Casting fire ten thousand leagues—*Yin, Li, Wu* scripts raised. The Jade Clarity Fire-Casting Great Spirit General. The Flowing Bells Eightfold—*Shen, Kun, Li, Zhong, Chou, Yin, Mao* scripts raised. The Jade Clarity Flowing Bell Great Spirit.

Should any dare to test, resist, or obstruct the Perfected Ones, the Golden Axe advances to execute—*Jade Clarity* incantation, two fingers extended. The Golden Axe Executioner General. The Mighty Heavenly Queen metes punishment—thumb pressing the roots of the four fingers, all five clenched into a fist. The Mighty Heavenly Queen Punishment General. Slaughtering and dissecting ghostly fiends—right hand forming the Golden Axe incantation, thumb pressing the second, third, and fourth fingers, *Hai* script, little finger straight. The Jade Clarity Slaughter and Dissection Envoys. Wind and fire cease not—left hand four-forked, five fingers, from *Chen* to *Shen*, then *Xun* raised high. The Jade Clarity Wind and Fire Great General. Severing a thousand thousand heads, shearing ten thousand ten thousand forms—root of the middle finger, *Gen* script raised. The Shearing and Severing Ghost-Filth Great Spirit.

Demons dare not trespass; ghosts dare not conjure malevolence. Where there is truth, there is falsehood; where there is goodness, there is evil. Thus, the false can obstruct the true, and evil can destroy the good. By wielding this punitive might, driving out and exterminating, none may dare to trespass.

The above is the main text, wherein the Jade Morning Dao Lord proclaims the affairs of support, defense, sweeping, and purging, and the majestic might of the Jade Clarity’s Great Spirits. The Three Officials of the Northern Feng inspect the ghostly encampments—*Kun, Gao, Zhong, Chou, Yin* scripts raised. The Inspecting Ghostly Encampments Great Spirit. No concealment permitted—the Golden Horse Post presents—from *Wu* wheeling through the twelve branches, raised high to *Wu* script. The Golden Horse Post Presentation Great Spirit. Universally proclaimed without end, all spirits heed—Three Realms, Five Thearchs, deathly words ascend to the Upper Clarity. *Middle World, Second Clarity* incantation, to *Zhen* raised *Dui*, *Kan* center script, then *Upper Clarity* script raised. The Enumerating Words Upper Clarity Recorder.

The Mystic Master says: These are all the Jade Clarity’s Heavenly Generals and Great Spirits, who style themselves the Jade Clarity Numinous Treasure’s Resplendent Offices. They assist the Jade Clarity, transform kalpas and renew epochs, extinguish demons and sweep away calamities, ascend and deliver the disciples of immortal study, inspect the Three Realms, restrain and command ghostly fiends, search out ghostly encampments, purify the Dao’s qi, all as the supporting, defending, sweeping, and purging spirits.

The above main text was bestowed by the Primordial Heavenly Worthy and recorded by the Jade Morning Dao Lord.

**Five Kalpas Opening Transformation, Primordial Cavern Jade Calendar Chapter**

True Yang unfolds transformation; Brahma qi flows freely. The Golden Watchtower stands above; the Jade Treasury resides in the East. Five scripts congeal; nine apertures radiate. Wondrous qi arises naturally, its profound mysteries unfathomable. Three Numinosities share a single thread; ten thousand sages take it as their origin. Examining and verifying cultivation and conduct, inscribing and recording true merit. Form and spirit both accord, merging with the Dao as one. Securely anchoring the imperial registers, enduring for a hundred million kalpas without end.

Of old, in the primordial chaos of Hunyuan, the Great Brahma pervaded the empty expanse. The myriad heavens were undivided; the nine yangs merged in darkness. Three causes, nine revolutions, six transformations, seven cycles—when the Primordial Beginning first took form, the five kalpas began their transformation. Thereupon, the Brahma Primordial Ancestor Morning Dao Lord was commanded to record the Heavenly Origin, riding the five kalpas’ revolutions.

Thus, the *Primordial Cavern* names the ancestral qi. The *Jade Calendar* records the Heavenly Origin. Five kalpas complete a cycle, returning to the One. From the One qi’s transformative division, the Three Causes form the Nine. Like dragons, like serpents, coiling through the nine paths, boundless and infinite, they encompass the primordial qi of the Nine Yangs. The Most High, by the three nines’ Brahma revolutions and the three fives’ primordial cycles, combined forty-two qi to initiate the Green Heaven’s primordial ancestral qi. Illuminating the East’s primordial Green Origin, corresponding to the Nine Yangs’ Wood Sovereign’s inception. Thus, the East obtained nine qi to divide the celestial realm, its kalpa named Dragon Han.

Next, the nine causes repeated, re-accumulating yang qi, unfolding the luminous Red Script. Radiant light scattered and fell, five times unfolding the charts and cinnabar writings. The Most High, by the three fives’ revolutions and the threefold cinnabar flourishing, combined twenty-four qi to initiate the Southern Vermilion Heaven’s primordial ancestral qi. Illuminating the South’s primordial Vermilion Radiance, corresponding to the Three Yangs’ Fire Sovereign’s inception. Thus, the South obtained three qi to divide the celestial realm, its kalpa named Red Clarity.

Next, the nine causes again accumulated, the Central Yellow transforming the Origin. Heavenly wefts coiled and enveloped; Brahma origins rode the five. The Most High, by the five fives’ cycles and the threefold yang revolutions, combined fifty-two qi to initiate the Central Yellow Heaven’s primordial ancestral qi. Illuminating the Central Numinous Yellow Florescence’s Origin, corresponding to the Five Yangs’ Earth Sovereign’s inception. Thus, the Center obtained twelve qi to divide the celestial realm, its kalpa named Supreme Thearch.

Next, the nine origins repeated, the White Radiance inaugurated yang. Seven luminaries illumined Brahma; five wefts rode the heavens. The Most High, by the seven fives’ threefold revolutions, combined thirty-six qi to initiate the White Numinous Heaven’s primordial ancestral qi. Illuminating the West’s primordial White Radiance, corresponding to the Seven Yangs’ Metal Sovereign’s inception. Thus, the West obtained seven qi to divide the celestial realm, its kalpa named Extended Prosperity.

Next, the nine origins completed their cycle, transformation merged and returned to the Origin, the One qi inaugurated illumination.

chunks.original_text: 太上以二五乘十，三积元阳，合三十无，以开北玄天元祖炁，明玄冥上景之元，应一阳水王之初。 故北方得五炁以分天境，劫号开皇。 是以五劫既周，昊天成象，一炁混道，八境流光，三积九乘，八方开景，八帝示形，九霄分化。 故元始天尊命天真皇人以玉历纪元，洞混化之初，劫运流复之本。 诸天分境结元，洞正阳之炁，为玉历以纪天真天民劫运，功积升退之道，明九圣九品之阶。 其诸玄秘，别有《九品仙录经》，具载其详。 五劫五炁： 龙汉始青之炁，青。 赤明丹光之炁，赤。 上皇中灵之炁，黄。 延康素华之炁，白。 开皇元阳之炁。 黑。 东方玉字真文： 龙汉始青，玉历宝章。 开九阳天，元梵华炁。 九阳回妙炁，三景散元精。 碧霭浮灵篆，青林粲淑英。 超遥玉清府，辽邈蓬莱瀛。 真化通 无间，神风滋万生。 南方玉字真文： 赤明丹光，玉历宝章。 开三阳天，元 梵灵炁。 浩劫开神运，龙文泛赤霞。 八威奔电激，九凤破凶邪。 炼度丹皇室，飞升元始家。 炎明常继照，灵庆集晨华。 中央玉字真文： 上皇中灵，玉历宝章。 开五阳天，元梵宝炁。 混黄生一炁，感化结真形。 上德持柔顺，含光洞杳冥。 建中该九极，执本统三辰。 炜烨天端上，飞芒曜玉灵。 西方玉字真文： 延康素灵，玉历宝章。 开七阳天，元梵英炁。 皇老储灵粹，金精曜斗威。 六天咸馘灭，万宝复幽微。 爽气浮高阙，寒光蔼素辉。 空同披玉勒，华丽九霄飞。 北方玉字真文： 开皇玄上，玉历宝章。 开一阳天，元梵混炁。 五炁符元妙，诸天混太冥。 辰精飞羽黑，玉女散华青。 紫策封天宝，玄光凛帝庭。 群魔钦至化，万国保安宁。 元始元量度人上品经法卷之二竟 元始无量度人上品经法卷三

The Most High, by the two fives’ tenfold multiplication, accumulated threefold primordial yang, combining thirty voids to inaugurate the North’s Mysterious Heaven’s primordial ancestral qi. Illuminating the Supreme Dark’s primordial radiance, corresponding to the One Yang’s Water Sovereign’s inception. Thus, the North obtained five qi to divide the celestial realm, its kalpa named Kaihuang.

With the five kalpas complete, the Vast Heaven formed its image. One qi merged with the Dao, eight realms streamed with light. Three accumulations, nine multiplications—eight directions unfurled their radiance. Eight Thearchs manifested their forms, the Nine Empyreans branched into transformations. Thus, the Primordial Celestial Venerable commanded the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign to inscribe the jade chronicle of kalpas, recording the inception of the Cavernous Undifferentiated Transformation and the cyclical origins of kalpic revolutions.

The heavens divided their realms and bound their primordial qi, the Cavernous Upright Yang’s qi forming the jade chronicle to record the kalpic destinies of Heavenly Perfected and Heavenly People, the path of merit’s ascent and retreat, and the nine grades of the Nine Sages. These profound mysteries are detailed in the *Scripture of the Nine Grades of Immortals’ Registers*.

The Five Kalpas and Five Qi:
- Longhan’s Primordial Azure qi: Azure.
- Red Brightness’s Cinnabar Radiance qi: Vermilion.
- Supreme Thearch’s Central Numinous qi: Yellow.
- Extended Prosperity’s Pristine Efflorescence qi: White.
- Kaihuang’s Primordial Yang qi: Black.

Eastern Jade Glyphs of the Perfected Script:
Longhan’s Primordial Azure, Jade Chronicle’s Treasured Chapters.
Inaugurating the Nine Yang Heavens, Primordial Brahma’s Efflorescent qi.
Nine Yangs’ Reverted Wondrous qi, Three Radiance’s Dispersed Primordial Essence.
Verdant mists float the numinous seal-script, Azure groves gleam with refined blossoms.
Transcendent, distant—the Jade Pure Palace, remote—the Penglai and Yingzhou Isles.
Perfected transformations traverse the Unobstructed, divine winds nourish the myriad beings.

Southern Jade Glyphs of the Perfected Script:
Red Brightness’s Cinnabar Radiance, Jade Chronicle’s Treasured Chapters.
Inaugurating the Three Yang Heavens, Primordial Brahma’s Numinous qi.
Vast kalpas unfold divine revolutions, dragon scripts ripple with crimson clouds.
Eight Might surge like lightning, Nine Phoenixes shatter malevolence.
Refining and delivering the Cinnabar Thearch’s chamber, ascending to the Primordial Beginning’s abode.
Fiery brightness perpetually illuminates, numinous blessings gather in the dawn’s splendor.

Central Jade Glyphs of the Perfected Script:
Supreme Thearch’s Central Numinous, Jade Chronicle’s Treasured Chapters.
Inaugurating the Five Yang Heavens, Primordial Brahma’s Treasured qi.
Undifferentiated Yellow engenders the One qi, responsive transformations congeal into true forms.
Supreme virtue upholds gentleness and compliance, containing radiance to penetrate the profound and obscure.
Establishing the Center to encompass the Nine Ultimates, grasping the root to govern the Three Luminaries.
Resplendent at heaven’s apex, flying lusters dazzle the Jade Numinous.

Western Jade Glyphs of the Perfected Script:
Extended Prosperity’s Pristine Numinous, Jade Chronicle’s Treasured Chapters.
Inaugurating the Seven Yang Heavens, Primordial Brahma’s Efflorescent qi.
August Elders store numinous essences, metal essences gleam with the Dipper’s majesty.
Six Heavens are all subdued, the myriad treasures return to the subtle and hidden.
Bracing airs float above lofty gates, frigid lights suffuse pristine radiance.
Empty Unity dons jade reins, resplendent—the Nine Empyreans take flight.

Northern Jade Glyphs of the Perfected Script:
Kaihuang’s Supreme Mysterious, Jade Chronicle’s Treasured Chapters.
Inaugurating the One Yang Heaven, Primordial Brahma’s Undifferentiated qi.
Five qi accord with the primordial wondrous, all heavens merge with the Great Obscurity.
Celestial essences fly with black feathers, Jade Maidens scatter azure blossoms.
Purple tally seals the Heavenly Treasure, mysterious light chills the Thearch’s court.
All demons revere the ultimate transformation, the myriad lands secure peace and tranquility.

chunks.original_text: 太上三五都功职录弟子陈椿荣集注 元洞玉历， 双手玉文，存神为灵宝，真人诵之。 龙汉延康。 眇眇亿劫， 李少微注：此章论劫运成败也。 《龟山元录》曰：元洞，上皇炁也。 天尊结元洞之炁，为玉历之书。 其历以龙汉劫为初劫，开图日赤明劫，终曰延康劫。 循环 无穷，终而复始。 劫终之后三界空坏，万物精爽长在太空，故曰延康为劫坏之称，赤明是开图之名。 二者交周，是谓大劫。 其开皇、上皇，小劫名也。 混沌之中，上无复色，下无复渊，风泽洞虚，金刚乘天。 玄师曰：此天尊说造道开天之本，五劫生成之始也。 李少微注：风泽，第八垒炁也。 风泽之炁，坚刚如金，故曰金刚，亦曰刚风。 劫尽之时，能洞满虚空，承天不坠。 按《九地内音素灵丹经》，地下深亿万里，得润泽地，其炁黄。 又二十亿万里，得大风泽地，其炁紫。 又二十亿万里，得大风泽地，其炁青。 又下 无穷无极无边无际、洞渊纲维地，其炁绿。 皆风梵纲维之，故能擎持地轮，悬而不落。 九垒各有四皇，合三十六皇； 九垒三十六地，上应三十六天。 若学者不知天上内音，则天帝不领兆名； 不知地下内音，则土皇不奏兆籍，终闭而不得仙也。 地下，三十六也。 天上天下，无幽无冥，无形无影，无极无穷，瞑滓大梵，寥廓无光，赤明开图，运度自然。 玉文坎挑。 法曰：此正经六十四字。 流化章 元始安镇，玉文。 敷落五篇。 玉文。 即五文开廓也。 第一篇 五篇符形载大法 明炁发育，木精飞英，仁惠之炁，滋愆万生。 天界地纲，与时皆正。 凝耀神乡，结为青书。 光映万里，号太清九真安化上爱玉符。 第二篇 太丹之炁，衍光洞焕。 飘掷化火，融炼九阴。 赤字凝章，其文甚异。 敷映九亿，精明焕天。 号交神生明玉化之符。 第三篇 黄真之炁，结精飞英； 中央虚落之炁，混沌黄元之精，交流历律，化感生文，光耀万里。 光芒熀煜天端之间，号真皇混丹肃玄符。 第四篇 素威禁炁，流化粹端，飘权耀神，凝结成书。 光映万里，其文甚异。 列明凝芒，威摧万妖。 号八威禁龙，制虎飞英太白玉化之符。 第五篇 玄精发耀，万物滋形，生端不竭，天历有纪。 玉皇上相，高观灵化，接摘玄序，开明天教，册封万帝，玄真感和。 天文敷炳，典约青律，天化大成，凝结玉章。 光映九亿，号明纲玄。 兆太明九化之符。 皇人曰：五篇者，乃元始自然飞英至精虚无混沌之炁，凝结而成玉章，镇於大罗之上。 昔上皇元年，星辰交错，恶曜加临，上犯三天，曾命真梵真人，赍持五篇，付於五帝，以镇天元，以制天政。 又命真如真人，斋持五篇，付於五岳，以镇地纪，以御地祇。 又命妙行真人赍持五篇，付於名山主者，以候成道之士，敷扬教法，下度生死。 五篇之炁，其功甚博，上可以消於天灾，中可以镇安国祚，下可以度於兆民。 如召三界五帝，建诸坛陛，当以土王日青素朱书五篇，以敷落五方，则万灵振伏，以集群仙，召之即至，靡有不从。 详载大法，兹举其略。 赤书玉字，八威龙文。 玉文。 保制劫运，使天长存。 梵炁弥罗，万范开张。 玉文挑。 玄师曰：元始祖炁从何先生玉字？ 按《灵宝玉字经》云：自三炁之先，溟涬之后，其中真精挺生玄炁。 玄炁之内，有神曰元始天王。

The Disciples of the Tai Shang Sanwu Capital Register, Compiled and Annotated by Chen Chunrong:
The Primordial Cavern’s Jade Chronicle, the Jade Script held in both hands, preserved as divine treasure—Perfected Ones recite it.

Dragon Han and Yan Kang.
Vast and boundless, through kalpas uncounted—
Li Shaowei’s note: This chapter discusses the success and failure of kalpic destinies.
The *Guishan Primordial Record* states: The Primordial Cavern is the qi of the Supreme Thearch. The Heavenly Worthy condensed the qi of the Primordial Cavern to compose the Jade Chronicle. Its chronicle begins with the Dragon Han kalpa, opens with the Crimson Brightness kalpa as its inaugural chart, and concludes with the Yan Kang kalpa. Cyclical and endless, it ends only to begin anew. After the kalpa’s end, the Three Realms dissolve and crumble; the essences of the myriad beings abide eternally in the Great Void. Thus, Yan Kang is the designation for the kalpa’s dissolution, while Crimson Brightness is the name of the inaugural chart. The alternation of these two constitutes the Great Kalpa. Kaihuang and Shanghuang are names of lesser kalpas.

Within the primordial chaos, above there was no longer color, below there was no longer abyss. Wind and marsh pervaded the void; the Vajra rode the heavens.
The Mysterious Master said: This is the Heavenly Worthy expounding the fundamental origins of the Dao’s creation and the heavens’ unfolding, the beginning of the Five Kalpas’ formation.
Li Shaowei’s note: Wind and marsh are the qi of the Eighth Stratum. The qi of wind and marsh is firm and unyielding as metal, hence called Vajra, or also Rigid Wind. At the kalpa’s end, it fills the void and upholds the heavens without falling.
According to the *Nine Lands’ Inner Tone and Pure Numinous Elixir Scripture*, beneath the earth lie depths of billions of miles, reaching the Moist Marsh Land, whose qi is yellow. Another twenty billion miles below lies the Great Wind Marsh Land, whose qi is purple. Another twenty billion miles below lies another Great Wind Marsh Land, whose qi is azure. Beyond this, without end, boundless and fathomless, lies the Abyssal Nether Framework Land, whose qi is verdant. All are sustained by the Wind Brahma’s net-like framework, thus upholding the earth’s wheel, suspended without falling. Each of the Nine Strata has Four August Ones, totaling thirty-six August Ones. The Nine Strata and thirty-six lands correspond above to the thirty-six heavens. If scholars do not know the Inner Tone of the heavens above, the Heavenly Thearch will not recognize their names; if they do not know the Inner Tone of the lands below, the Earthly August Ones will not record their registers, and they will remain forever barred from attaining immortality. Below the earth, there are thirty-six. Between heaven above and earth below, there is no darkness, no obscurity, no form, no shadow, no limit, no end. The vast Brahma’s murkiness, boundless and lightless—then Crimson Brightness opens the chart, and the workings of salvation proceed naturally.

The Jade Script’s Kan Trigram.
The Dharma states: These are the sixty-four characters of the true scripture.

**Chapter of Flowing Transformations**
The Primordial Beginning securely establishes, the Jade Script.
Unfolds and scatters the Five Chapters.
The Jade Script.
These are the Five Scriptures that open the vastness.

**First Chapter**
The Five Chapters’ talismanic forms bear the Great Dharma.
Luminous qi germinates and nurtures; the essence of wood takes flight as blossoms. The qi of benevolence and kindness nourishes the myriad lives’ transgressions. Heaven’s boundaries and earth’s frameworks align with the seasons, all in rectitude. Radiance congeals in the divine realm, coalescing into the Azure Script. Its light illumines ten thousand miles, called the *Tai Qing Nine Perfected’s Peaceful Transformation and Supreme Loving Jade Talisman*.

**Second Chapter**
The Great Cinnabar’s qi extends its brilliance, pervading and resplendent. Drifting and scattering, it transforms into fire, smelting the Nine Yin. Crimson characters congeal into chapters, their script most wondrous. Its effulgence shines across nine hundred million, its essence bright and resplendent in the heavens. Called the *Intertwining Spirits’ Life-Brightening Jade Transformation Talisman*.

**Third Chapter**
The Yellow Perfected’s qi coalesces essence and scatters blossoms. The qi of the Central Void’s emptiness, the primordial chaos’ Yellow Origin’s essence, intermingle and flow through the pitch-pipes, transforming and resonating to engender script. Its light blazes ten thousand miles. Radiance and splendor blaze between the heavens’ ends, called the *True August’s Primal Cinnabar and Solemn Mysterious Talisman*.

**Fourth Chapter**
The Pure Might’s restraining qi flows and transforms into purity’s essence. Drifting authority illumines the spirits, congealing into script. Its light shines ten thousand miles, its script most wondrous. Arrayed brilliance congeals into radiance, its might crushing the myriad demons. Called the *Eight Might’s Dragon-Restraining, Tiger-Subduing, Flying Blossom’s Grand White Jade Transformation Talisman*.

**Fifth Chapter**
Mysterious essence radiates, the myriad beings take form. The wellspring of life is inexhaustible; the celestial chronicle has its records. The Jade Thearch’s High Minister, gazing upon the numinous transformations, gathers and selects the mysterious sequence, unfolding and illuminating the Heavenly Teachings. Investing the myriad Thearchs, the Mysterious Perfected resonates in harmony. Heavenly script unfolds in splendor, its canons bound by the Azure Pitch-Pipe. The great transformations of heaven reach completion, congealing into Jade Chapters. Its light shines across nine hundred million, called the *Luminous Net’s Mysterious Nine Transformations’ Grand Bright Talisman*.

The August One said: The Five Chapters are the Primordial Beginning’s naturally arising flying blossoms, the utmost essence of the Void’s primordial chaos’ qi, congealed into Jade Chapters, established above the Great Luo. In the first year of the Supreme Thearch, when stars and constellations clashed and malevolent omens descended, trespassing upon the Three Heavens, the Perfected Brahma Perfected One was commanded to bear the Five Chapters and bestow them upon the Five Thearchs to secure the celestial origin and govern celestial administration. The True Suchness Perfected One was further commanded to fast and uphold the Five Chapters, bestowing them upon the Five Marchmounts to secure the earth’s records and govern the earthly spirits. The Wondrous Conduct Perfected One was commanded to bear the Five Chapters and bestow them upon the masters of the renowned mountains, to await those who attain the Dao, to propagate the teachings and deliver beings from life and death. The qi of the Five Chapters’ efficacy is vast: above, it can dispel celestial calamities; in the middle, it can secure and pacify the nation’s mandate; below, it can deliver the multitudes. When summoning the Five Thearchs of the Three Realms and establishing altars and terraces, on the day of the earth’s sovereign, one should inscribe the Five Chapters in azure, white, and vermilion, unfolding them in the five directions. Then the myriad spirits will tremble and submit, gathering the host of immortals—summoned, they will arrive without fail. The detailed accounts of the Great Dharma are recorded here in brief.

The Crimson Script’s Jade Characters, the Eight Might’s Dragon Script.
The Jade Script.
Preserves and governs the kalpic destinies, ensuring the heavens endure eternally. The Brahma qi pervades the Luo; the myriad patterns unfold and expand.

The Mysterious Master said: From whence did the Primordial Beginning’s ancestral qi first engender the Jade Characters?
According to the *Numinous Treasure Jade Characters Scripture*: Before the Three Qi, after the primordial darkness, within it the true essence arose and the mysterious qi was born. Within the mysterious qi, there was a spirit called the Primordial Beginning Heavenly King.

Its qi congealed and coalesced, born coeval with the Primordial Beginning, flowing and transforming to crystallize fragrance—neither form nor appearance, now unfurling, now expanding. When the kalpa of Extended Prosperity dawned, the One Qi divided its form to become the Two Qi, and from the spontaneous void arose the Qi of the Beginning. The Two Qi condensed and solidified in the Great Void, suffusing and veiling the boundless; each character measured a zhang square, its eight corners trailing radiance—none could fathom its principle. The Two Qi, chaotic and undifferentiated, enveloped and concealed the Jade Characters.

When the kalpa of Dragon Han opened, the Primordial Beginning Heavenly King apportioned the Two Qi, and the chaos first parted: the qi, pure and loftily limpid, formed heaven; the qi, descending and amassing, congealed into earth. From the division and union of the Two Qi arose the Harmonious Qi between them, named the Primordial Qi, also called the Great Brahma Qi.

When the kalpa of Crimson Clarity dawned, the Primordial Beginning unfolded the chart, and within it the True Yang Qi transformed into the Cavernous Yang Fire. The Primordial Beginning wielded the Cavernous Yang Fire to smelt and blend the Three Qi, fusing them with the Jade Characters to forge the Crimson Script. Thus the kalpa was named Crimson Clarity, and the script was called the Crimson Script’s Jade Characters.

Once the Three Qi formed the script, the fire refined it into the Crimson Script. The luminous qi and the essence of solar yang became the sun; the essence of numinous yang formed the moon; the residual radiance scattered and dispersed to become the myriad phenomena. The spirits of the Three Qi divided to become the Three Clarities’ sages.

Thereafter, the myriad patterns all emerged, the myriad beings all arose—none but the mysterious Primordial Beginning’s Three Qi. When the kalpa of Open Sovereignty dawned, the Three Qi were apportioned to engender the host of sages; when the kalpa of Supreme Antiquity arrived, the five kalpas unfolded as one, the Five Phases attained full form, and the myriad heavens were engendered. Within the span of the five kalpas, the essence of the Mysterious Center was produced, and within that essence, the spirit—hence the kalpa of Supreme Antiquity.

After the five kalpas opened and transformed, the *Scriptures of Jade Clarity’s Cavernous Perfection*, the *Scriptures of Highest Clarity’s Cavernous Mystery*, the *Scriptures of Grand Clarity’s Cavernous Spirit*, the Three Caverns’ scriptures, and the Four Auxiliary talismans—all arose from the transformation of the Crimson Script’s Jade Characters, formed by receiving the qi of the Numinous Treasure, refined by fire into script, becoming the Crimson Script’s Jade Characters.

Thereafter, the Primordial Beginning commanded the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign to inscribe its text, naming it the *Eight Might’s Dragon Script*, also called the *Script of the Eight Assemblies of the Myriad Heavens*. It was secreted within the Seven-Treasure Jeweled Terrace of the Highest Clarity’s Mysterious Capital, the Golden Chamber of the Purple Tenuity’s Supreme Palace, the Orchid Hall of the Eastern and Western Floral Halls, and the Mansion of the Nine Heavens’ Grand Auroral Radiance.

chunks.original_text: 《二十八宿袂》：东七宿自辰上起角、亢，左行卯上氐、房、心，寅上尾、箕挑。 北七宿自丑上起斗、牛，子上女、虚、危，亥上室、壁挑。 西七宿自戌上起奎、娄，酉上胃、昴、毕，申上觜、参挑。 南七宿自未上起井、鬼，午上柳、星、张，巳上真、轸挑。 输转无色，周回十方； 旋斗历箕， 自丑至子文上四指，中大过中指、中文复至丑文，从子历亥，循至寅文挑。 回度五常， 金木水火土五星也。 三十五分。 日月五星、二十八宿是也。 总炁上元，坎兑离震中文，斜抹至亥文挑。 元纲者，元炁之纲也。 明此梵炁演布三十二天，轮转无色之境，周匝十 方，自斗罡左旋，经历箕星，回运日月五星、二十八宿之分，总入上元金阙之门。 《龟山丹皇紫文空洞灵章》曰：紫炁左回与斗连，历度四七入金门。 明於《元纲流演》图中。 八景冥合，炁入玄玄。 冥合玉清八景之天炁，入玄中之玄，大梵天中之天也。 元纲流演法 玄师曰：西龟之山，一曰龙山，言木之道也。 金母居之，言金之体也。 乃九炁之根纽，人之九宫之根也。 纽，黄炁之渊府，乃梵炁之宫上之正府也。 在天西北亥子之地，婴孩之生根也。 周回四千万里，是不知其极，出常数度量之外也。 高与玉清连界，上通脑也。 脉通玉帝宫，东南接丹阳之霞，上承青宫神虎之门，接通肺炁也。 又与大胃交通矣。 西北交寒穴之野，上通金阙神仙之庭。 与肾宫便穴交炁也。 南极太丹浮黎之乡，炁协洞阳之光，协於心也。 北指勾陈，交关华盖，炁践广灵，践中黄宫，中央上冲玉京。 二十四节，重楼十二也。 八达交锋，平天三十万里，三炁之会也。 涌金为培，结玉为门，真土玉液之阙也。 金台玉楼，同前议也。 九宫三田，十二神室也。 上有流精紫阙、金华之堂，琼瑶之室，傍通五穴，即是集五脏之精会门也。 有自然紫云之炁，交带凤文，九色落陈，四肢八脉、五脏六腑； 赤华紫英，五内生炁也。 崖生紫桂，岭秀琼林，结瑚为条，植玉为根，骞林含实，赤紫白环，炁行 无庇而生此宝也。 三华曜葩於朱景，返香流芳於太玄，内视三明，五香生五炁也。 八炁扇飕以长鼓，玉籁空唱而成音，内之无器之音也。 龙嗥云楼，凤啸绝岭，毒默万罗，长蛇千寻，神宫堂堂，仙灵纷纷，巍巍元馆，触类吐津，盖元始之妙化，实天元之灵根。 此即大行梵炁周回十方也。 与东向诵经位次图向背不同。 元纲流演图 南北朝元 又法曰：元纲流演，比喻人身与天流演者，同人之元炁，发自明堂宫，右肾命门，上为九天之根，属西北乾方纽。 太渊府黄炁上入於心，心属火，绛宫左旋，流循脑后风门玉枕宫，循入左目日宫，右旋下历东北箕宿、足少阴大指，流转一身，周回一匝。 旋转右肩，系 无色界； 缠入右目月宫，然后回度五常，从三十五分脊骨流入下丹田左肾水宫，冲入肝木，缠脾土中丹田，次过肺金宫，从十二重楼喉管通至泥丸宫上丹田囟门灵谷，总出上元，所谓上通金阙之庭。 三宫升降，上下往来 无穷不息。 盖人以经络炁周於一身，一日一夜百刻之中，呼吸升降，计一万三千五百息，大会於风府者也。 脉属阴，阴行速，犹太阴一月一周天，息属阳，阳行迟，犹太阳一年一周天，如人之息脉元炁，则应天之常度也。

**Twenty-Eighth Lunar Mansion Mantle**

The eastern seven mansions begin at *chen* with Horn and Neck, proceeding leftward to Root, Chamber, and Heart at *mao*, then Tail and Winnowing Basket at *yin*. The northern seven mansions commence at *chou* with Dipper and Ox, passing through Girl, Void, and Rooftop at *zi*, then House and Wall at *hai*. The western seven mansions arise at *xu* with Straddler and Bond, continuing to Stomach, Mane, and Net at *you*, then Turtle Beak and Triaster at *shen*. The southern seven mansions initiate at *wei* with Well and Ghost, advancing to Willow, Star, and Spread at *wu*, then Wings and Chariot at *si*.

Revolving without color, they cycle through the ten directions; the Dipper pivots past the Winnowing Basket, from *chou* to *zi* along the upper four fingers, crossing the middle finger’s great joint, then returning to *chou* via the central line. From *zi* through *hai*, it traces to *yin*’s end. The revolutions govern the Five Constants—Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, and Earth—the five planets. Thirty-five divisions: the sun, moon, five planets, and twenty-eight mansions.

The primordial qi ascends to the Upper Origin, where Kan, Dui, Li, and Zhen converge at the central line, slanting to *hai*’s end. The *Primordial Net* is the warp of primordial qi. It clarifies how the Brahman qi unfolds across the thirty-two heavens, wheeling through the formless realm, encircling the ten directions. From the Dipper’s handle, it spirals leftward, traversing the Winnowing Basket, revolving the sun, moon, five planets, and twenty-eight mansions’ divisions, all converging at the Golden Gate of the Upper Origin.

The *Tortoise Mountain’s Cinnabar Sovereign’s Purple Text of the Cavernous Numinous Chapter* states:
*"The purple qi revolves leftward, linking with the Dipper,
Passing through the four sevens to enter the Golden Gate."*
This is illustrated in the *Primordial Net’s Unfolding* diagram.

The Eight Effulgences merge in darkness, qi entering the Mystery within Mystery—the Heaven within the Great Brahman Heaven. The dark union of the Jade Clarity’s Eight Effulgences’ celestial qi enters the Mystery within Mystery, the Heaven within the Great Brahman Heaven.

**Method of the Primordial Net’s Unfolding**

The Mystic Master says: The Western Tortoise Mountain, also called Dragon Mountain, signifies the Dao of Wood. The Metal Mother dwells there, embodying the essence of Metal. It is the root of the Nine Qi, the foundation of humanity’s Nine Palaces. The pivot is the Yellow Qi’s abyssal府, the true palace of Brahman qi. Located in the heavens’ northwest, at *hai* and *zi*, it is the root of the Infant’s birth. Spanning four million *li* in circumference, its limits defy measure, transcending ordinary numerical bounds.

Its height borders the Jade Clarity, ascending to the brain. Its meridians connect to the Jade Emperor’s Palace, its southeast touching the Cinnabar Yang’s radiance, above linking to the Azure Palace’s Divine Tiger Gate, joining the lung qi. It also communicates with the Great Stomach. To the northwest, it intersects the Cold Cavern’s wilderness, ascending to the Golden Gate’s immortal courtyard, exchanging qi with the kidney palace’s vital orifice. At the southern pole lies the Great Cinnabar’s Floating Black Realm, its qi harmonizing with the Cavern Yang’s light, aligning with the heart. Northward, it points to the Curved Array, interlocking with the Flowery Canopy, its qi treading the Vast Spirit, traversing the Yellow Palace, and centrally surging upward to the Jade Capital.

The twenty-four solar terms correspond to the twelve-storied tower. Eight pathways intersect, spanning three hundred thousand *li* of the Level Heaven—the convergence of the Three Qi. Gold wells forth as mounds, jade coalesces into gates, the true earth’s Jade Fluid Palace. The Golden Terrace and Jade Tower share the prior discussion. The Nine Palaces and Three Fields form the Twelve Spirit Chambers. Above flow the Purple Effulgence’s radiant palace, the Golden Flower’s hall, and the Jasper Jade’s chamber, flanked by five orifices—the convergence gate of the five viscera’s essences.

Naturally arising purple clouds interweave with phoenix-script patterns, nine-colored cascades arrayed. They permeate the four limbs, eight vessels, five viscera, and six bowels; crimson blossoms and purple florets generate the five internal qi. Cliffs birth purple cassia, ridges flourish with jasper groves, coral branches intertwine, jade roots take hold. The *Qian* grove bears fruit—crimson, purple, and white rings—its qi circulating without shelter to engender these treasures.

The Three Flowers bloom in the vermilion radiance, returning fragrance to flow through the Great Mystery. Inward vision illuminates the Three Luminaries, the Five Fragrances generating the Five Qi. The Eight Qi fan the winds with ceaseless drumming, jade pipes chant emptily to form sound—the sound of the inner void. Dragons roar in cloud towers, phoenixes cry on perilous ridges. Serpents of ten thousand fathoms coil in silence, divine palaces stand majestic, immortals swarm in profusion. Towering primordial halls exude sweet dew, manifesting the wondrous transformations of the Primordial Beginning, the true spiritual root of the Celestial Origin. This is the Great Brahman Qi’s circulation through the ten directions, distinct from the eastward-facing recitation position’s orientation.

**Primordial Net’s Unfolding Diagram**
*Northern and Southern Dynasties Yuan*

Another method states: The Primordial Net’s unfolding, likened to the human body’s correspondence with heaven’s flow, shares humanity’s primordial qi. It emanates from the Hall of Light Palace, the right kidney’s Gate of Life, ascending as the root of the Nine Heavens, belonging to the northwest *qian* direction’s pivot. The Great Abyss’s yellow qi ascends into the heart—Fire’s domain—revolving leftward through the Crimson Palace, flowing behind the brain’s Wind Gate and Jade Pillow Palace, then entering the left eye’s Sun Palace. Spiraling rightward, it descends past the northeast’s Winnowing Basket Mansion and the lesser yin of the foot’s great toe, circulating the body in a full cycle. Revolving around the right shoulder, it binds the Formless Realm, coiling into the right eye’s Moon Palace. Thereafter, it traverses the Five Constants, flowing from the thirty-five divisions of the spine into the lower cinnabar field’s left kidney Water Palace, surging into the liver Wood, coiling through the spleen Earth’s middle cinnabar field, then passing the lung Metal Palace. From the twelve-storied tower of the throat, it ascends through the Muddy Pellet Palace’s upper cinnabar field to the Fontanel Gate’s Spirit Valley, ultimately emerging at the Upper Origin—the so-called ascent to the Golden Gate’s courtyard.

The Three Palaces rise and descend, circulating endlessly. For humans, the meridians’ qi cycles through the body: in one day and night’s hundred *ke*, with 13,500 breaths of ascent and descent, they converge at the Wind Mansion. The vessels belong to yin, yin’s movement swift—like the Greater Yin’s monthly celestial cycle. Breath pertains to yang, yang’s movement slow—like the Greater Yang’s yearly celestial cycle. Thus, humanity’s breath, vessels, and primordial qi align with heaven’s constant measures.

chunks.original_text: 阴阳顺则流演循度，阴阳和则天和，咏息和则人和也。 契玄章 玄中太皇、上帝高真， 玄师曰：玄中太皇者，此西元王母八景玄妙之祖炁，亦曰丹皇君，乃上帝之道君，上皇之圣真。 泛景太霞，啸咏洞章。 居西元太霞之府，啸咏空洞灵章以生其万炁也。 金真朗郁，流响云营。 左手执金真玉光，右手掷流金火铃，流响三十五天天中云营。 玉音摄黑，灵风聚烟。 紫虚郁秀，辅翼万仙。 玉音摄高上之炁，灵风聚辟非之烟，紫景蔚秀太虚，万仙辅翼朝宗，乃大洞回风混合秘诀。 成真章 千和万合，自然成真。 玉文。 薛幽栖注：言修真之人，千真和神，万道合炁，真与神混体，道与炁合形，自然成真也。 真中有神：长生大君，子文。 度命君也。 在脐下命门宫，讳天真液，字飞生上英，绛衣，元始状。 严东注：字吁员。 李少微注：字曰吁育。 无英公子，丑未。 肝神也。 在肝制三魂也。 又号元灵素君，讳玄玄，字合符，紫衣，莲花冠。 白元尊神，寅申。 肺神也。 在肺拘七魄也。 又号白元洞阳君，讳郁灵标，字玄夷绝。 素衣，莲花冠。 薛幽栖注：无英、白元二神，居洞房宫，宫在眉间直入二寸。 无英亦时在肝，白元亦时在肺。 太一 卯酉 太一在脑，总众神也，为身中百灵之尊，众神万炁之主，故称太一。 讳务猷收，字归会昌。 又曰太一真讳规英，字化元。 如婴儿形，黑上而赤下，衣上紫绣下紫锦，坐金床与玉帐。 右手执北极之星，左手执北斗，头戴通天之冠，腰带流金之火铃。 司命 辰戌， 上帝司命也。 在心主炁，纳生元也。 讳理明初，字玄度卿，其形白上而青下，面圆正等，黄衣、芙蓉冠，元始状。 桃康 巳亥。 合延 午。

When yin and yang flow in harmony, their currents follow the proper measures; when yin and yang unite, heaven attains harmony; when chanting and breath harmonize, humanity attains harmony.

**Contracting the Mysterious Chapter**
Within the Mysterious, the Supreme August One and the Lofty Perfected of the Highest Emperor—
The Mystical Master says: The Supreme August One within the Mysterious is the primordial qi of the Queen Mother of the West’s Eight Radiant Wonders, also called the Cinnabar August Lord. He is the Dao Lord of the Highest Emperor and the Sage Perfected of the Supreme August One. His vast radiance suffuses the great rosy clouds; his chanted verses resound through the Cavernous Chapters. Dwelling in the Palace of the Great Rosy Clouds of the Western Origin, he chants the empty and cavernous numinous verses to generate the myriad qi. His Golden Perfection shines resplendent, his flowing echoes traverse the cloud camps of the thirty-five heavens. The Jade Tone seizes the blackness, the numinous wind gathers the mists. The Purple Void flourishes in luxuriance, aiding and sheltering the ten thousand immortals. The Jade Tone seizes the qi of the highest realms, the numinous wind gathers the smoke of the demon-repelling mists. The purple radiance luxuriates in the Great Void, the ten thousand immortals aid and attend in audience—this is the secret formula of the Great Cavern’s revolving wind and coalescing fusion.

**Accomplishing Perfection Chapter**
A thousand harmonies, ten thousand unions—naturally accomplishing perfection.
Jade Script.
Xue Youqi’s commentary: It speaks of the cultivator of perfection: a thousand truths harmonize with spirit, ten thousand ways unite with qi. Truth merges with spirit in substance, the Way unites with qi in form—naturally accomplishing perfection.

Within perfection dwells spirit: the Great Lord of Longevity, *Ziwen*.
The Lord Who Delivers Destiny. Residing in the Life Gate Palace below the navel, his taboo name is Heavenly Perfect Fluid, his style is Soaring Life’s Supreme Flower. He wears crimson robes, in the form of the Primordial Beginning.

Yan Dong’s commentary: His style is *Xuyuan*.
Li Shaowei’s commentary: His style is *Xuyu*.

The Valiant Lord of Non-Being, *Chou-Wei*.
The spirit of the liver. Governing the Three Hun within the liver. Also called the Primordial Numinous Plain Lord, his taboo name is *Xuanxuan*, his style is *Hefu*. He wears purple robes and a lotus-flower crown.

The Venerable White Prime, *Yin-Shen*.
The spirit of the lungs. Governing the Seven Po within the lungs. Also called the White Prime Cavern Yang Lord, his taboo name is *Yulingbiao*, his style is *Xuanyijue*. He wears plain robes and a lotus-flower crown.

Xue Youqi’s commentary: The two spirits, Valiant Lord and White Prime, reside in the Cavern Chamber Palace, located two inches directly inward from the space between the eyebrows. The Valiant Lord also dwells at times in the liver, the White Prime also at times in the lungs.

**Grand Unity**
*Mao-You*. The Grand Unity resides in the brain, governing all spirits. He is the honored one among the hundred numina of the body, the master of the myriad spirits and ten thousand qi—thus called the Grand Unity. His taboo name is *Wuyoushou*, his style is *Guihuichang*. Also called the True Taboo Name of the Grand Unity is *Guiying*, his style is *Huayuan*. His form is like that of an infant, black above and red below. He wears upper purple embroidery and lower purple brocade, seated upon a golden bed within a jade canopy. In his right hand he grasps the North Culmen star, in his left the Northern Dipper. Upon his head he wears the Heaven-Piercing Crown, at his waist the Flowing Gold Fire Bells.

**Controller of Destiny**
*Chen-Xu*. The Controller of Destiny of the Highest Emperor. Residing in the heart to govern qi, he receives the primordial of life. His taboo name is *Limingchu*, his style is *Xuanduqing*. His form is white above and blue-green below, his face round and perfectly balanced. He wears yellow robes and a lotus-flower crown, in the form of the Primordial Beginning.

**Peach Vitality**
*Si-Hai*. **Joined Longevity**
*Wu*.

chunks.original_text: 两肾之神也。 桃康住脐，保精根也。 号合会神，姓桃，讳康。 紫衣，莲花冠，执长生玉箓在左下。 合延居肾，守命门也。 号命门君，亦姓桃，讳回孩，字合精。 朱衣，芙蓉冠，执天皇象符在右下。 桃康、合延二神，讳字乃交互而言，非的正也。 存思图 执符把箓，保命生根。 并执兆玉符玉箓，保兆命元生根。 上游上清，出入华房。 上清布三华离便之房，以内言之，身中华房心也。 八冥之内， 八脉冥会也。 细微之中， 细微之中以通元炁。 下镇人身，泥丸 脑也 绛宫 心也， 此诸真神以太一为主，皆是上清太微宫中之神也。 分释降炁，下入人身之中，故时复上游上清，出入三华之房，大包八极，细入毫芒，下镇人身，则或在泥丸，或处绛官。 玄师曰：太一含华如莲。 太一之房莲华未开。 太一含华之图 心包八脉上通九色内含五彩太一含华如莲 玄师曰：上清者，心之华房也。 太一含华，其形自然，太一元君居之，如莲华之房，心未开之。 丹华入冥者，身有八脉，冥会之处，尽总於心也。 细微之中，以通元炁，同注泉源之所也。 如草木肢脉，比人身赤文血脉之道路，一体经络之荣卫也。 中理五炁，混合百神。 玄师曰：中理五炁者，理五神之妙炁於中元五炁之中，百神混合於内也。 大洞回风混合之法。 十转回灵，万炁齐仙。 万炁者，万神也。 天尊说经十遍，天开为之十转，则回百灵以成性，变万炁以俱仙。 玄师曰：十转之法，天尊十遍说经，五行生成之道也。 先五遍则得五行之生数，聋盲喑哑，跛痾痼疾，痊愈复形。 后五遍则得五行成数，乃至圣胎疑灵，回骸起死，桔骨变仙，更生成人也。 详载大法。 此二章乃灵中之灵，宝中之宝，上品之首。 所谓玉晨道君云受元始度人无量上品者，是斯也。 街华章 仙道贵生，无量度人。 上开八门，飞天法轮。 罪福禁戒，宿命因终。 八方法轮之门中，有罪福之场，各有禁戒，宿命因缘事迹，具载《法轮经》。 普受开度，死魂生身。 身得受生，上闻诸天。 诸天之上，各有生门。 《权道图》云：开门，人道，乾宫，通天之绛宫； 休门，释道，坎宫，通天之明堂； 生门，仙．道，艮宫，通天之玉堂。 此三门在三天之上，吉道也。 出之遇福。 死门，鬼道，坤宫，与死炁相通； 杜门，业道，巽宫，入死户。 伤门，地狱道，震宫； 惊门，畜生道，兑宫。 此二门乃二炁交分之路。 景门，神道，离宫，在阳炁终绝之地。 然此八门，有吉有凶，凶则死户，吉则生门，故经云诸天之上，各有生门。 虽凶门亦有通天受生之吉道。 已上正文，元始天尊所说，玉晨道君纪录。 三界章 中有空洞谣歌之章，魔王灵篇，辞参高真。 此玉晨道君纪述。 第一欲界飞空之音： 欲界六天，自皇曾天至魔夷天也。 中有魔王，讳郁默，作飞空之歌。 欲界最居下位，故云第一。 人道眇眇，仙道莽莽。 鬼道乐兮，当人生门。 天道贵生，鬼道贵终。 仙道常自吉，鬼道常自凶。 高上清灵爽，悲歌朗太空。 唯愿仙道成，不欲人道穷。 北都泉曲府，中有万鬼群。 但欲遏人算，断截人命门。 阿人歌洞章，以摄北罗酆。 束送妖魔精，斩馘六鬼峰。 薛幽栖注：断首曰斩，截耳曰馘。 酆山有六峰，峰各一宫，既有六宫，故云六鬼峰。
chunks.translated_text:
The Deities of the Two Kidneys
**Peach Vitality** resides in the navel to safeguard the root of essence. His title is *Joined Confluence Spirit*; his surname is *Tao*, his taboo name *Kang*. He wears purple robes and a lotus-flower crown, holding the *Jade Register of Longevity* in his lower left.

**Joined Longevity** dwells in the kidneys to guard the Gate of Life. His title is *Lord of the Gate of Life*; his surname is also *Tao*, his taboo name *Huichai*, his style *Joined Essence*. He wears vermilion robes and a lotus-flower crown, holding the *Heavenly August Talisman* in his lower right.

The taboo names and styles of *Peach Vitality* and *Joined Longevity* are spoken of interchangeably and are not their true designations.

**Visualization Diagram**
Grasping talismans and holding registers, they preserve life and secure its root. Together they hold the *Jade Talisman of the Omen* and the *Jade Register*, safeguarding the primordial root of the omen’s life. Ascending to the Upper Clarity, they enter and exit the Flower Chamber. The Upper Clarity spreads the Three Flowers in the Chamber of Separation and Convenience. Inwardly speaking, the Flower Chamber within the body is the heart. Within the Eightfold Darkness—where the eight vessels darkly converge—and amid the subtlest of subtleties, they penetrate the primordial qi. Below, they stabilize the human body: *Mud Pill* (the brain) and *Crimson Palace* (the heart). These perfected deities, with the Great One as their sovereign, are all gods of the Upper Clarity’s Grand Tenuity Palace. They descend in differentiated effulgences, entering the human body, and thus at times ascend again to the Upper Clarity, entering and exiting the Three Flower Chambers. Vastly encompassing the Eight Poles, minutely penetrating the finest filaments, they stabilize the human body, now in the *Mud Pill*, now in the *Crimson Palace*.

The *Mysterious Master* says: The Great One contains the flower like a lotus. The chamber of the Great One is the unopened lotus blossom.

**Diagram of the Great One Containing the Flower**
The pericardium embraces the eight vessels, ascending to connect with the Nine Colors and inwardly containing the Five Hues. The Great One contains the flower like a lotus.

The *Mysterious Master* says: The Upper Clarity is the Flower Chamber of the heart. The Great One containing the flower takes its form naturally; the Primordial Lady of the Great One resides within it, like the chamber of a lotus blossom before it opens. When the cinnabar flower enters the darkness, the body possesses eight vessels, and where they darkly converge is wholly gathered in the heart. Amid the subtlest of subtleties, they penetrate the primordial qi, all converging at the source of the spring.

Like the veins and vessels of plants and trees, they are comparable to the red-textured blood vessels of the human body—the pathways of the unified network of meridians and protective qi. Within, they order the Five Qi and blend the Hundred Spirits.

The *Mysterious Master* says: "Ordering the Five Qi within" means arranging the wondrous qi of the Five Spirits within the Five Qi of the Central Primordial, blending the Hundred Spirits internally. This is the method of the *Great Cavern’s Revolving Wind Blending*.

**Ten Revolutions Returning the Spirit, Myriad Qi Ascending as Immortals**
The *Myriad Qi* are the myriad spirits. When the Heavenly Worthy expounds the scripture ten times, Heaven opens to make the Ten Revolutions, thereby returning the Hundred Spirits to complete nature and transforming the Myriad Qi to ascend together as immortals.

The *Mysterious Master* says: The method of the Ten Revolutions is the Heavenly Worthy expounding the scripture ten times—the Dao of the Five Phases’ generation and completion. The first five expoundings yield the generative numbers of the Five Phases, curing deafness, blindness, muteness, lameness, chronic illnesses, and restoring form. The latter five expoundings yield the completion numbers of the Five Phases, even forming the sacred embryo and numinous spirit, reviving the dead from their bones, transforming skeletons into immortals, and regenerating to become human again. This is detailed in the Great Method.

These two chapters are the spirit within spirit, the treasure within treasure, the foremost of the Upper Grade. What the *Jade Dawn Dao Lord* received from the *Primordial Beginning* as the *Upper Scripture of Limitless Salvation of Humanity* is precisely this.

**Flowering Petals Chapter**
The immortal Dao values life, endlessly saving humanity. Above, it opens the Eight Gates and the Flying Heavenly Dharma Wheel. Sin and fortune have their prohibitions; karmic destinies have their causes and ends. Within the Eightfold Dharma Wheel’s gates lie the realms of sin and fortune, each with its prohibitions, and the traces of karmic destinies are fully recorded in the *Dharma Wheel Scripture*. Universally receiving liberation, the dead soul revives in a body. The body attains rebirth and ascends to be heard by the various heavens. Above the various heavens, each has its Gate of Life.

The *Authority Dao Diagram* states: The *Open Gate* is the human Dao, the *Qian* Palace, connecting to the *Crimson Palace* of Heaven. The *Rest Gate* is the Dao of the Śramaṇa, the *Kan* Palace, connecting to the *Hall of Brightness* of Heaven. The *Life Gate* is the immortal Dao, the *Gen* Palace, connecting to the *Jade Hall* of Heaven. These three gates are above the Three Heavens and are auspicious paths. Exiting through them brings fortune.

The *Death Gate* is the ghostly Dao, the *Kun* Palace, connecting to the qi of death. The *Closed Gate* is the karmic Dao, the *Xun* Palace, entering the Door of Death. The *Injury Gate* is the hellish Dao, the *Zhen* Palace. The *Alarm Gate* is the animal Dao, the *Dui* Palace. These two gates are the paths where the two qi intersect and divide. The *View Gate* is the spirit Dao, the *Li* Palace, at the place where the yang qi ends and perishes.

Now, these Eight Gates have both auspicious and inauspicious aspects. The inauspicious are the Doors of Death, while the auspicious are the Gates of Life. Thus, the scripture says: Above the various heavens, each has its Gate of Life. Even the inauspicious gates have auspicious paths leading to Heaven and rebirth.

The above main text was spoken by the *Primordial Heavenly Worthy* and recorded by the *Jade Dawn Dao Lord*.

**Three Realms Chapter**
Within are the *Empty Cavern Ballad* and the *Demon King’s Numinous Chapter*, their verses interwoven with the lofty perfected. This was recorded by the *Jade Dawn Dao Lord*.

**First: The Flying Air Melody of the Desire Realm**
The six heavens of the Desire Realm, from the *Royal Zeng* Heaven to the *Māra Barbarian* Heaven, contain a demon king named *Yumo*, who sings the *Flying Air Melody*. The Desire Realm occupies the lowest position, hence it is called the first.

The human Dao is distant and faint, the immortal Dao vast and boundless.
The ghostly Dao delights—ah!—in the human Gate of Life.
The heavenly Dao values life, the ghostly Dao values endings.
The immortal Dao is ever auspicious, the ghostly Dao ever inauspicious.
The lofty, pure, and numinous soar, chanting sorrowful songs in the great void.
I only wish the immortal Dao to succeed, not the human Dao to be exhausted.
The Northern Capital’s *Spring Curve* Prefecture holds a myriad ghostly hosts,
All desiring to cut short human destinies and sever the Gate of Life.

chunks.original_text: 六宫名见前章北都罗酆注。 李少微注：作锋。 六天，鬼贼也。 锋言其先锋。 锋，锐也。 诸天炁荡荡，我道日兴隆。 第二色界魔王之章： 自越衡天至昙誓天，凡一十八天为色界，谓在欲界之上，故云第二。 魔王讳摩罗。 落落高张， 二十八宿也。 明炁四骞。 光华如此也。 梵行诸天，周回十方。 二＋八宿诀。 元纲流演之法也。 元量大神，皆由我身，我有洞章， 诵洞章法，按大法。 玄师曰：《西元龟山元录》内有丹皇飞玄紫文空洞灵章，是色界魔王称我有洞章者，正此文也。 龟山丹皇飞玄紫文空洞灵章 飞玄紫炁凝灵根，法曰：飞玄自然紫云之炁，元始祖炁也。 天元之灵根，见前元纲流演法。 纲维玉虚总万神。 空中郁勃结自然，飞玄之炁郁勃自然，凝结太空之中。 上有棱层十二传。 玉楼峨峨耀景云，流精紫阙带金轩。 琼堂璋铄绕八骞，八骞者，八景也。 重楼十二金台，玉楼九宫三田十二神室，上有流精紫阙金华之堂、琼瑶之室，有自然紫云之炁，见前元纲流演法。 中有青金九灵仙。 丹房真母号精延，按大法玄师曰：中有梵炁之主、雌一真母居，为九灵太妙白玉龟台。 玉光金真梵炁祖母元君，青金丹皇大道君也。 又曰下元梵炁之母，合延之神也。 飞青羽杨晨婴冠。 服色也。 手执玉节握灵旛，五色命魔对帝尊。 存手握五色命魔宝旛，乘空步虚至玉京山，上朝元始也。 《宗坛秘诀命魔密咒》具载甚详，兹举其略。 把持符籍当生门，执符把箓，保命生根。 咀日嚼月嗡醴泉。 采日月之精华。 金醴玉泉，见前章开明三景注。 离罗吐辉炼五魂，即中理五炁也。 内充外溢绛府欣。 内外，常冥也。 绛府，心也。 金光焕焕形正圆，圆象也。 从朔入金色浑沦。 朔，北也。 肾属北水宫。 金，西也。 肺属西金宫。 按《元纲流演法》，人之元炁发自明堂宫右肾命门上，属西北乾方纽太渊府，黄炁上入於心。 心属火绛宫，左旋流循脑后玉枕宫，循人左目日宫，右旋下历足少阴大指，流转一身，旋转右肩，入右目月宫，然后回度五常，从三十五分脊骨流入下丹田左肾水宫。 冲入肝木，经肝土中丹田。 次过肺金宫，从十二重楼喉管、通至泥丸宫上丹田囟门灵谷，总出上元。 唯有开明晓此言，本经后序曰：得道者乃当洞明至言也。 日五月十朝北元。 修其道，常以正月、二月、三月、四月、六月、七月、八月、十月、十一月、十二月。 五月、九月、不在行持。 一年计十月，每月三日、五日、七日、九日、十五日，一月五遍。 清斋诵飞玄紫文．内思如法，一月计五日，见注后。 刻见华盖领仙君，紫炁左回与斗连。 历度四七二＋八宿也入金门，元纲流演之法！ 存思北斗华董之中，有紫云之炁，从斗罡左过，历度二十八宿竟，还金门之上，叩齿心拜。 正是丹皇校万仙。 有明此诀加精动，秘念密思每令分。

From *Zi Yueheng* Heaven to *Tan Shi* Heaven, there are eighteen heavens in all, comprising the Form Realm, which lies above the Desire Realm—hence it is called the Second.

The demon king’s name is *Mara*. Lofty and vast, the twenty-eight constellations unfold. Their luminous qi shines in four directions, radiant as thus described. The *Mysterious Master* states: Within the *Western Primordial Tortoise Mountain’s Primordial Record* is the *Cinnabar Sovereign’s Flying Mystery Purple Text Cavern Numinous Chapter*. **Cinnabar Sovereign’s Flying Mystery Purple Text Cavern Numinous Chapter**
The flying mystery’s purple qi congeals the numinous root. The method states: The flying mystery’s natural purple cloud qi is the primordial ancestral qi. The numinous root of the Heavenly Primordial is seen in the preceding *Yuan’gang* unfolding method.

Jade halls resplendent, encircling the eight directions—the eight directions being the eight scenes.

Above are halls of flowing essence and purple gates, golden radiance’s chambers, jade and jasper’s chambers, where the natural purple cloud qi appears, as seen in the preceding *Yuan’gang* unfolding method. Within dwell the nine numinous immortals of azure gold.

According to the great method, the Mysterious Master states: Within resides the lord of Brahma qi, the feminine One True Mother, as the nine numinous and supremely wondrous White Jade Tortoise Terrace. The Jade Radiance Golden Perfected Brahma Qi’s Ancestral Mother, the Azure Gold Cinnabar Sovereign Great Dao Lord. Also called the mother of the Lower Primordial’s Brahma qi, the spirit of *Heyan*.

Clad in flying azure feathers, her crown adorned with morning’s infant. Such is her attire. In hand she grasps a jade scepter and holds the numinous banner. The five-colored life-demon faces the imperial honored one. Visualize holding the five-colored life-demon treasure banner, ascending through the void to Jade Capital Mountain to pay homage to the Primordial Beginning. The *Secret Mantra of the Life-Demon from the Ancestral Altar’s Secret Instructions* records this in great detail; here, only an outline is given.

Grasping talismans and registers, she guards the Gate of Life. Holding talismans and registers preserves life’s root. Chewing the sun and moon, she drinks the sacred spring’s hum. She absorbs the sun and moon’s essence. Golden nectar and jade springs are seen in the preceding chapter’s annotation on the *Three Luminaries of Kai Ming*.

*Liluo* spits radiance to refine the five souls—this is the central ordering of the five qi. Within replete, without overflowing, the Crimson Palace rejoices. Within and without are ever obscure. The Crimson Palace is the heart. Golden light shines brilliantly, the form perfectly round—such is the symbol. From the new moon it enters the golden hue’s primordial chaos. *Shuo* is the north. The kidneys belong to the northern Water Palace. Gold is the west. The lungs belong to the western Metal Palace.

According to the *Yuan’gang* Unfolding Method*,* human primordial qi arises from the Hall of Brightness’s right kidney Gate of Life, belonging to the northwest *Qian* direction’s *Niutaiyuan* Palace. Yellow qi ascends into the heart. The heart belongs to the fiery Crimson Palace. Left-rotating, it flows behind the brain’s Jade Pillow Palace, circling the left eye’s Sun Palace. Right-rotating, it descends through the foot’s *Shaoyin* great toe, circulating the body, revolving around the right shoulder, entering the right eye’s Moon Palace. Inwardly visualize as prescribed, totaling five days per month, as noted afterward.

At once, behold the canopy-led immortal lord. Purple qi left-rotates, linking with the Dipper. Traversing the four and seven, the twenty-eight constellations enter the Golden Gate—this is the *Yuan’gang* unfolding method! Visualize within the Dipper’s *Hua Dong* the purple cloud qi, passing leftward through the Dipper’s stem, traversing the twenty-eight constellations, then returning above the Golden Gate, where one clicks the teeth and bows in the heart.

Precisely the Cinnabar Sovereign who examines the myriad immortals. Those who clearly understand this secret add diligence and movement, secretly reciting and inwardly contemplating, ever distinguishing its parts.

chunks.original_text: 祝毕，便口引紫炁二十八咽止。 行此三年，刻有神仙降兆寝席也。 身有紫云映络一形，九天书名，九年必获上仙也。 此章亦名炼度金门大咒。 万遍成仙。 按大法一月五遍，依洞章法，取斗中紫炁万遍，名外侍八琼丹。 一千遍，夜有神光出没。 二千遍，一身有光。 三千遍，满室有光。 四千遍，旧病新疾残靥宿痕皆去，色反婴童。 五千遍，地司除死名．玉清书生录，百灵侍卫。 六千遍，举身有光，洞照百步，夜可细书，鬼物不隐，预知未然。 七千遍，吹嘘百物，可起死尸。 八千遍，呵咒五金，皆成至宝，光生圆象。 九千遍，丹成如日，面生金容，骨秀五香，三天注仙。 万遍道备，位证真人。 仙道贵度，鬼道相连。 天地眇莽，秽炁氛氛。 三界乐兮，过之长存。 身度我界，体入自然。 体入自然，证大洞也。 此时乐兮，薄由我恩。 龙汉荡荡，何能别真。 我界难度，故作洞文。 变化飞空，以试尔身。 成败懈退，度者几人。 笑尔不度，故为歌音。 第三无色界魔王歌曰： 自皓庭霄度天至秀乐禁上天，为无色界四天。 谓在色界之上，故云第三。 魔王讳韶。 三界之上，眇眇大罗。 上无色根，云层峨峨。 唯有元始，浩劫之家。 部制我界，统承玄都。 有过我界，身入玉虚。 身入玉虚，证大洞、为仙真也。 我位上王，匡御众魔。 空中万变，秽炁纷葩。 保真者少，迷惑者多。 仙道难固，鬼道易邪。 人道者心，谅不由他。 仙道贵实，人道贵华。 尔不乐仙道，三界那得过。 其欲转五道，我当复奈何。 三界歌章乃魔王所述，皇人所书，道君所纪，非二章也。 此三界之上，飞空之中，魔王歌音，音参洞章。 诵之百遍，名度南宫。 诵之千遍，魔王保迎。 万遍道备，飞升太空。 过度三界，位登仙公。 玄师曰：此是诵三界魔王歌章，非二章也。 敬形章 有闻灵音，魔王敬形，敕制地祇，　戌文。 至受炼更生三十二字、敕制地祇之文，黑书，敕当处土地，令敬迎诵章学士也。 侍卫送迎　某人，拔出地户，五苦八难，七祖升迁，永离鬼官。 魂度朱陵，受炼更生。 戌文挑。 玄师曰：心形皈信，谛听诵者，遂获九品善果。 敕制乃元始天尊所降，玉晨道君所述。 是谓无量，普度无穷。 有秘上天文，诸天共所崇。 泄慢堕地岳，祸及七祖翁。 天实章 道言：此二章 按大法玄师日：二章者，前章自元始洞玄灵宝本章至列言上清，是一章也。 后章自元洞玉历至辞参高真，是二章也。 三界歌章，非二章，止是魔王所述。 并是诸天上帝，及至灵魔王隐秘之音，皆是大梵之言，非世上常辞。 言无韵丽，曲无华宛，故谓玄奥，难可寻详。 上天所宝，秘於玄都紫微上宫，依玄科四万劫一传。 若有至人赍金宝，质心依旧格告盟十天，然后而付焉。 传付授受之条，上天之科立四万劫，乃旧劫之格。 十天，东方九炁青天、南方三炁丹天、西方七炁素天、北方五炁玄天、东北东南西南西北四梵炁天、上方一炁昊天、下方一十二炁皇天。 告盟十天，大券朱书，面乎十天而分之。 元始无量度人上品经法卷之三竟 元始无量度人上品经法卷之四

The body will be enveloped in a radiant purple cloud, its form interwoven with luminous threads. Inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ register, after nine years, one shall attain the rank of Supreme Immortal.

This chapter is also named the *Great Incantation of the Golden Gate of Refinement and Transcendence*. Reciting it ten thousand times, one achieves immortality. According to the great method, recite it five times a month. Following the cavernous scriptures’ method, draw in the purple qi from the Dipper ten thousand times—this is called the *Outer Attendant’s Eightfold Jade Elixir*.

Reciting it one thousand times, divine light will appear and vanish at night. Two thousand times, the body will radiate light. Three thousand times, the entire chamber will be filled with light. Four thousand times, old ailments, new illnesses, lingering scars, and blemishes will all vanish, and one’s complexion will revert to that of an infant. Five thousand times, the Earthly Bureau will erase one’s name from the register of death, and the Jade Clarity will inscribe one in the ledger of the living, with a hundred spirits attending as guardians. Six thousand times, the entire body will emit light, illuminating a hundred paces, allowing one to read fine script at night. Ghosts and spirits will no longer remain hidden, and one will foresee what is yet to come. Seven thousand times, one’s breath will revive all things, even raising the dead. Eight thousand times, exhaling upon the five metals will transform them into supreme treasures, their light forming perfect spheres. Nine thousand times, the elixir will ripen like the sun, the face will take on a golden countenance, the bones will become refined and fragrant, and the Three Heavens will record one as an immortal. Ten thousand times, the Dao will be perfected, and one will be ordained as a Perfected One.

The immortal path values transcendence, while the ghostly path clings to attachment. Heaven and earth stretch vast and boundless, yet impure qi swirls thickly. The Three Realms offer joy—surpass them and abide forever. Transcend this realm, and the body merges with spontaneity. Merging with spontaneity is the attainment of the Great Cavern. At this moment, joy is but a trifle of my grace. The Dragon Han era stretches endlessly—how can one distinguish the true? My realm is difficult to transcend, thus I compose this cavernous scripture. Soaring through the void in transformation, I test your resolve. Success or failure, slackening or retreat—how few are those who transcend! Laughing at those who fail to cross, I thus sing this song.

The *Song of the Third Formless Realm’s Demon King* states:
From the Radiant Court’s dawn, ascending through the heavens to the Exalted Joy Forbidden Heaven, lies the Four Heavens of the Formless Realm. As it resides above the Form Realm, it is called the Third. The Demon King’s name is Shao.

Above the Three Realms stretches the vast and distant Great Luo. Beyond the roots of form, clouds tower in layers. Only the Primordial Beginning dwells in the household of the vast kalpas. Governing my realm, I receive command from the Mystic Capital. Those who transgress my realm enter the Jade Void. Entering the Jade Void is the attainment of the Great Cavern and the realization of immortality as a Perfected One. I, the Supreme King, govern and restrain the myriad demons. Amidst the ten thousand transformations of the void, impure qi blooms in profusion. Few preserve their authenticity; many are deluded and confused. The immortal path is difficult to uphold; the ghostly path easily strays into depravity. The human path lies in the heart—truly, it does not depend on others. The immortal path values substance; the human path values splendor. If you do not delight in the immortal path, how can you pass through the Three Realms? Should you wish to traverse the Five Paths, what can I do for you?

The *Songs of the Three Realms* were composed by the Demon King, transcribed by the August One, and recorded by the Dao Lord—these are not the two chapters. Above the Three Realms, in the midst of soaring through the void, the Demon King’s song resonates, its melody harmonizing with the cavernous scriptures. Reciting it a hundred times is called *Transcending the Southern Palace*. A thousand times, the Demon King will protect and welcome you. Ten thousand times, the Dao will be perfected, and you will ascend into the Great Void, transcending the Three Realms to attain the rank of Immortal Duke.

The Mystic Master says: This refers to reciting the *Song of the Three Realms’ Demon King*—it is not the two chapters.

**The Reverent Form Chapter**
Hearing the numinous sound, the Demon King reveres the form. The *Xū* script commands the earthly deities. Upon receiving refinement and rebirth, the thirty-two characters of the *Xū* script command the earthly deities. Written in black, it instructs the local earth gods to reverently welcome the scholar reciting the scripture.

**Attending Guardians for Escort**
So-and-so, extricated from the earthly prison, freed from the Five Sufferings and Eight Difficulties, with seven generations of ancestors ascending, forever departing the ghostly bureaus. The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound, receiving refinement and rebirth. The *Xū* script is invoked.

The Mystic Master says: With sincerity in heart and form, those who listen attentively to the recitation will attain the nine grades of virtuous fruition.

The *Xū* script was bestowed by the Primordial Heavenly Worthy of the Origin, and recorded by the Jade Clarity Dao Lord. It is called boundless, universally delivering the infinite. It is a secret celestial script, revered by all heavens. To leak or slight it is to fall into the earthly peaks, bringing calamity upon seven generations of ancestors.

**The Heavenly Verity Chapter**
The Dao states: These two chapters—
According to the great method, the Mystic Master says: The first chapter, from the *Primordial Cavernous Numinous Treasure’s Original Chapter* to *Arrayed Words of the Highest Clarity*, is the first chapter. The second chapter, from the *Primordial Cavernous Jade Calendar* to *Verses Harmonizing with the Lofty Perfected*, is the second chapter. The *Songs of the Three Realms* are not these two chapters but are solely the compositions of the Demon King.

All are the hidden sounds of the myriad heavens’ Celestial Thearchs and the numinous demon kings, all in the language of the Great Brahma, not the common speech of the mundane world. Their words lack ornate rhythm; their melodies lack florid embellishment. Thus, they are called profound and obscure, difficult to fathom in detail. Treasured by the heavens, they are secreted in the Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace of the Mystic Capital. According to the mystic statutes, they are transmitted once every forty thousand kalpas. If a perfected one offers gold and treasures, pledges sincerity, and follows the ancient protocols to swear oaths before the Ten Heavens, only then are they bestowed. The protocols for transmission and reception are established by the celestial statutes of forty thousand kalpas—these are the ancient kalpa’s regulations.

The Ten Heavens are: the Nine Qi Azure Heaven of the East, the Three Qi Cinnabar Heaven of the South, the Seven Qi White Heaven of the West, the Five Qi Mystic Heaven of the North, the Four Brahma Qi Heavens of the Northeast, Southeast, Southwest, and Northwest, the One Qi Vast Heaven above, and the Twelve Qi August Heaven below. Swearing oaths before the Ten Heavens involves inscribing the great contract in vermilion, facing the Ten Heavens to divide it.

Thus concludes the third scroll of the *Primordial Beginning’s Scripture of the Upper Chapters on the Limitless Salvation of Humanity*.

chunks.original_text: 太上三五都功职箓弟子陈椿荣集注 普度章 道言：夫天地运度，亦有否终。 运是劫运，度是度数。 成玄英注：否终者，否是阳九百六； 终谓三界消亡。 阳九百六者，按《周易》大衍十九年为一章，四章为一部，二十部为一统，三统为一元，一元四千六百二十年，其中通有五十四年水旱。 阳九者，阳数奇，极於九； 灾应之时，大则九年之旱也。 其次则七年、五年、三年、一年之火也。 阴数偶，极於八，灾应之时，则八年、六年、四年、二年之水。 百六初入元，一百六十年，阳数奇，有小旱之灾，故云百六之灾。 通论阳九百六之会者，初入元，三百年为小阳九、小百六，九百年为大阳九、大百六。 大则大旱九年、大水八年也。 《汉书》云：四千六百一十七年为一元，数尽三元为大劫之终，天地消亡也。 三元合一万三千八百五十一年。 初入元一百六十年为一小灾，故云百六否终之义，略举如前也。 日月五星，亦有亏盈。 至圣神人，亦有休否。 末学之夫，亦有疾伤。

The Salvation Chapter

The Dao speaks: The revolutions of Heaven and Earth also have their ends of adversity. "Revolutions" refers to kalpic cycles; "revolutions" denotes their reckoning. Cheng Xuanying annotates: "Ends of adversity" means the *yang* nine and hundred-six. "End" signifies the dissolution of the Three Realms. The *yang* nine and hundred-six: according to the *Book of Changes*, nineteen years form one *zhang*, four *zhang* form one *bu*, twenty *bu* form one *tong*, and three *tong* form one *yuan*, totaling four thousand six hundred twenty years in one *yuan*, during which fifty-four years of flood and drought occur. The *yang* nine: *yang* numbers are odd, culminating in nine; when calamities strike, the greatest is a nine-year drought. Lesser manifestations include seven, five, three, or one year of fire. *Yin* numbers are even, culminating in eight; when calamities strike, they bring eight, six, four, or two years of flood. At the onset of a *yuan*, after one hundred sixty years—an odd *yang* number—minor droughts occur, hence the term "hundred-six calamity." Broadly speaking, the conjunction of *yang* nine and hundred-six: at the onset of a *yuan*, three hundred years mark the lesser *yang* nine and lesser hundred-six, while nine hundred years mark the greater *yang* nine and greater hundred-six. The greater calamities entail nine years of severe drought and eight years of great flood. The *Book of Han* states: four thousand six hundred seventeen years constitute one *yuan*, and the completion of three *yuan* marks the end of a great kalpa, when Heaven and Earth dissolve. Three *yuan* together span thirteen thousand eight hundred fifty-one years. At the onset of a *yuan*, one hundred sixty years bring minor calamities, thus the meaning of the "end of adversity in the hundred-six" is briefly outlined as above.

The sun, moon, and five planets also wax and wane. Even the most sagely and divine beings experience prosperity and decline. Lesser scholars, too, suffer illness and injury.

chunks.original_text: 凡有此灾，同炁皆当齐心修斋，六时行香，十遍转经，福德立降，消诸不祥。 无量之文，普度无穷。 玄师日：六时者，半夜、平旦、食时、日中、哺时、黄昏，六阳时也。 阴炼章 道言：夫末学道浅，或仙品未充，运应灭度，身经太阴，临过之时，同学至人为其行香诵经十过，以度尸形如法。 依五炼生尸之法，以度尸形，其炼度尸形之法，出《灵宝五炼生尸经》九炼生化章。 魂神径上南宫，随其学功计日而得更生，转轮不灭，便得神仙。 保镇章 道言：夫天地运终，亦当修斋， 修灵宝金箓斋。 行香诵经。 星宿错度，日月失昏，亦当修斋， 修天皇九曜斋。 行香诵经。 四时失度，阴阳不调，亦当修斋， 修五帝育物斋。 行香诵经。 请雨祈晴，修洞渊五神斋。 国主有灾，兵革四兴，亦当修斋， 修太一圣真斋。 行香诵经。 疫毒流行，兆民死伤，亦当修斋， 修长生保命斋。 行香诵经。 师友命过，亦当修斋， 修灵宝黄箓斋。 行香诵经。 玄师曰：所立斋法，世并有科。 此六条，正是学士修诵大法、功行之要。 道凡遇一切厄会，当修斋行香诵经，必获真人之位，所谓得为金阙臣也。 详见大法。 夫斋戒诵经，功德甚重，上消天灾，保镇帝王，下禳毒害，以度兆民。 生死受赖，其福难胜，故曰无量普度天人。 当默运慈心，普及一切，悉为禳厄解难，以阴修善功也。 至言章 道言：凡有是经，能为天地帝主兆民行是功德。 有灾之日，发心修斋，烧香诵经十过，皆诸天记名，万神侍卫。 修齐诵者，获三品善果。 右别至人，克得为圣君金阙之臣，诸天记人功过，毫分无失。 天中魔王亦保举尔身。 得道者，乃当洞明至言也。 诵此经，当周十遍，体元始说经周回之意，未通经中深义，不得懈怠退志。 功成之后，心府虚静，尘秽不侵，自然通达真旨。 自道言此二章、至洞明至言也，太上玉晨大道君后序。 大洞章 诸天中大梵隐语无量音 此是题目也。 严东曰：隐者有四，一隐名，二隐讳，三隐事，四隐语也。 李少微曰：按《内音经》云：元始天尊於赤明世界栢陵舍座，是时云雾郁勃，三日三夜，玄阴不解。 五老上白天尊曰：今日侍座，所未曾见。 天尊演教，则河海静默，山岳藏烟。 今日昼阴，天人惶惧，不审何故？ 天尊告曰：今日诸天发瑞，灵应自然，玉字焕烂，障蔽天光，咸令四座暝目伏听。 俄顷，天炁顿启，冥暗消豁，五色光明，洞照十方。 忽有灵书，字方一丈，於空玄之上，文彩烂焕，八角垂芒，精光乱目，不可得看。 天尊普告曰：此灵书八会，字无正形，其趣宛奥，难可寻详，可注笔解之。 於是天真皇人受天尊明命，注解其音，分其分度，三十二天，天各八字，并飞玄自然之书； 合五方飞玄之炁，以和八字之音，名曰大梵隐语无量洞章。 道君撰 太上玉晨大道君，为灵宝教主，撰此灵书中篇三十二天玉字成经，为云篆光明章。 元始灵书中篇： 此道君自标於题目之下。 此正文大梵隐语之音。 大法中篇，是三十二天大梵玉字内音。 无量隐语之旨，乃元始祖炁灵书中禁之篇。 玉晨道君所撰，天真皇人所书也。 内隐大洞秘讳、五劫开图之旨，凡二百五十六言，分置三十二天，天各八字，内按乾、坤、坎、艮、震、巽、离、兑八卦，支变八八六十四卦，一句按一卦也。
