When such calamities arise, all who share the same *qi* must unite in sincere purification rites, perform incense offerings through the six periods, and recite the scriptures ten times over—whereupon virtue and power descend at once, dissolving all inauspicious omens. The boundless scriptures universally deliver limitless beings.

The Perfected Master states: The six periods are midnight, dawn, mealtime, noon, afternoon, and dusk—these are the six *yang* hours.

**Yin Refinement Chapter**
The Dao declares: When lesser learners of the Way possess shallow attainment or their immortal rank remains unfulfilled, and their destined time of dissolution arrives, their bodies pass through the Great Yin. At the moment of transition, fellow students and perfected beings should perform incense offerings and recite the scriptures ten times to deliver the corporeal form according to the proper method. Following the Five Refinements for Reviving the Corpse, they deliver the form, and this method of refining and delivering the corpse derives from the *Nine Refinements for Generative Transformation* chapter of the *Scripture of the Five Refinements for Reviving the Corpse*. The hun-soul then ascends directly to the Southern Palace, where, based on the merit of their practice, they are reborn after a calculated number of days. Escaping the wheel of rebirth, they attain immortality.

**Preservation and Pacification Chapter**
The Dao declares: When the cycles of Heaven and Earth reach their end, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Golden Register Retreat of the Numinous Treasure*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures. When the stellar lodges fall into disorder and the sun and moon lose their proper course, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Nine Luminaries Retreat of the Heavenly Sovereign*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures. When the four seasons lose their balance and *yin* and *yang* fall into disharmony, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Five Emperors’ Nurturing Life Retreat*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures. To pray for rain or clear skies, perform the *Five Divine Retreat of the Abyssal Mystery*. When the ruler of the state faces calamity and warfare erupts on all sides, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Supreme One Sacred Perfected Retreat*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures. When pestilence spreads and the people suffer death and injury, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Longevity and Life-Preservation Retreat*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures. When a teacher or companion passes away, one must perform purification rites—specifically, the *Yellow Register Retreat of the Numinous Treasure*. Offer incense and recite the scriptures.

The Perfected Master states: The established rites for these retreats are all prescribed by the worldly regulations. These six principles constitute the essential methods of practice and merit for scholars of the Way. Whenever the Dao encounters any adversity, one should perform purification rites, offer incense, and recite the scriptures—thereby assuredly attaining the rank of Perfected Being, becoming a minister of the Golden Towers. For details, consult the Great Methods.

The merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is profound: above, it dissolves celestial calamities and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poisonous harms and delivers the people. From life to death, all rely upon it, and its blessings are immeasurable—thus it is called the boundless universal deliverance of heaven and humanity. One should silently cultivate a heart of compassion, universally extending it to all, resolving calamities and alleviating hardships, thereby accumulating hidden virtuous merit.

**Utmost Words Chapter**
The Dao declares: Whoever possesses these scriptures and performs such meritorious deeds for Heaven, Earth, the emperor, and the people—on the day of calamity, if they resolve to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times—all the heavens will record their names, and the myriad spirits will attend and protect them. Those who perform these rites and recitations will obtain the three grades of good fruits. The most distinguished among them will become ministers of the Sacred Lord in the Golden Towers. The heavens record their merits and transgressions with perfect precision, down to the finest detail. The demon kings of heaven will also advocate for their persons. Those who attain the Way will thoroughly comprehend these utmost words.

When reciting this scripture, one should complete ten full cycles, embodying the intent of the Primordial Beginning’s revolving discourse. Until the profound meanings within the scripture are fully grasped, one must not grow lax or abandon their resolve. After the merit is fulfilled, the mind’s repository becomes empty and still, free from the defilements of the worldly dust, and the true purport naturally becomes clear.

From the Dao’s discourse in these two chapters to the thorough comprehension of the utmost words, this is the postscript of the Supreme Jade Clarity Great Dao Lord.

**Great Cavern Chapter**
The Boundless Sounds of the Great Brahma Hidden Language in the Heavens—this is the title.

Yan Dong states: There are four types of concealment: concealment of names, concealment of taboos, concealment of matters, and concealment of language.

Li Shaowei states: According to the *Scripture of Inner Sounds*, the Primordial Heavenly Worthy, seated in the Cypress Mound of the Vermilion Brightness World, was enveloped in clouds and mist for three days and nights, during which the mysterious *yin* did not disperse. The Five Elders addressed the Heavenly Worthy, saying: "Today, while attending your seat, we have witnessed what we have never seen before." When the Heavenly Worthy expounds the teachings, rivers and seas fall silent, and mountains and peaks conceal their mists. Yet today, the daylight is overcast, and the heavenly and human realms are filled with dread—we know not the reason.

The Heavenly Worthy replied: Today, the heavens have manifested auspicious signs, and numinous responses arise spontaneously. The jade characters radiate brilliance, obscuring the light of heaven, compelling all present to close their eyes and listen reverently. In an instant, the celestial *qi* surged forth, the darkness dissipated, and five-colored light illuminated the ten directions. Suddenly, a divine scripture, each character a *zhang* in size, appeared in the void above, its radiant patterns dazzling, with eight corners emitting rays of light so intense that none could gaze upon it.

The Heavenly Worthy proclaimed to all: This divine scripture of the Eight Assemblies has no fixed form; its meaning is profound and subtle, difficult to fathom. It should be annotated and explained. Thereupon, the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign received the Heavenly Worthy’s luminous command, annotating its sounds and dividing its measures. The thirty-two heavens each received eight characters, collectively forming the *Flying Mystery Natural Script*. Combining the *qi* of the Five Directions’ Flying Mystery with the sounds of the eight characters, it is called the *Boundless Great Brahma Hidden Language Cavern Chapter*.

Composed by the Dao Lord
The Supreme Jade Clarity Great Dao Lord, as the master of the Numinous Treasure teachings, compiled this middle section of the thirty-two heavenly jade characters into the *Scripture of Cloud Seal Luminous Chapters*.

**Middle Section of the Primordial Numinous Scripture**
This is the Dao Lord’s self-designation beneath the title. These are the sounds of the Great Brahma Hidden Language.

The middle section of the Great Methods consists of the inner sounds of the thirty-two heavenly Great Brahma jade characters. The purport of the boundless hidden language is the *Forbidden Chapter of the Primordial Ancestral Qi Numinous Scripture*. Composed by the Jade Clarity Dao Lord and transcribed by the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign, it conceals within it the secret taboos of the Great Cavern and the principles of the Five Kalpas’ unfolding diagrams. In total, there are two hundred fifty-six characters, distributed among the thirty-two heavens, with eight characters per heaven. Internally, it follows the eight trigrams—*Qian*, *Kun*, *Kan*, *Gen*, *Zhen*, *Xun*, *Li*, and *Dui*—and their sixty-four transformations, with each phrase corresponding to one hexagram.

chunks.original_text: 通贯六十甲子，乾、坤、坎、离四卦，出於六甲之表，不在甲子之限。 李少微曰：今所注者，一依天真皇人内音训释，或删繁取要，或加字益明，回互经文； 不依轮次者，务使人速见其意也。 东方九炁青天自然玉字 亶楼阿苍，丁丑。 无和观音。 戊寅寅文。 李少微注：此八字，皇曾天内音也。 亶者，坦然广远貌。 楼者，玉京山下长楼。 亶远广远，上承玄都之宫，亦谓之楼都。 阿者，玄都宫阿那之神名，主大梵之炁，阿那鸣楼都之鼓以集众真，上朝元始。 荟者，帝君游台之名，荟蔚华秀。 无者，太无也。 言太无之中，自然生真也。 和者，田月门户之名。 观者，观觉天中帝君之讳。 音者，八字之音。 人能诵八字之音，则真人乘金轮以开冥，玉女扬华旛以披钮。 观觉主长夜之录、四冥拔九幽之府，七祖披朗，朽骸还生也。 须延明首，。 己卯。 法揽菩昙。 庚辰丑文。 此八字，玉完天内音也。 须延者，玉完天西北阙名也。 大劫数交，须延开而玉真上圣於是而回。 明首者，元始之都候也。 元始开运，则都候启道，梵炁自朗。 法者，法轮罪福之场。 揽者，揽觉天中帝君之讳。 菩者菩提，昙者昙颐，并上元真人也。 人能诵此洞章，则法轮引籍於司命，揽觉度魂於更生。 菩提执九色之麾以轮运，昙颐旋十绝之旛以停椿。 天地得之则不价，万物得之以长存。 稼那阿奕，辛巳。 忽诃流吟。 库中指中文。 此八字，何童天内音也。 稼那者，天中正图先生之号，领人生死图录，总主神仙，治金华宫。 金华宫与龙山连宇，炜烨玉清之上，蔚勃洞虚之中。 阿奕者，七宝林中树名也。 实上圣之进圃，真人之戏园。 忽者，觉也。 飞天神王之讳。 诃者诃摩，天中呼元始天尊为诃摩。 劫运终则诃摩开化教法，普度天人。 将来劫坏，真经隐藏，天尊已知，预为流布歌吟也。 人能诵此洞章，正图先生则削罪录於长夜，注生名於南宫也。 华都曲丽，癸未。 鲜菩育臻。 甲申卯文。 此八字，平育天内音也。 华都者，天中太极宫青华门之别名。 曲者，天中有梵天神人飞行太极之上，爽灵风之炁，歌洞章之曲。 丽者，太和玉女之名。 ＇鲜者鲜云，即庆云也。 菩者，天中菩楼也。 育者，天中帝君之隐名。 臻者，至也。 育帝常乘八景之轮，道观八极，至於鬼神之家，回十绝之旛以召魔举仙。 人能诵此洞章，飞天遥唱，三界司迎，七祖出夜，上升南宫也。 答落大梵，乙酉。 散烟庆云。 丙戌辰文。 此八字，文举天内音也。 答者，天中玉阙名也。 落者，宫阙落落然也。 大者，大宥天尊开运之初，皆放大赦，谓之大宥，使三恶道空，九幽罢对。 梵者梵炁，能开龙汉之劫。 散烟者，真人散香於玉阙。 庆云者，五色备也。 庆云接乎紫馆，飞天舞乎空轮也。 飞洒玉都，丁亥。 明魔上门。 戊子巳文。 此八字，魔夷天内音也。 飞者，飞天神人之名也。 天地政运，沦於延康，冥冥无开，飞天启光。 於是散辉，诸天受炁也。 洒者，龙汉一会，倏欻而回也。 玉者，玉真魔夷天帝之讳，主开度幽难。 都者，九幽之酆都也。 人有善功则玉真开长夜之户，酆都度八难之场。 明者，解八字之义也。 魔者，魔王也。 上者，上帝也。 门者，门下也。 人能明解八字之义，则魔王敬伏，上帝育养於始生之神门，门下韩君司录度算南宫，庆流九族，生死蒙恩也。
chunks.translated_text:
The text spans the sixty cyclical years of *jiazi*, with the four hexagrams *Qian*, *Kun*, *Kan*, and *Li* emerging beyond the bounds of the six *jia* stems, unbound by the limits of the *jiazi* cycle.

Li Shaowei states: In the present commentary, I follow the inner sounds and glosses of the Heavenly Perfected Sovereign, sometimes condensing for essentials, sometimes adding characters for clarity, and rearranging the scriptural text. Where I do not adhere to the sequential order, it is to enable swift comprehension of the meaning.

**Eastern Nine Qi Azure Heaven’s Natural Jade Characters**
*Dǎnlóu ā cāng, dīngchǒu.*
*Wú hé guān yīn.*
*Wùyín yín wén.*

Li Shaowei’s annotation: These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Sovereign Cinnabar Heaven.
*Dǎn* signifies a vast and boundless expanse. *Lóu* refers to the long tower beneath the Jade Capital Mountain. *Dǎn* and *lóu* together denote the far-reaching, broad realm that upholds the Palace of the Dark Metropolis, also called the Tower Metropolis.
*Ā* is the divine name *Ānà* of the Palace of the Dark Metropolis, who governs the Great Brahma *qi*. *Ānà* sounds the drum of the Tower Metropolis to assemble the host of perfected beings, who ascend to pay homage to the Primordial Beginning.
*Cāng* is the name of the terrace where the Thearch roams, lush and resplendent with blossoms.
*Wú* is the Great Void. It speaks of the spontaneous arising of the true within the Great Void.
*Hé* is the name of the gate of the field and moon.
*Guān* is the taboo name of the Thearch of Observant Awakening in heaven.
*Yīn* refers to the sound of these eight characters. Those who recite the sound of these eight characters will have perfected persons ride the golden wheel to open the dark, and jade maidens wave flowered banners to unfasten the bolts. The Lord of Observant Awakening presides over the records of the long night, delivering the four dark realms and the nine nether courts; the seven ancestors are bathed in radiance, and withered bones return to life.

*Xūyán míngshǒu,*
*jǐmǎo.*
*Fǎ lǎn pú tán.*
*Gēngchén chǒu wén.*

These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Jade Perfection Heaven.
*Xūyán* is the name of the northwest gate of the Jade Perfection Heaven. When the great kalpa’s reckoning converges, *Xūyán* opens, and the jade perfected and upper sages return.
*Míngshǒu* is the capital sentinel of the Primordial Beginning. When the Primordial Beginning initiates the kalpic revolution, the capital sentinel opens the Dao, and the Brahma *qi* naturally brightens.
*Fǎ* is the field of karmic retribution for the wheel of dharma.
*Lǎn* is the taboo name of the Thearch of Perceptive Awakening in heaven.
*Pú* is *bodhi*, and *tán* is *tányí*, both being upper primordial perfected persons. Those who recite this cavern chapter will have the wheel of dharma draw their register from the Lord of Destiny, and Perceptive Awakening deliver their souls to rebirth. *Bodhi* wields the nine-colored banner to set the wheel in motion, and *Tányí* revolves the ten absolute banners to halt the kalpic cycle. Heaven and earth obtain it and become priceless; the myriad beings obtain it and endure forever.

*Jiànà ā yì,*
*xīnsì.*
*Hū hē liú yín.*
*Kù zhōng zhǐ zhōng wén.*

These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Harmonious Youth Heaven.
*Jiànà* is the title of the Master of the Correct Diagram in heaven, who oversees the ledgers of human life and death, governs immortals and transcendentals, and administers the Golden Flower Palace. The Golden Flower Palace adjoins Dragon Mountain, gleaming atop the Jade Clarity and flourishing amid the Cavernous Void.
*Ā yì* is the name of a tree in the Seven Treasures Grove, the garden where upper sages advance and perfected persons play.
*Hū* means awakening, the taboo name of the Flying Heavenly Divine King.
*Hē* is *hēmó*; in heaven, the Primordial Beginning Heavenly Worthy is called *Hēmó*. When the kalpic cycle ends, *Hēmó* reveals the teachings of transformation to universally deliver heavenly and human beings. As the coming kalpa approaches dissolution, the true scripture is concealed, and the Heavenly Worthy, foreseeing this, preemptively disseminates it through song and chant. Those who recite this cavern chapter will have the Master of the Correct Diagram erase their sin records from the long night and inscribe their names of life in the Southern Palace.

*Huá dū qū lì,*
*guǐwèi.*
*Xiān pú yù zhēn.*
*jiǎshēn mǎo wén.*

These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Tranquil Nurturance Heaven.
*Huá dū* is another name for the Azure Flower Gate of the Great Ultimate Palace in heaven.
*Qū* refers to the divine persons of the Brahma Heaven who fly above the Great Ultimate, riding the *qi* of the luminous numinous wind and singing the melody of the cavern chapter.
*Lì* is the name of the Jade Maiden of Grand Harmony.
*Xiān* is *xiānyún*, the auspicious cloud.
*Pú* is the *púlóu* in heaven.
*Yù* is the hidden name of the Thearch in heaven.
*Zhēn* means to arrive. The Thearch of Nurturance constantly rides the wheel of the eight luminaries, traversing the eight poles to reach the abodes of ghosts and spirits, revolving the ten absolute banners to summon demons and raise immortals. Those who recite this cavern chapter will have flying immortals chant from afar, the three realms’ administrators welcome them, the seven ancestors emerge from the night, and they ascend to the Southern Palace.

*Dá luò dà fàn,*
*yǐyǒu.*
*Sàn yān qìng yún.*
*bǐngxū chén wén.*

These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Literary Eminence Heaven.
*Dá* is the name of a jade gate in heaven.
*Luò* describes the palace gates as grand and resplendent.
*Dà* refers to the initial kalpic revolution of the Heavenly Worthy of Great Pardon, when a general amnesty is declared, called the Great Pardon, emptying the three evil destinies and halting the trials of the nine nether courts.
*Fàn* is the Brahma *qi*, which can inaugurate the Dragon Han kalpa.
*Sàn yān* refers to perfected persons burning incense in the jade gates.
*Qìng yún* is the five colors complete. The auspicious clouds reach the Purple Mansion, and flying immortals dance in the wheel of space.

*Fēi sǎ yù dū,*
*dīnghài.*
*Míng mó shàng mén.*
*wùzǐ sì wén.*

These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Demon Pacification Heaven.
*Fēi* is the name of the flying heavenly divine persons. When the governance of heaven and earth sinks into the *Yánkāng* kalpa, all is dark and unopened, and the flying immortals initiate the light. Thus, they scatter radiance, and the various heavens receive the *qi*.
*Sǎ* refers to the swift return of the Dragon Han kalpic cycle.
*Yù* is the taboo name of the Jade Perfected Thearch of the Demon Pacification Heaven, who presides over the deliverance of those in dark difficulties.
*Dū* is the Fengdu of the nine nether realms. Those with meritorious deeds will have the Jade Perfected open the gates of the long night, and Fengdu deliver them from the eight difficulties.
*Míng* means to understand the meaning of these eight characters.
*Mó* is the demon king.
*Shàng* is the Supreme Thearch.
*Mén* is the gate below. Those who understand the meaning of these eight characters will have the demon king submit in reverence, the Supreme Thearch nurture them at the gate of the spirit of initial life, and the gatekeeper Han Jun administer the records and calculations of the Southern Palace, bestowing blessings upon the nine clans and granting grace to the living and the dead.

chunks.original_text: 无行上首，己丑。 回跖流玄。 午文。 此八字，越衡天内音也。 无者，上道也。 言元始之炁，开明无上之道。 行者，天元之纲纪，维罗八极，梵炁弥布，流行不息也。 上首者，北斗之罪宫也。 回者，转也。 跖者，履也。 劫运之初，元始则履空而轮转，布化十方。 流者，流晨之光，照长夜之府。 玄者，空也。 越衡天上玄都之景，有空峰之山，万圣之所游，生死之所归。 道未备足，身应灭度，魂升空峰，受炼而更生也。 阿陀龙罗， 四象吁员。 庚寅中指上文。 此八字，蒙翳天内音也。 阿者，天中有九折之山，连阿栢属。 陀者，山上之楼，上通玉清之炁。 帝君常乘三素之云，上游阿丘之岭，下监万生之罪。 龙者龙山，与阿陀相去九亿万里。 罗者，日月之名。 《玉纬》曰上清九天真人，呼日为濯曜罗。 言山势相交，日月明於峰山。 四者，四极之宫，东华、南极、西灵、北真也。 四极真人主生死命籍。 象者，象轮之车。 真人常乘象辇，游行三界，校人生死罪录，开度学道之人。 吁者，吁育天帝之讳，为南宫度命君，主炼度朽骸。 员者，日中生童，主灌津於天人。 人能诵此洞章，则玉名入帝簿，生死度南宫，四极给自然之羽车，七祖欢於福堂也。 诵毕，叩齿九通，即临目存九灵妙炁，青玉之光，从东方无极玄虚中来。 良久，微诵玉晨君祝。 东方八天无量音玉晨君祝曰： 森廓连华阙，神尊帝一真。 灵虚交日月，玄觉照冥津。 玉关回运数，梵炁启都明。 麾旛扬洞唱，天君秉化轮。 金华领仙箓，郁带龙山宫。 宝秀焕珍景，宴戏高上墉。 霏烟散妙霭，陶精养我形。 飞天观劫会，赞咏元始文。 太极建青钥，晨辉布发生。 爽耀应穹观，熙怡存玉婴。 皇育旋景舆，升度七祖魂。 弥范流飞纲，周维天地根。 祥霞翳霄仞，紫馆真人君。 轩奕青玄府，灭试摧邪凶。 道应混高元，神结泥丸精。 灵丘三素云，罗耀交琳峰。 七九齐至用，三五合同功。 并协冲和德，变炼超仙宗。 祝毕，存前九灵妙炁，青云九重，覆匝身形。 九色玄龙导从左右密咒曰： 赤明开图，八炁回真。 总统元关，青帝大神。 流化九外，缠绵我身。 灵音八书，六十四篇。 洞明天地，与我合仙。 运政龙驾，上升帝辕。 咒毕，引前九灵妙炁九咽。 混合五脏如瑠璃映照之色。 行之九年，致青芽九炁之精，身生光明，彻见虚无。 万遍道成，即得飞行，七祖同福，皆升南官。 南方三炁丹天自然玉字 南爓洞浮，辛卯。 玉眸谈说。 壬辰巳文。 此八字，和阳天内音也。 南爓者，南方有流火之庭，飞焰焕乎八方。 洞浮者，洞阳宫炁炎而浮流也。 玉眸者，流火之膏炼身体则生玉光，明如眸子，故曰玉眸。 诸学人始得道者，皆诣流火之庭，南极真人以火膏洗炼荡除尘垢，得与真人为侣。 诜诜然，众多。
chunks.translated_text:
The Supreme Head of Non-Action, Jichou.
Turning Tread and Flowing Mystery.
Wuwen.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Yueheng Heaven.

*Wú* is the Supreme Dao. It speaks of the primordial qi of the Origin Beginning, unfolding the luminous Dao of the utmost supremacy.
*Xíng* is the celestial net of the Origin Beginning, weaving the eight directions, with Brahman qi pervading and flowing ceaselessly.
*Shàngshǒu* is the Sin Palace of the Northern Dipper.
*Huí* means to turn.
*Zhí* means to tread. At the dawn of the kalpic revolution, the Origin Beginning treads the void and wheels in rotation, spreading transformation across the ten directions.
*Liú* is the flowing light of dawn, illuminating the long-night abyss.
*Xuán* is emptiness. Above the Yueheng Heaven lies the Xuan Capital’s radiance, where the Hollow Peak Mountain stands—a realm where myriad sages wander and the living and dead return. When the Dao is not yet fully perfected and the body is due for extinction, the soul ascends the Hollow Peak to undergo refinement and be reborn.

Ātuó Lóngluó, Four Symbols and Xuyuan.
Gengyin, the Middle Finger points to the Upper Text.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Mengyi Heaven.

*Ā* refers to the nine-fold mountain at the center of heaven, linked by ridges and cypress groves.
*Tuó* is the tower upon the mountain, ascending to the qi of the Jade Purity.
The Thearch often rides the Three Simplicities’ clouds, roaming the peaks of Ā Hill above and overseeing the sins of all beings below.
*Lóng* is Dragon Mountain, separated from Ātuó by ninety million miles.
*Luó* are the names of the sun and moon. The *Jade Weft* states that the Perfected of the Nine Heavens of Upper Purity call the sun "Zhuoyao Luo." It speaks of mountains interlocking, where the sun and moon shine upon the peaks.
*Sì* are the Four Poles Palaces: Eastern Florescence, Southern Culmen, Western Numinosity, and Northern Perfection. The Perfected of the Four Poles govern the registers of life and death.
*Xiàng* is the Elephant Wheel chariot. The Perfected often ride these carriages, traversing the Three Realms to audit the records of life, death, and sins, and to deliver those who cultivate the Dao.
*Xū* is the taboo name of the Xuyu Heavenly Thearch, who serves as the Lord of Life-Deliverance in the Southern Palace, refining and delivering decayed remains.
*Yuán* is the Youth Born in the Sun, who pours celestial nectar upon the heavenly beings. Those who recite this cavernous scripture will have their jade names inscribed in the Thearch’s ledger, their life and death delivered through the Southern Palace. The Four Poles will bestow upon them natural feathered chariots, and their seven ancestors will rejoice in the Hall of Blessings.

Upon completion of recitation, knock the teeth nine times and visualize the ninefold numinous qi, the azure-jade radiance, arriving from the Eastern Limitless Mystery. After a long while, softly recite the prayer of the Jade Dawn Lord.

The prayer of the Jade Dawn Lord of the Eight Heavens of the Eastern Limitless Sound:
Vast and boundless, linked to the Flowery Gates,
Divine and honored, the True One of the Thearch’s Unity.
Spiritual emptiness intermingles with sun and moon,
Mysterious awakening illumines the dark ford.
The Jade Pass revolves the reckoning of fate,
Brahman qi unfolds the capital’s brilliance.
Banners wave, resounding the cavernous chant,
Heavenly Lords grasp the wheel of transformation.
Golden Florescence receives the immortal register,
Lushly girded at the Dragon Mountain Palace.
Treasure and splendor gleam with wondrous radiance,
Feasting and play in the lofty upper walls.
Misty vapors scatter in subtle mists,
Refining essence to nurture my form.
Soaring heavens observe the kalpic assembly,
Praising and chanting the texts of the Origin Beginning.
The Supreme Ultimate establishes the Azure Key,
Dawn’s radiance spreads forth generation.
Bright and luminous, responding to the vaulted heavens,
Joyful and serene, abiding in the Jade Infant.
The August Nurturer revolves the chariot of light,
Ascending and delivering the souls of the seven ancestors.
The vast model flows through the flying net,
Encompassing the roots of heaven and earth.
Auspicious clouds veil the towering skies,
Purple Palaces of the Perfected Lords.
Resplendent in the Azure Mystery’s precincts,
Eradicating trials and crushing evil and malice.
The Dao responds to the primordial vastness,
Spirit congeals in the Niwan’s essence.
The Spirit Mound’s Three Simplicities’ clouds,
Interweaving radiance upon the Jasper Peaks.
Seven and nine unite in function,
Three and five merge in shared merit.
Together harmonizing the virtue of equilibrium,
Transforming and refining to transcend the immortal lineage.

After the prayer, visualize the ninefold numinous qi of the preceding, nine layers of azure clouds enveloping the body. Nine-hued mysterious dragons attend left and right, and the secret incantation says:
Vermilion brightness unfolds the chart,
Eight qi return to the True.
Governing the Origin Pass,
Azure Thearch, great spirit.
Flowing transformation beyond the nine,
Entwining my body.
Numinous sounds of eight scriptures,
Sixty-four chapters.
Penetrating heaven and earth,
Uniting with me as immortal.
Wielding the dragon chariot’s governance,
Ascending to the Thearch’s yoke.

After the incantation, guide the preceding ninefold numinous qi and swallow it nine times. Blend and harmonize the five viscera until they gleam like lapis lazuli. Practicing this for nine years, one attains the essence of the nine azure sprouts, the body emanating luminosity, penetratingly perceiving the void. After ten thousand recitations, the Dao is perfected, and one gains the ability to fly. The seven ancestors share in the blessing, all ascending to the Southern Palace.

The Three Qi of the Southern Cinnabar Heaven’s Natural Jade Script:
Nányán Dòngfú, Xinmao.
Jade Eyes Discourse.
Rénchén Sìwén.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Heyang Heaven.

*Nányán* refers to the Southern Flowing Fire Court, its flying flames blazing across the eight directions.
*Dòngfú* describes the qi of the Cavernous Yang Palace, blazing and floating.
*Jade Eyes* means that refining the body with the flowing fire’s essence generates jade radiance, bright as pupils—hence, Jade Eyes. All who first attain the Dao journey to the Flowing Fire Court, where the Southern Culmen Perfected washes and refines them with fire-essence, scouring away dust and grime, allowing them to become companions of the Perfected. Thus, flourishing and abundant.

chunks.original_text: 梵形落空，癸巳。 九灵推前。 甲午辰文。 此八字，恭华天内音也。 梵形者，元始天尊在龙汉时号也，至赤明世号无名君，上皇开运，号元始丈人。 梵炁化形，随劫化生，以一神而见，不受胎生，故曰梵形。 落空者，元始自空中而生也。 九灵者，九华真人也。 理於南上宫中，主九幽之下宿对死魂。 推前者，九华真人主命录，推算死魂前生功德。 有善功者，四斗真人书延生之符，而授与之，则得拔度九幽也。 泽菩台，乙未。 绿罗大千。 丙申中指上文。 此八字，宗飘天内音也。 泽者，天中山窟也。 其山上有众龙之窟，山有黄房之室，一名玉容之堂也。 者，玉晨道君之内名也。 理於黄房之内，混大劫而不终，经龙汉而更明，故幽中而悦焉。 菩者，飞天真人之隐号，有无数之众。 台者，玉台也。 处於泽山之阳。 绿罗者，月中夫人，字罗英，容色如玉，着绿帔青衣，故曰绿罗。 上乘大罗之天梵行之炁，运度之关，以应天地之数，终於大劫。 既受交於日月，则会於玉台之上也。
chunks.translated_text:
The Dharma-Form Descends from Emptiness, *Guǐsì*.
The Nine Numinous Ones Advance, *Jiǎwǔ Chénwén*.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Reverent Splendor Heaven.

*Dharma-Form* refers to the title of the Primordial Heavenly Worthy during the Dragon Han era. By the Red Clarity epoch, he was called the Nameless Lord; when the Highest Sovereign inaugurated the kalpa, he was known as the Primordial Venerable. The Dharma-qi transforms his form, manifesting through kalpas with a single spirit, unborn of womb—hence, *Dharma-Form*. *Descends from Emptiness* means the Primordial One arises from the void.

*The Nine Numinous Ones* are the Nine Radiant Perfected. They govern within the Southern Highest Palace, presiding over the nocturnal destinies of the dead in the Nine Glooms. *Advance* signifies that the Nine Radiant Perfected, keepers of the Register of Lives, calculate the past-life virtues of the dead. Those with meritorious deeds receive the talismans of life-extension from the Four Dipper Perfected, who bestow them to deliver the dead from the Nine Glooms.

The Marsh of Jade Brilliance, *Yǐwèi*.
The Verdant Net of the Great Thousand, *Bǐngshēn Zhōngzhǐ Shàngwén*.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the Ancestral Whirlwind Heaven.

*The Marsh* is the cavernous hollow within the Mountain of Heaven. Atop this mountain lies the grotto of the myriad dragons, containing the Yellow Chamber—also called the Jade Countenance Hall. *Brilliance* is the esoteric name of the Jade Dawn Dao Lord, who governs within the Yellow Chamber, enduring the great kalpa without end and shining anew through the Dragon Han, thus delighting in the profound.

*The Perfected* is the hidden title of the Flying Heavenly Perfected, of whom there are countless. *The Terrace* is the Jade Terrace, situated on the southern face of the Marsh Mountain. *The Verdant Net* refers to the Lady of the Moon, whose name is Luo Ying. Her countenance is like jade, and she wears a green mantle and azure robes—hence, *Verdant Net*. She ascends the Great Net Heaven, embodying the qi of the Dharma-conduct, presiding over the gateway of kalpic transformation in accord with the reckonings of Heaven and Earth, culminating at the great kalpa. Having received the conjunction of sun and moon, she convenes upon the Jade Terrace.

chunks.original_text: 大千者，世界之数。 陆先生云：以千数至千，即千千，为小千； 小千数至千为中千，中千数至千为大千。 千中之大，故曰大千。 人能诵咏洞章，则得驾羽轮之车，升黄房之室，游玉台之上，览大千之境也。 眇莽九丑，丁酉。 韶谣缘邅。 戊戌午文 此八字，皇笳天内音也。 眇者，天书玉字，沦於延康之中，翳而不彰，眇眇然也。 莽者，龙汉开运，其文复明，莽莽然也。 遇其道，男女并皆寿三万六千岁，其运之极，又经一劫，九炁各生一兽，以害恶民。 其劫既开，而九兽号为九丑之鬼。 北帝上真主生死图箓，故立九丑以辅三官，数极九九八十一万度，天炁之交，九丑当得辅，号为九都使者。 韶者，皇笳天神霄王之内名。 神霄王是魔王之神，主常试学道之人正与不正。 魔王作谣歌以乱人心，心固者，王即保举，径升皇笳天中。 缘邅者，南北二斗君之内讳也。 人有善功，列言於南斗，南斗即度三界之难，技九幽之苦，告下魔王，不敢败害也。 人行恶则三官列罪於北斗，北斗即告下魔王灭魂，付九幽之下，充长夜之役。 皇笳天上有金华之山，学成得道，皆诣金华山，受太一之信，以制灭魔试。 然后得乘景轮之车，游宴八方。 九炁者，按《三天正法经》：始炁生三炁，一曰赤洞，二曰白章，三曰青浩。 元炁生三炁，一曰绿炳，二日黄景，三曰苍混。 又曰：白遁玄炁生三炁，一曰紫融，二曰碧炎，三曰黑演。 ．谓之九炁也。 云上九都，己亥。 飞生自骞。 庚子未文。 此八字，堂曜天内音也。 云上，飞天神王之讳。 开龙汉之劫，启赤明之运，数自然之书，立天地之根也。 九都者，三象既分，而有九层之台，处乎玉京之山，焕乎空玄之上，飞天神人常散百合之香，流五云之华，以观飞天真人。 台上有太真玉郎，一日三回十绝之旛，则诸天上帝三朝玄台，诵咏洞章也。 飞生，南上更生之神名也。 学士能诵洞章，诸天称庆，飞生为开不死之路，流长生之炁。 下炼五魂，则八景存焉。 自，从也。 骞者，骞林也心既共举人上升九层玄台，道於骞林之下，身佩天书，口诵洞章，即得上朝玄都之宫也。 那育郁馥，辛丑。 摩罗法轮。
chunks.translated_text:
The *Great Thousand* denotes the reckoning of worlds. Master Lu states: counting a thousand to a thousand yields a *Lesser Thousand*; counting a thousand Lesser Thousands yields a *Middle Thousand*; counting a thousand Middle Thousands yields a *Great Thousand*. Thus, it is called the *Great Thousand*. Those who recite and chant the Cavernous Chapters may ride the feathered-wheel chariot, ascend the chamber of the Yellow Chamber, wander above the Jade Terrace, and behold the realm of the Great Thousand.

*Miao-mang of the Nine Uglies*, *Ding-you*. *Shao-yao Yuan-zhan*. *Wu-xu Wu-wen*.
These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the *August Reed-Pipe Heaven*. *Miao* refers to the jade script of the celestial writ, submerged within the *Yan-kang* era, obscured and unmanifest—dim and distant. *Mang* signifies the opening of the *Dragon Han* kalpa, wherein its script shines anew—vast and boundless. Should one encounter its Way, both men and women shall live for thirty-six thousand years. At the culmination of this kalpa, it endures another kalpic cycle, and the nine *qi* each give rise to a beast to harm the wicked. Once the kalpa unfolds, these nine beasts are called the *Nine Ugly Ghosts*. The *Northern Thearch’s Supreme Perfected* presides over the *Register of Life and Death*, thus establishing the *Nine Uglies* to assist the *Three Officials*. When the reckoning reaches eighty-one myriad degrees, at the convergence of celestial *qi*, the *Nine Uglies* are to be aided, and they are titled the *Envoys of the Nine Capitals*.

*Shao* is the hidden name of the *Celestial Reed-Pipe Heavenly Deity*, the *Cloud Sovereign*. The *Cloud Sovereign* is the spirit of the *Demon King*, who constantly tests whether the cultivators of the Dao are upright or not. The *Demon King* composes ballads to disturb the human heart; those whose hearts remain steadfast are protected and recommended by the king, ascending directly into the *August Reed-Pipe Heaven*. *Yuan-zhan* is the hidden name of the *Northern and Southern Dipper Lords*. When one’s meritorious deeds are recorded by the *Southern Dipper*, the *Southern Dipper* delivers them from the trials of the *Three Realms* and the sufferings of the *Nine Darks*, notifying the *Demon King* below, who dares not harm them. If one commits evil, the *Three Officials* record their sins before the *Northern Dipper*, and the *Northern Dipper* commands the *Demon King* to annihilate their souls, consigning them to the depths of the *Nine Darks* to serve in the eternal night’s labor.

The *August Reed-Pipe Heaven* contains the *Mountain of Golden Splendor*. Those who cultivate and attain the Dao all journey to this mountain to receive the *Taiyi’s* trust, thereby controlling and vanquishing demonic trials. Only then may they ride the *radiance-wheel chariot* and roam the eight directions in revelry.

The *Nine Qi* are expounded in the *Scripture of the Orthodox Dao of the Three Heavens*: the *Primordial Qi* generates three *qi*—the first is *Crimson Cavern*, the second is *White Luminance*, and the third is *Azure Vastness*. The *Original Qi* generates three *qi*—the first is *Verdant Flame*, the second is *Yellow Radiance*, and the third is *Dark Chaos*. It is further said: the *Mysterious Qi of White Concealment* generates three *qi*—the first is *Purple Fusion*, the second is *Jade Blaze*, and the third is *Black Flow*. These are called the *Nine Qi*.

*Cloud Above the Nine Capitals*, *Ji-hai*. *Flying Life from Self-Exaltation*. *Geng-zi Wei-wen*.
These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the *Hall Radiance Heaven*. *Cloud Above* is the hidden name of the *Flying Heavenly Deity-King*. It inaugurates the *Dragon Han* kalpa, initiates the *Vermilion Brightness* kalpic cycle, enumerates the script of natural reckoning, and establishes the roots of Heaven and Earth. The *Nine Capitals* refer to the nine-tiered terrace that emerges once the *Three Images* divide, situated upon the *Jade Capital Mountain*, resplendent above the *Empty Mystery*. The *Flying Heavenly Perfected* constantly scatter the fragrance of *hundred-fold harmony* and disperse the blossoms of the *five clouds* to observe the *Flying Heavenly Perfected*. Upon the terrace stands the *Supreme Perfected Jade Youth*, who thrice daily waves the *Ten Absolute Banners*, whereupon the *Celestial Thearchs of the Myriad Heavens* thrice pay homage to the *Mysterious Terrace*, reciting and chanting the *Cavernous Chapters*.

*Flying Life* is the name of the *Divine Spirit of Southern Renewal*. When scholars recite the *Cavernous Chapters*, the myriad heavens rejoice, and *Flying Life* opens the path of immortality, streaming the *qi* of eternal life. Refining the *Five Hun* below, the *Eight Radiant Ones* are preserved within. *Self* means *from*. *Exaltation* refers to the *Forest of Exaltation*. Once the heart is united in lifting one to ascend the *Nine-Tiered Mysterious Terrace*, dwelling beneath the *Forest of Exaltation*, girded with the *Celestial Writ* and reciting the *Cavernous Chapters* with the mouth, one may ascend to pay homage at the *Palace of the Mysterious Capital*.

*Na-yu Yu-fu*, *Xin-chou*. *Mara’s Dharma-Wheel*.

chunks.original_text: 壬寅申文。 此八字，端靖天内音也。 那者，天王侍郎之内名也。 主天四时之炁，梵行虚无之纲，以正端靖天中分度也。 育者，天关空轮之名，郁馥斗中灵童之名，常运育轮於太无之中，回十转以召真天关。 十转则十方大圣上朝玉帝，万神齐到，而郁馥唱礼焉。 ，摩罗者，天中大魔之内讳。 郁馥一唱，魔王束形。 学者知四时之炁，十转之关，则入法轮之门，乘八景之舆，升唱玉清之中，上朝紫微之台也。 霐持无镜，癸卯。 揽姿运容。 甲辰百文。 此八字，恭庆天内音也。 霐者，天中都监神之内名也。 持者，龙渊之名。 众龙蟠乎其中，御金婴而运东井之华以灌天真。 华者，日中黄华之精沃注东井之流津，无穷之源也。 无镜者，飞天神王讳也。 游乎大罗之上，出无色之光，度学道之人。 揽姿者，三界之门名。 人之此号神王则开长夜之府，技九幽之魂，以度三界之门也。 运容者，玄和玉女之右。 人得度三，界之门，运容则以朱灵之炁，导之于形，太和之津，灌之于神，上升福德之堂，保劫运之无穷矣。 馥朗廓奕，己巳。 神缨自宫。 丙午四指上文。 此八字，极瑶天内音也。 馥朗者，天中玉京玄台之别号。 西灵真人常诵洞章，以游其上。 廓奕，天中神公之内名，与元始同生，为玄炁之范，教学仙之人。 神缨，紫微宫灵童也。 主灭度之尸。 若得神缕歌无量之章，则反形於三炼之房，受自然之炁，欢无穷之龄也。 人能明八字之音，则神公为开长冥之户，升更生之门，上登玉京之台。 诵毕，叩齿三通，即临目存三灵妙炁、赤辉之光，从南方无极玄虚中来，良久，微诵玉晨君祝。 南方八天无量音玉晨君祝曰： 和阳焕明奕，炎晖玉炼颜。 虚梵隐玄邈，空朗昭神功。 九华破幽录，四极延生津。 黄房晨景居，绵绵保长存。 窈窕腾月妃，万界超劫轮。 混洞翳玉书，龙汉明耀晶。 神文摄六天，察制妖魔群。 邪试莫我干，列名标上清。 超度五苦难，逍遥玄仞峰。 飞神开大运，明观九云重。 南上炼我魂，旋盖游骞林。 泛霭缠虚纲，十转回天关。 大魔咸来宾，八景朝紫微。 龙渊注东井，黄华养我真。 大罗无色光，寂度无穷人。 朱灵协至炁，太和升福堂。 玄台映郁萧，诵洞遵西灵。 神公布玄范，反婴齐自然。 祝毕，存前三灵妙炁绛云三重，覆匝身形。 朱雀凤凰翱翔前后密咒曰： 三炁徘徊，灵凤来飞。 玉音八字，烂焕紫微。 吉日大庆，我道洞开。 朱丹哺饴，仰吸灵辉。 身生水火，绛帔羽衣。 登空飞步，足践凤梯。 周旋八天，七祖相随。 咒毕，引前三灵妙炁三咽，混合五脏如日辉映照之色。 行之三年，致朱丹三炁之精，反白改容，万劫不倾。 七祖超升，上生福堂，反胎仙家，即得更生。 西方七炁素天自然玉字 刀利禅猷，丁未。 婆泥咎通。 戊申申文。 此八字，孔升天内音也。 刀利者，南方无极世界之号。 禅是刀利之国，亦日禅黎。 其国有洞阳宫流火庭，灵文始於流火受炼，莹饰光明之后，刀利之国改为福德之堂。 苦魂得度入洞阳之宫。 猷者，南上好生君之名。 婆泥则火炼池之灵童也。 咎通是刀利世界魔神也。 常遏人生路，若人知好生君名得度洞阳之宫，及诣火池受炼，即更生福德之国，则魔神奉焉。 人能诵八字之音，则刀利世界无极灵官侍卫其身，径诣南宫，仙人司迎，上升三炁之天也。

"Ren-yin Shen-wen. These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *Upright and Serene Heaven*. *Na* is the inner name of the *Celestial King’s Attending Gentleman*, who governs the *qi* of the four seasons in heaven and the guiding principle of the *void and formless* in *Brahma-conduct*, thereby rectifying the divisions within the *Upright and Serene Heaven*. *Yu* is the name of the *Celestial Gate’s Hollow Wheel*; *Yu-fu* is the name of the *Spirit Child within the Dipper*, who constantly revolves the *Yu-Wheel* within the *Great Void*, turning ten cycles to summon the true *Celestial Gate*. With ten cycles, the *Great Saints of the Ten Directions* ascend to pay homage to the *Jade Emperor*, and the myriad spirits all arrive, while *Yu-fu* intones the rites. *Mo-la* is the inner taboo of the *Great Demon within Heaven*. At the first intonation of *Yu-fu*, the *Demon King* binds his form. Scholars who comprehend the *qi* of the four seasons and the *ten cycles* of the *Celestial Gate* may enter the *Dharma-Wheel’s* portal, ride the *Eight Radiant Ones’* chariot, ascend to chant within the *Jade Clarity*, and pay homage at the *Purple Tenuity’s* terrace.

*Hong-chi Wu-jing*, *Gui-mao*. *Lan-zi Yun-rong*. *Jia-chen Bai-wen*. These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *Reverent and Joyous Heaven*. *Hong* is the inner name of the *Heavenly Capital’s Supervising Spirit*. *Chi* is the name of the *Dragon Abyss*, wherein the multitude of dragons coil, steering the *Golden Infant* to convey the *eastern well’s* efflorescence and irrigate the *Celestial Perfected*. *Hua* refers to the essence of the *yellow efflorescence within the sun*, which pours into the flowing streams of the *eastern well*, the inexhaustible source. *Wu-jing* is the taboo of the *Flying Heavenly Spirit King*, who roams above the *Great Veil*, emitting *formless light* to deliver those who cultivate the Dao. *Lan-zi* is the name of the *Three Realms’* gate. If one’s spirit-king bears this title, it opens the *Long Night’s* repository, retrieves the *Nine Dark’s* souls, and delivers them through the *Three Realms’* gate. *Yun-rong* is the right attendant of the *Mysterious Harmony Jade Maiden*. Once one is delivered through the *Three Realms’* gate, *Yun-rong* guides them with the *Vermilion Spirit’s qi*, infusing their form, and with the *Grand Harmony’s* essence, irrigating their spirit, ascending to the *Hall of Blessing and Virtue*, and preserving the *kalpa’s* endless continuity.

*Fu-lang Kuo-yi*, *Ji-si*. *Shen-ying Zi-gong*. *Bing-wu Si-zhi Shang-wen*. These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *Ultimate Jade Heaven*. *Fu-lang* is the alternate name of the *Jade Capital’s Mysterious Terrace* in heaven, where the *Western Numinous Perfected* constantly recites the *Cavernous Chapters* to wander above it. *Kuo-yi* is the inner name of the *Heavenly Divine Duke*, born together with the *Primal Beginning* and serving as the model of *Mysterious Qi*, teaching those who cultivate immortality. *Shen-ying* is the *Spirit Tassel*, a *Spirit Child of the Purple Tenuity Palace*, who governs the *extinction of the corpse*. If one obtains the *Spirit Thread* and chants the *Boundless Chapters*, one may return their form to the *Three Refinements’* chamber, receive the *spontaneous qi*, and rejoice in endless longevity. Those who comprehend the sounds of these eight characters will have the *Divine Duke* open the *Long Darkness’* door and ascend the *Gate of Renewed Life*, mounting the *Jade Capital’s* terrace.

Upon completion of the recitation, knock the teeth three times, then close the eyes and visualize the *Three Numinous Wondrous Qi* and the *crimson radiance* emerging from the *Southern Direction’s Boundless Mysterious Void*. After a long while, softly recite the *Jade Dawn Lord’s* incantation:

The *Jade Dawn Lord’s* incantation of the *Southern Eight Heavens’ Boundless Sound* states:
*Harmonious Yang shines brilliantly,*
*Flaming splendor jade-refines the visage.*
*Void Brahma conceals the distant and mysterious,*
*Empty clarity reveals divine merit.*
*The Nine Effulgences shatter the dark records,*
*The Four Poles extend the stream of life.*
*The Yellow Chamber abides in the dawn’s light,*
*Endlessly preserving long existence.*
*Profoundly soaring, the Moon Consort,*
*Transcending the kalpas of the ten thousand realms.*
*The Chaotic Abyss veils the Jade Writ,*
*Dragon Han illumines with crystalline brilliance.*
*The divine script commands the Six Heavens,*
*Scrutinizing and restraining demonic hordes.*
*Evil trials dare not approach me,*
*My name is inscribed in the Highest Clarity.*
*Surpassing the Five Sufferings’ tribulations,*
*Carefree upon the Mysterious Summit’s peak.*
*Flying spirit unfolds the great destiny,*
*Clearly beholding the ninefold clouds’ layers.*
*Refining my soul in the Southern Ascension,*
*Revolving the canopy to wander the Forest of Exaltation.*
*Floating mists entwine the void’s guiding threads,*
*Ten cycles turn the Celestial Gate.*
*The Great Demon all comes as guest,*
*The Eight Radiant Ones pay homage to the Purple Tenuity.*
*The Dragon Abyss pours into the Eastern Well,*
*The Yellow Efflorescence nourishes my true self.*
*The Great Veil’s formless light,*
*Silently delivers the boundless multitude.*
*The Vermilion Spirit harmonizes the supreme qi,*
*The Grand Harmony ascends the Hall of Blessing.*
*The Mysterious Terrace reflects the fragrant and secluded,*
*Reciting the Cavernous Chapters, following the Western Numinous.*
*The Divine Duke spreads the Mysterious Model,*
*Returning the infant to the spontaneous equality.*

Upon completing the incantation, visualize the threefold *crimson clouds* of the *Three Numinous Wondrous Qi* enveloping the body. The *Vermilion Bird* and *Phoenix* soar before and behind, and silently recite the secret incantation:
*Three Qi meander,*
*The numinous phoenix comes flying.*
*The eight-character Jade Sound,*
*Resplendent in the Purple Tenuity.*
*Auspicious day, great celebration,*
*My Dao’s Cavernous Gate opens.*
*Vermilion cinnabar, sweet nectar,*
*Gazing upward to absorb the numinous radiance.*
*Body born of water and fire,*
*Crimson mantle, feathered robe.*
*Ascending the void, flying steps,*
*Feet treading the phoenix ladder.*
*Circulating through the Eight Heavens,*
*Seven ancestors follow in tow.*

After reciting the incantation, draw in the *Three Numinous Wondrous Qi* three times and swallow them, blending them with the *Five Viscera* like the radiance of the sun. Practicing this for three years will produce the essence of the *Three Vermilion Qi*, reverse whiteness to transform the visage, and endure for ten thousand kalpas without decline. The *Seven Ancestors* ascend and are reborn in the *Hall of Blessing*, returning to the *Immortal Household* and attaining *renewed life*.

*The Seven Qi of the Western White Heaven’s Spontaneous Jade Characters:*
*Dao-li Chan-you*, *Ding-wei*. *Po-ni Jiu-tong*. *Wu-shen Shen-wen*. These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *Kong-sheng Heaven*. *Dao-li* is the name of the *Southern Boundless World*. *Chan* is the kingdom within *Dao-li*, also called *Chan-li*. This kingdom contains the *Cavernous Yang Palace’s Flowing Fire Court*, where the *Numinous Writ* begins in the *Flowing Fire’s* refinement. After adorning and illuminating with brilliance, the kingdom of *Dao-li* transforms into the *Hall of Blessing and Virtue*. Suffering souls are delivered to enter the *Cavernous Yang Palace*. *You* is the name of the *Southern Lord of Cherishing Life*. *Po-ni* is the *Spirit Child of the Fire-Refining Pool*. *Jiu-tong* is the *Demon God of the Dao-li World*, who constantly obstructs the path of human life. If one knows the name of the *Lord of Cherishing Life* and is delivered to the *Cavernous Yang Palace*, proceeding to the *Fire Pool* for refinement, one is reborn in the *Land of Blessing and Virtue*, and the *Demon God* submits. Those who recite the sounds of these eight characters will have the *Boundless Numinous Officials of the Dao-li World* guard their bodies, proceeding directly to the *Southern Palace*, where *Immortals* receive and welcome them, ascending to the *Heaven of Three Qi*.

The Hall of Supreme Subtlety, Geng-Xu Wei-Wen.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *August Cliff Heaven*.
*Wan-sou* is the inner name of the *August Cliff Heavenly Emperor*, who presides over the revelation of the *Scripture of the Great Vastness* to illuminate the text of these eight characters. When the Dao is made manifest, it shines resplendent above the *Great Net*, vast and limpidly pure.
*Di-se* is the name of a *Flying Heavenly Perfected* in the *Realm of Form*, who rides a chariot of luminous clouds drawn by nine-colored dragons, roaming above the *Realm of Form* and entering the *Jade Purity* at will. He sweeps away impure *qi* and delivers those of good roots.
*The Hall of Supreme Subtlety* is the *Hall of Transformative Birth*, where the transformation of the *Vast Cavern* weaves the patterns of spontaneity. Vast and boundless, it opens the passage for the deliverance of the myriad beings. When practitioners master the sounds of these eight characters, the *Flying Heavenly Perfected* descends in his chariot of luminous clouds to bear them upward into the *Hall of Transformative Birth*.

Liu-Luo Fan-Meng, Xin-Hai.
Jing-Wei Xiao-Yu, Ren-Zi Si-Zhi Shang-Wen.
These eight characters are the inner sounds of the *Ultimate Wind Heaven*.
*Liu* is the taboo name of the *Ultimate Wind Heavenly Emperor*, who dwells above the *Purple Empyrean* and roams the *Jade Capital Mountain*.
*Luo* is the taboo name of the *Moon Maiden*, who presides over the rites of royal excursions and feasts. Her radiance flows through the *Ultimate Wind Heaven*, penetrating and illuminating the true essence of the *Nine Profound*.
*Fan* is the name of a *Flying Heavenly Perfected* who governs the revolving gates of the *Nine Heavens*.
*Meng* is the *Primordial Beginning Heavenly Spirit*, the root of the *Ultimate Wind*.
*Jing* is *Jing Huang*, a *Perfected* of the *Four Poles*.
*Wei* is *Wei Xiu*, an *Immortal of the Luminous Empyrean*. Together, they administer the *Jade Capital Terrace*, reviewing and delivering the souls of good roots in the midst of the *Long Night*.
*Xiao* is *Xiao Ren*, the palace of the *White Primordial Lady*.
*Yu* is the *Exhaustion of Xiao Ren*, the place of receiving guests.
Those who constantly recite the *Cavern Scripture* shall ride the nine-colored clouds of the empyrean and ascend to the *Terrace of Jing Huang*.

Yi-Miao Wu-Ji, Gui—
Wan-Shou Shao-Du, Jia-Yin You-Wen."

chunks.original_text: 此八字，孝芒天内音也。 易邈者，始皇孝芒天中天王之讳。 无者，虚无。 寂者，寂寂是虚无寂寂之庭也。 言此天王从龙汉而来，至赤明而出，居乎虚无之内，处乎寂寂之庭也。 宛首，太上道君之内号，驾八景玉舆，策三素飞云，开元始玄奥，演大法以度人。 少都者，日中灵童名也。 散日精以灌真流，飞华以拂尘学人。 知八字之音，则天王飞景云之舆降三素之軿，度身三界之上，进入寂寂之庭也。 阿滥郁竺，乙卯 华漠延由。 丙辰戌文 此八字，翁重天内音也。 阿滥者，翁重天帝讳也。 乘景霄之轮，进九层之台，处玉楼之上，唱洞章以伏魔王。 郁者，郁默天中魔王隐名也。 竺者，欲也。 是魔王都伯恒在欲界之上，诵空谣之歌。 华者，言色界光华也。 汉者，砍界沙汉不可寻也。 延者，束鬼之庭。 由者，禁鬼之防。 天王咏无量之章，则天魔应响而束首，群鬼请由而伏形。 奉之者九祖开泰，修之者灰骸更生也。 九开自辩，丁巳 阿那品首。 戊午亥文 此八字，江由天内音也。 九开者，大演之初，天地未判，轮转三炁，开为九分。 九度既明，九位乃列，阴阳万品於是而生。 自然，明辩也。 阿者阿丘，江由天帝讳也。 乘九色之龙，驾三素之軿，上登龙山之岭，游观九玄之中。 那者那邪，飞天神人之隐名也。 飞行三界，历校长夜之中，拔度善人之魂。 有知八字之音，则天王品度兆身，入飞天之众首，化枯骨成童子之颜矣。 无量扶盖，己未 浮罗合神。 庚申子文 此八字，阮乐天内音也。 无量者，天中无量大圣之始神也。 总统飞天神人，受其品量而得升迁。 扶者，更生真人之内名，校长夜之录简，善恶之根。 盖者，玄中福堂之号也。 浮者，幽夜之魂，受真人开度，谓之浮也。 乘运而归，上升福堂也。 罗者，大罗也。 开大千世界，召更生之宾，诣大罗之天，削死三官。 合者，合庆也。 神者，神公也。 是大罗丞相。 人能知八字之音，与神公合庆，受度为更生之宾，故曰合神。 玉诞长桑，辛酉 栢空度仙。 壬戎四指中文 此八字，昙誓天内音也。 玉诞者，昙誓天玉都名也。 长桑者，天中骞林，亦名桑林，覆荫东华之宫。 叶上有大洞之章，紫书玉字，焕乎上清。 下有扶桑之树，上森骞林之丛，碧鸡鸣其盖，青霞翠其峰，神风流反香之草，鼓桑林百籁之音，神风一鼓，洞章成音，故曰栢空也。 度仙者，飞天神人也。 常以鸡鸣之始，登玉台之上，来取五方云芽，仰咽三辰之光，简学仙之人生死录籍，开度九幽之魂，升入法轮之门也。 诵毕，叩齿七通，即临目存七灵妙炁白华之辉，从西方无极玄虚中来，良久，微诵玉晨君祝。 西方八天无量音玉晨君咒曰： 洞阳映霄阙，受度好生君。 灵童火炼攻，福馆涉生津。 太漠明道彰，真人翔景云。 高清布元化，荡秽除妖氛。 接我琅碧舆，升入微妙门。 扬辉浩极家，洞耀九玄真。 造化回幽关，杳眇回灵根。 景皇连郁秀，检校超仙魂。 萧仞白元子，同担列帝宾。 始皇天中王，寂寂虚无庭。 玉晨张大范，流庆涤我尘。 穹楼演洞唱，收魔束鬼形。 三元分化祖，九度悉宣陈。 阿丘驰素軿，那邪契所缘。 弥罗大圣神，更生升福筵。 逸化乘运归，削死永合欢。 琼府巍峨境，森扶霭华骞。 云芽揖三晖，享此亿遐年。

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of Xiaomang Heaven.
*Yi-Miao* is the taboo name of the Heavenly King of Xiaomang Heaven within the Central Heaven.
*Wu* is the Void.
*Ji* is the Silent—this is the courtyard of the Void and the Silent.
This Heavenly King has come since the *Dragon Han* era and emerged in the *Red Brightness*, dwelling within the Void and abiding in the Silent Courtyard.

*Wan-Shou* is the inner title of the *Supreme Dao Lord*, who rides the *Eight Radiance Jade Chariot*, urges the *Three Pure Flying Clouds*, unfolds the *Primordial Mysteries of the Origin*, and expounds the Great Dharma to deliver beings.
*Shao-Du* is the name of the *Spirit Child of the Sun’s Essence*.
He scatters solar essence to irrigate the true currents and scatters flying blossoms to brush the dust from learners.
Those who know the sound of these eight characters shall have the Heavenly King descend in the *Flying Radiance Cloud Chariot* and the *Three Pure Carriage*, deliver their bodies above the *Three Realms*, and enter the *Silent Courtyard*.

*A-Lan Yu-Zhu*, *Yi-Mao*.
*Hua-Mo Yan-You*, *Bing-Chen Xu-Wen*.

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of Wengchong Heaven.
*A-Lan* is the taboo name of the Emperor of Wengchong Heaven.
He rides the *Radiant Empyrean Wheel*, ascends the *Nine-Tiered Terrace*, abides in the *Jade Tower*, and chants the *Cavern Scripture* to subdue demon kings.
*Yu* is the hidden name of the demon king in *Yu-Mo Heaven*.
*Zhu* is desire.
This demon king, *Du-Bo-Heng*, ever dwells above the *Realm of Desire*, chanting songs of emptiness.
*Hua* refers to the radiant splendor of the *Realm of Form*.
*Mo* is the *Sahā World’s* boundless sands, beyond seeking.
*Yan* is the courtyard that binds ghosts.
*You* is the barrier that restrains ghosts.
When the Heavenly King intones the *Chapter of Immeasurable*, the heavenly demons respond by binding their heads, and the multitude of ghosts beg for passage and submit their forms.
Those who revere this shall have their nine ancestors prosper; those who cultivate it shall have their ashen bones reborn.

*Jiu-Kai Zi-Bian*, *Ding-Si*.
*A-Na Pin-Shou*, *Wu-Wu Hai-Wen*.

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of Jiangyou Heaven.
*Jiu-Kai* refers to the great unfolding at the beginning, when Heaven and Earth were yet undivided, the revolving *Three Qi* opened into nine parts.
Once the *Nine Degrees* were illuminated, the *Nine Positions* were arrayed, and the myriad beings of yin and yang were born therefrom.
*Zi-Bian* is the natural discernment.
*A* is *A-Qiu*, the taboo name of the Emperor of Jiangyou Heaven.
He rides the *Nine-Colored Dragon*, drives the *Three Pure Carriage*, ascends the peaks of *Dragon Mountain*, and roams within the *Nine Mysteries*.
*Na* is *Na-Xie*, the hidden name of the *Flying Heavenly Perfected*.
They traverse the *Three Realms*, reviewing and delivering the souls of the good within the *Long Night*.
Those who know the sound of these eight characters shall have the Heavenly King rank and deliver their destined bodies, entering the foremost ranks of the *Flying Heavenly Host*, transforming withered bones into the countenance of youths.

*Wu-Liang Fu-Gai*, *Ji-Wei*.
*Fu-Luo He-Shen*, *Geng-Shen Zi-Wen*.

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of Ruanle Heaven.
*Wu-Liang* is the primordial spirit of the *Immeasurable Great Sage* within Heaven.
He governs the *Flying Heavenly Perfected*, bestowing ranks and promotions according to their merits.
*Fu* is the inner name of the *Reborn Perfected*, who reviews the records of the *Long Night* and the roots of good and evil.
*Gai* is the title of the *Fortune Hall within the Mysterious*.
*Fu* refers to the souls of the *Dark Night*, delivered by the Perfected—hence "floating."
They ride the turning destiny to return and ascend to the *Fortune Hall*.
*Luo* is the *Great Luo*.
It opens the *Great Thousandfold World*, summons the guests of rebirth, and escorts them to the *Great Luo Heaven*, erasing death from the *Three Offices*.
*He* is *He-Qing* (Joined Celebration).
*Shen* is the *Divine Duke*, the prime minister of the *Great Luo*.
Those who know the sound of these eight characters shall join in celebration with the *Divine Duke*, receive deliverance as guests of rebirth—hence "joined spirits."

*Yu-Dan Chang-Sang*, *Xin-You*.
*Bo-Kong Du-Xian*, *Ren-Xu Si-Zhi Zhong-Wen*.

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of Tanshi Heaven.
*Yu-Dan* is the name of the *Jade Capital* of Tanshi Heaven.
*Chang-Sang* is the *Heavenly Qian Forest*, also called *Sang-Lin* (Mulberry Grove), which shades the *Eastern Florescence Palace*.
Upon its leaves are the *Great Cavern Scripture*, purple characters on jade, resplendent in the *Upper Clarity*.
Below stands the *Fu-Sang Tree*, above towers the *Qian-Lin Grove*, where the *Azure Phoenix* sings beneath its canopy, and the *Blue Radiance* adorns its peaks.
Divine winds stir the *Returning Fragrance Herbs*, and the *Sang-Lin* resounds with a hundred pipes—when the divine wind blows once, the *Cavern Scripture* becomes sound, hence *Bo-Kong* (Cypress Void).
*Du-Xian* are the *Flying Heavenly Perfected*.
At the first crow of the rooster, they ascend the *Jade Terrace*, gather the *Five Directions’ Cloud Buds*, and swallow the light of the *Three Luminaries*.
They review the life-and-death registers of those who study immortality, deliver the souls of the *Nine Darks*, and ascend into the *Dharma Wheel’s Gate*.

Upon completion, knock the teeth seven times, then close the eyes and visualize the radiance of the *Sevenfold Wondrous Qi* and the *White Blossoms*, arriving from the *Western Limitless Mysterious Void*.
After a long while, softly recite the incantation of the *Jade Dawn Lord*:

The incantation of the *Jade Dawn Lord* of the *Eight Heavens of the West’s Immeasurable Sound* reads:

*"Cavern Yang illumines the Empyrean Gates,
Receiving the delivered, the Lord of Good Life.
Spirit Child refines with fire’s tempering,
Fortune’s Hall traverses the springs of life.
The Great Desert clarifies the Dao’s manifestation,
Perfected Ones soar on radiant clouds.
High Clarity spreads the primordial transformation,
Sweeping filth and dispelling demonic mists.
Lift me in the Jade Azure Chariot,
Ascend into the Gate of Subtle Wonder.
Radiance soars in the House of Vast Extremes,
Illuminating the Nine Mysteries’ Perfected.
Creation turns the Dark Pass,
Faint and distant, the spiritual root returns.
Radiant Emperor joins Yu-Xiu,
Reviewing and transcending immortal souls.
Xiao-Ren, the White Primordial Child,
Together they bear the ranks of imperial guests.
The Central King of the Beginning Heaven,
Silent, in the Void’s Courtyard.
Jade Dawn unfolds the great expanse,
Flowing blessings to cleanse my dust.
The Vaulted Tower intones the Cavern Chant,
Subduing demons and binding ghostly forms.
The Three Origins divide the ancestral transformations,
The Nine Degrees are all proclaimed.
A-Qiu drives the Pure Carriage,
Na-Xie fulfills its destined affinity.
The Great Sage of Mi-Luo,
Reborn, ascends the Fortune Feast.
Free transformation rides destiny’s return,
Erasing death, forever joined in joy.
The Jade Palace’s towering realm,
Forested with flourishing, misty mulberry.
Cloud buds bow to the Three Luminaries,
Partaking of these boundless eons."*

chunks.original_text: 祝毕，存前七灵妙炁，白云七重，映覆身形。 白虎狮子导引左右密咒曰： 七炁金灵，八天尊神。 白虎策辇，狮子捧辕。 七炁缠绵，炼我成仙。 身发金光，映照素云。 内外变化，升入洞门。 七祖出夜，九幽放魂。 三徒五苦，长斩恶根。 同欢福会，受庆自然。 亿劫开度，随运长存。 咒毕，引前七灵妙炁七咽，混合五脏如月晶映照之色。 行之七年，致太素七炁之精，停年留世，万劫童颜，庆及七祖，升度南宫，反胎更生，世世生仙。 北方五炁玄天自然玉字 玃无自育，癸亥。 九日导乾。 亥文 此八字，霄度天内音也。 玃无，是龙汉时飞天之神也。 元始始开之炁，溟涬无色之中，玃无乘运而出，凝然而立； 霄度既立，自抗不终之劫。 育者，霄度天王之内名。 九者，育王乘象轮之车，游九玄之门，转九机之度，应劫会之期。 日者，天中日童。 导者，导引和炁。 天运之终，日童停光拔度学者，灌以水母之精，导以太和之炁，洗炼五神，进入朱宫，故曰导乾。 坤母东覆， 形摄上玄。 甲子戌文 此八字，元洞天内音也。 坤母者，太阴之都侯，九灵之母也。 理东海扶桑旸谷之渊，常总地机，转轮元炁，上应天关。 天关转、地轴动，周天一度，水则涌三千三百度。 天地炁交，九海冥，一水则弥天。 东者，东海受会，制期河源也。 履者，水神也。 理於昆仑之山，填固巨海，遏断东井，则地机不沦，保劫长存。 形摄者，灾交之时，坤母形出东河之上，摄召鸟母，以凤车迎学仙之人，上昆仑之墟。 鸟母乃水之候神也。 上者，坤母上诣帝君，申劫会之期，度学仙之人，言名於玄都之宫也。 陀罗育邈，乙丑 眇炁合云。 丙寅四指中文 此八字，妙成天内音也。 陀者，天帝之内名，与妙成俱生在云阿之岭。 罗是月始生之名。 陀在云岭之上，抱月而明。 育者，妙成天神王，名育生，总统十方飞天之神。 邈者，天中羽林监神，名神王。 常使匡御三界，简人生死之籍，令魔王保度得道之人。 眇者，眇眇高远也。 人得保度，诣羽林受符而升天，眇眇行於云宫也。 炁者，云炁也。 合者，合景也。 既入羽林，结云炁以成衣，飞升朱宫，受福天堂，遂与诸天合景而上飞也。 飞天大丑，丁卯 总监上天。 戊辰子文 此八字，禁上天内音也。 飞天者，飞天神王也。 天上有飞玄之炁，结成空洞之经，十方神王在空霄之上，诵此经以和自然之炁，接引学道之人。 大者，三界之都录，主生死图箓。 丑者，伯也。 是三界之魔王，受事於大丑。 学士识其音，则魔王保真身腾三清也。 总是飞天都统之官，常摄八会之炁，以促天地之运，监领长夜之官，开度九幽之魂，学士知天中之音，则天魔列言，大丑勒籍仙部而上升天中也。 沙陀劫量，己巳 龙汉瑛鲜。 庚午丑文 此八字，常融天内音也。 沙者，天中有沙兰之宫，是紫微之别馆，处乎玉清之上，焕乎紫虚之中。 陀者，陀丘也。 陀丘之众，有巨万人皆是新得道受度者也。 功德未备，停散其中。 劫量者，每至劫运一交，陀丘之众计功之量，得升朱陵之宫，受福而仙也。 龙汉者，初劫之名，是时大道淳朴，徒有其化，难可为杂也。 瑛者，龙汉时飞天神客也。 常开度九幽之魂，升兰宫之中。 鲜者，南宫之童，学人得度，而鲜童炼其形容於朱陵之上。
chunks.translated_text:
Upon concluding the invocation, visualize the sevenfold wondrous qi of the Seven Spirits, layered in seven tiers of white clouds, suffusing and veiling your form.

The White Tiger and Lion guide with secret incantations to left and right, chanting:
*"Sevenfold qi of Golden Spirit,
Eightfold Heavenly Honored Deities.
White Tiger spurs the chariot,
Lion upholds its shafts.
Sevenfold qi entwines,
Refining me into immortality.
Body radiates golden light,
Shining upon the pristine clouds.
Inner and outer transform,
Ascending through the Cavern Gate.
Seven Ancestors escape the night,
Nine Dark Realms release their souls.
Three Disciples and Five Sufferings,
Sever forever the roots of evil.
Together rejoice in the feast of fortune,
Receiving blessings by nature’s grace.
For kalpas unbound, liberation dawns,
Abiding eternally with destiny’s flow."*

After the incantation, draw in the sevenfold wondrous qi of the Seven Spirits seven times, merging it with the five viscera until they gleam like moonlight’s crystal hue. Practicing this for seven years, one attains the essence of the Sevenfold Qi of Great Simplicity, halting the years to remain in the world, preserving youth for ten thousand kalpas. Blessings extend to the seven ancestors, who ascend to the Southern Palace, reborn through the womb to be immortal in every life.

**Northern Quintessence: The Mysterious Heaven’s Spontaneous Jade Glyphs**
*Ju-Wu Zi-Yu, Gui-Hai. Nine Days Guide Qian. Hai-Wen.*

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the Xiaodu Heaven.
*Ju-Wu* was a flying immortal of the Dragon Han era. From the primordial qi of the Original Beginning—amidst the formless, boundless darkness—*Ju-Wu* emerged, borne by destiny, coalescing into being. Once the Xiaodu Heaven was established, it endured through endless kalpas. *Yu* is the inner name of the Xiaodu Heavenly King. *Nine* signifies the Heavenly King riding the elephant-wheel chariot, traversing the Nine Mysteries’ gates, turning the Nine Mechanisms’ degrees, aligning with the kalpa’s appointed time. *Day* refers to the Solar Youth at heaven’s center. *Guide* means to lead and harmonize qi. At the world’s end, the Solar Youth halts its light to deliver practitioners, anointing them with the Water Mother’s essence, guiding them with the Great Harmony’s qi, refining the five spirits, and ushering them into the Vermilion Palace—hence, *Guide Qian*.

**Earth Mother Eastward Veils,**
*Form Gathers the Supreme Mystery.*
*Jia-Zi Xu-Wen*

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the Yuan Dong Heaven.
The *Earth Mother* is the sovereign of the Great Yin’s domain, mother of the Nine Spirits. She governs the Eastern Sea’s Fusang Yang Valley’s abyss, ever mastering earth’s mechanisms, turning the wheel of primordial qi, responding to the Heavenly Gate above. When the Heavenly Gate turns and the Earth’s axis moves, the heavens complete one revolution, and the waters surge three thousand three hundred times. As heaven and earth’s qi intertwine, the Nine Seas darken, and a single water inundates the sky. *East* signifies the Eastern Sea’s convergence, regulating the river’s source. *Tread* refers to the water spirit. Dwelling upon Kunlun Mountain, she stabilizes the vast sea, damming the Eastern Well to prevent the earth’s mechanisms from sinking, preserving the kalpa’s longevity. *Form Gathers* describes the moment of calamity’s convergence, when the Earth Mother’s form emerges above the Eastern River, summoning the Bird Mother to welcome the aspiring immortal with a phoenix chariot, ascending to Kunlun’s ruins. The *Bird Mother* is the water’s sentinel spirit. *Above* signifies the Earth Mother’s ascent to the Imperial Lord, reporting the kalpa’s appointed time, delivering the aspiring immortal, and inscribing their name in the Mystic Capital’s palace.

---

**Tuo-Luo Yu-Miao, Yi-Chou. Slight Qi Harmonizes Clouds.**
*Bing-Yin Si-Zhi Zhong-Wen*

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the Miaocheng Heaven.
*Tuo* is the inner name of the Heavenly Emperor, born alongside Miaocheng upon the Cloud Ridge. *Luo* is the name of the moon at its first crescent. *Tuo* dwells upon the Cloud Ridge, cradling the moon to shine. *Yu* is the Heavenly King of Miaocheng, named *Yusheng*, governing the ten directions’ flying immortals. *Miao* is the Heavenly Feathered Forest’s supervising spirit, named *Divine King*. He constantly oversees the Three Realms, reviewing the ledgers of life and death, commanding demon kings to safeguard those who attain the Dao. *Slight* signifies the vast and distant. When one attains deliverance, they ascend to the Feathered Forest to receive talismans, journeying through the cloud palaces in boundless flight. *Qi* refers to cloud qi. *Harmonizes* means to merge with the radiance. Having entered the Feathered Forest, they weave cloud qi into robes, soaring to the Vermilion Palace to receive the Heavenly Court’s blessings, then ascending with all heavens, merging with the light.

---

**Flying Immortal Great Chou, Ding-Mao. Oversees the Upper Heavens.**
*Wu-Chen Zi-Wen*

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the Jin Shang Heaven.
The *Flying Immortal* is the Flying Immortal Divine King. In heaven, the flying mystery’s qi coalesces into the *Hollow Scripture*, recited by the ten directions’ divine kings upon the empty firmament to harmonize with nature’s qi, guiding those who cultivate the Dao. *Great* is the registrar of the Three Realms, governing the charts of life and death. *Chou* is the elder, the demon king of the Three Realms, serving under *Great Chou*. When practitioners recognize this sound, demon kings protect their true forms, ascending the Three Clarities. *Oversees* is the office of the Flying Immortals’ commander, ever gathering the eight assemblies’ qi to hasten heaven and earth’s revolutions, supervising the eternal night’s officials, liberating the Nine Dark Realms’ souls. When practitioners know the celestial sounds, heavenly demons submit, *Great Chou* commands the immortal ranks, and they ascend to heaven’s center.

---

**Sha-Tuo Kalpa-Measure, Ji-Si. Dragon Han’s Radiant Freshness.**
*Geng-Wu Chou-Wen*

These eight characters are the celestial sounds of the Changrong Heaven.
*Sha* refers to the *Shalan Palace* in heaven, a detached hall of the Purple Tenuity, nestled above the Jade Clarity, resplendent within the Purple Void. *Tuo* is *Tuoqiu*, where multitudes—tens of thousands of newly delivered immortals—reside. Their merits incomplete, they linger there. *Kalpa-Measure* signifies that at each kalpa’s turning, the multitudes of *Tuoqiu* are assessed by their merits’ measure, ascending to the Vermilion Mound Palace to receive blessings and immortality. *Dragon Han* is the name of the first kalpa, when the Great Dao was pure and simple, its transformations effortless, difficult to corrupt. *Ying* was a flying immortal guest of the Dragon Han era, constantly liberating the Nine Dark Realms’ souls to ascend within the Lan Palace. *Fresh* refers to the Southern Palace’s youth. When practitioners attain deliverance, the *Fresh Youth* refines their appearance upon the Vermilion Mound.

chunks.original_text: 碧落浮黎，辛未 空歌保珍。 壬申寅文 此八字，玉隆天内音也。 玉隆天中常生碧霞之炁。 落者，飞天神王名也。 乘碧霞之辇，游玉隆之天，一日三时，引天中众圣上朝七宝之宫。 浮黎者，天王内名也。 众圣上朝而天王称庆也。 空者，天中侍晨之名。 歌者，洞章之曲，侍晨一啸，灵风既奏，音成洞章，故曰空歌。 保珍者，学人知八字之音，则升上南宫，为飞天之宾，保此不终之劫，珍其自然之文，故曰保珍。 恶奕无品，癸酉 洞妙自真。 甲戌卯文 此八字，梵度天内音也。 恶奕者，天王之内名。 昔於龙汉之中，诸缘并尽而过度三界之庭，升入太虚之馆，受九仙之箓，登大圣之号。 赤明开运，元始锡为梵度天王。 无者，太无真人也。 受天王之符，度长夜之魂，品量幽魂之罪福，洞明宿对也。 宿对既解，乃入妙化之堂。 自者，与也。 真者，天真也。 太无真人度九幽之魂，洞识宿命恶缘，并尽度入妙化之堂，与飞天而合真也。 元梵恢漠，乙亥 幽寂度人。 丙子玉清文 此八字，贾奕天内音也。 元梵者，元始大梵风泽之炁，抗举澄漠之精，高而洞浮，悬而不落也。 恢漠者，远而无碍，有而若无，微而不可名，妙而不可寻也。 幽兮寂兮，不可见闻，其中有真，其中有精，冥度天人也。 诵毕，叩齿五通，即临目存五灵妙炁紫晶之霞，从北方无极玄虚中来。 良久，微诵玉晨君祝。 北方八天元量音玉晨君祝曰： 开化无上神，霄度凝玄炁。 阳华真一精，太和育妙慧。 九灵镇西昆，机化停枢会。 凤车升羽轮，越此大劫津。 云阿拥圆皓，育生天神君。 受符羽林宫，蔼秀灵霞襟。 空霄飞玄章，接举身超腾。 天统摄八耀，开济九幽魂。 兰宫连紫微，按格升朱陵。 南宫有妙童，琅辉炼我形。 苍霞浮绿辇，称庆拱高尊。 灵风泛洞响，可宝无穷龄。 九仙颁运箓，释散宿业根。 流纲抗虚梵，廓达归无名。 大混百骸纪，徊烟合紫云。 庆垂七叶孙，祸塞三徒源。 解滞离尘纲，齐辔逍遥宾。 倏忽登龙台，稽首玉帝前。 祝毕，存前五灵妙炁，玄云五重，覆布身形。 飞龟羽盖苍郁前后密咒曰： 玄天徘徊，流景上清。 大有启运，八字开明。 飞玄澄空，洞阴自生。 五炁缠绵，灌我身形。 冠带北单，受炼洞灵。 肾府仙化，内外光精。 飞行三界，游宴紫庭。 七祖同庆，欢乐劫龄。 七宝林中，反胎更生。 长夜出离，南宫记名。 黄箓白简，世世生仙。 咒毕，引前五灵妙炁，五咽，混合五脏，如紫晶映照之色。 行之五年，致灵芝五炁之精，还年留景，保命三清，庆及七祖，世世生仙。 元始无量度人上品经法卷之四 元始无量度人上品经法卷之五
chunks.translated_text:
Within the Azure Vault floats *Fuli*,
*"Xinwei, Kongge, Baozhen."*
*"Renshen, Yinwen"*—these eight characters are the celestial sounds of Jade Clarity Heaven.
In Jade Clarity Heaven, azure mists of *qi* ever arise.
*Luo* is the name of a Flying Heavenly Divine King.
Riding a chariot of azure mist, he roams Jade Clarity Heaven,
thrice daily leading the host of celestial sages to ascend and attend court at the Seven Treasures Palace.
*Fuli* is the inner name of the Heavenly King.
As the host of sages attends court, the Heavenly King proclaims jubilation.
*Kong* is the name of the celestial attendant of dawn.
*Ge* refers to the cavernous hymns—when the attendant of dawn utters a cry,
a numinous wind arises, and the sound forms the cavernous hymns, hence *"Kongge."*
*Baozhen* signifies that when practitioners comprehend the sound of these eight characters,
they ascend to the Southern Palace, becoming guests of the Flying Heavenly Ones,
preserving themselves through this unending kalpa,
cherishing the natural scripture, hence *"Baozhen."*

*"Wuyi, Wupin,"*
*"Guiyou, Dongmiao, Zizhen."*
*"Jiaxu, Maowen"*—these eight characters are the celestial sounds of Brahma-Passage Heaven.
*Wuyi* is the inner name of the Heavenly King.
Long ago, during the Dragon Han kalpa,
when all karmic conditions were exhausted, he transcended the Three Realms’ courts,
ascending into the Great Void’s halls to receive the register of the Nine Immortals
and assume the title of Great Sage.
When the Red Clarity kalpa dawned, the Primordial Beginning bestowed upon him the kingship of Brahma-Passage Heaven.
*Wu* is the Supreme Nonbeing Perfected.
Receiving the Heavenly King’s talisman, he delivers the souls of the Long Night,
assessing the sins and blessings of the darkly imprisoned spirits, penetrating their past karmic bonds.
Once past karmic bonds are dissolved, they enter the Hall of Wondrous Transformation.
*Zi* means "to join."
*Zhen* is celestial truth.
The Supreme Nonbeing Perfected delivers the souls of the Nine Dark Realms,
thoroughly discerning their past evil karma, exhausting all to enter the Hall of Wondrous Transformation,
joining the Flying Heavenly Ones in union with truth.

*"Yuanfan, Huimo,"*
*"Yihai, Youji, Duren."*
*"Bingzi, Yuqingwen"*—these eight characters are the celestial sounds of *Jiayi* Heaven.
*Yuanfan* is the *qi* of the Primordial Beginning’s Great Brahma, vast and nurturing,
upholding the essence of limpid vastness, lofty and pervading the void, suspended yet never falling.
*Huimo* signifies boundless and unimpeded, existent yet as if nonexistent,
subtle beyond naming, wondrous beyond seeking.
Dark and silent, unseen and unheard,
within it lies truth, within it lies essence—mysteriously delivering heavenly beings.
Upon recitation, knock the teeth five times,
then with eyes closed, visualize the five numinous *qi* of purple crystal mist
arriving from the North’s Boundless Dark Void.
After a long while, softly recite the prayer of the Jade Dawn Lord.
The prayer of the Jade Dawn Lord of the Eight Heavens’ Primordial Measure in the North reads:

*"Divine One who transforms the unsurpassed,
Celestial passage congeals the mysterious *qi*.
The true essence of Yang’s radiance,
Great Harmony nurtures wondrous wisdom.
The Nine Numinous Ones guard the Western Kunlun,
Mechanisms of transformation halt at the pivotal assembly.
Phoenix chariots ascend feathered wheels,
Crossing this kalpa’s ford.
Cloudy banks embrace the round and luminous,
Nurturing the life of heavenly divine lords.
Receiving talismans in the Feathered Forest Palace,
Their verdant splendor girds the numinous mist’s lapel.
Through empty skies fly the mysterious scriptures,
Lifting the body to transcend and soar.
Heavenly governance gathers the Eight Radiances,
Opening and aiding the Nine Dark Realms’ souls.
The Orchid Palace connects to the Purple Tenuity,
Following the pattern to ascend the Vermilion Mound.
In the Southern Palace dwells the wondrous youth,
With jade-like radiance refining my form.
Azure mists float the green chariot,
Proclaiming jubilation and revering the exalted.
A numinous wind ripples through cavernous echoes,
To be treasured for boundless ages.
The Nine Immortals bestow the kalpa’s register,
Dissolving the roots of past karma.
The net’s principles uphold the void’s Brahma,
Expansively returning to namelessness.
The Great Chaos records the hundred bones,
Revolving mists merge with purple clouds.
Blessings extend to seven generations of descendants,
Misfortunes seal the three paths’ sources.
Unbinding entanglements from the dust’s net,
Side by side, guests of carefree wandering.
In an instant, ascending the Dragon Terrace,
Bowing before the Jade Emperor."*

Upon concluding the prayer, visualize the five numinous *qi* of the earlier purple mist,
five layers of dark clouds covering and enveloping the body.
The flying tortoise and feathered canopy, lush and verdant, recite the secret incantation before and after:

*"Dark heavens meander,
Flowing light ascends the Upper Clarity.
The Great Possession initiates the kalpa’s turning,
Eight characters reveal illumination.
Flying mystery stills the void,
The cavernous yin spontaneously arises.
Five *qi* entwine,
Irrigating my form.
Crowned and girded in the Northern Luminaries,
Receiving refinement from the cavernous numen.
The kidney palace transforms into immortality,
Inner and outer radiance gleams.
Flying through the Three Realms,
Roaming and feasting in the Purple Court.
Seven ancestors rejoice together,
Delighting in the kalpa’s ages.
Within the Seven Treasures Grove,
Rebirth returns the womb.
Emerging from the Long Night,
Names recorded in the Southern Palace.
Yellow registers and white tablets,
Generation upon generation born as immortals."*

Upon concluding the incantation, guide the five numinous *qi* forward, swallowing them five times,
merging them with the five viscera, like the hue of purple crystal illuminating all.
Practicing this for five years,
one attains the essence of the five *qi* of numinous mushrooms,
restoring youth and retaining radiance,
preserving life in the Three Clarities,
bestowing blessings upon seven generations of ancestors,
and ensuring immortality for all future generations.

chunks.original_text: 无玄章 道言：此诸天中大梵隐语无量之音，旧文字皆广长一丈。 天真皇人昔书其文，以为正音。 李少微注：《真一五牙经》曰：皇人者，不知其得道之始也。 身长九尺，玄毛被体，皆长尺余。 黄帝时在峨眉山绝阴之下，以苍玉为屋，黄金为座，张华罗之幡，然千和之香。 侍者仙童玉女，座宾三人，皆称太清仙王。 黄帝再拜问道，授以五牙三一之文云。 玄应章 有知其音，能斋而诵之者，诸天皆遣飞天神王下观其身，书其功勤，上奏诸天。 万神朝礼，地祇侍门，大勋魔王，保举上仙。 御注：有大功德则上帝魔王高真信用，保举此人於太上仙王之前。 道备克得游行三界，升入金门。 玄师曰：知中篇之音，斋而诵者，获乎八品福报。 此音无所不辟、无所不禳、无所不度、无所不成。 天真自然之音也。 故诵之致飞天下观，上帝遥唱，万神朝礼，三界侍轩，群妖束首，鬼精自亡，琳琅振响，酉文。 十方肃清，河海静默，山岳吞烟，万灵振伏，招集群仙。 天 无氛秽，地无妖尘，冥慧洞清，大量玄玄也。 亥文。 玄师曰：中篇之音，有辟禳度成四种无量威神之力。 诵之者，获十六品祥应。 已上正文，大梵隐语后序。 成玄英注：此明诸天内音冥通慧照之力。 冥者，幽深不测； 慧者，通照无穷。 慧能照空，故云冥慧。 高而不极谓之洞，焕耀三清之上谓之洞清。 洞者，空也。 清者，净也。 无边无际，谓之大量。 大量之内，唯有真空，真中有精，其中有信，能生真圣，非有非无，常住湛然，微妙莫测。 究竟其理，不可寻详。 玄中更玄，故云大量玄玄也。 大梵隐语正音 东方八天 广生高应，觉元洞虚。 应元九真，化交肇图。 文灵运构，宗范元都。 感变总括，威招自成。 绿岑迁景，皇道含明。 天林耀权，炁精育魂。 融罗负立，圆英隐昱。 期巨神色，洪纲告宁。 南方八天 章炎通泛，坚敷澄宗。 虚象玄华，龙阳舞穹。 微正霄艳，渊太凝冲。 玄关三纽，大梵飞空。 隐觉隆益，天伦庆呈。 神户缠络，真元散精。 净握明照，徊合升迁。 导骞宴云，灵应腾天。 西方八天 刚泽徽控，阴唆孤仪。 贯炁冥素，宸洞开微。 周化幽应，澄辉帝台。 平遐挹虚，恢茂童池。 结飙临育，丽无散开。 阳通百六，沈芒隐阶。 幽廓冥默，真峰会灵。 坚丕顺道，告命骞林。 北方八天 龙安洞变，纯阳隐玄。 方本还炁，象伏高员。 神变惠允，解炼灵根。 赤精纯道。 成号威尊。 利云友常，亿仞中丘。 郁成琼垒。 谣音庆流。 受位玉室，大宪通幽。 玄章焕落，纲轮乃周。 中央 幽玄还门，荷萨作生。 招非化久，法禺诅冀。 农顷赤阜，由旬一润。 云合浮沱，中曲普明。 贵虚四光，功笃留胃。 华觉填宥，祭为昭达。 光天图晶，贡冷宽从。 郁充沙昙。 吝敷肃令。 蕖澄太冥，绛咢四迷。 北走亿游。 呙骨愚罗龙。 各赍以散，洛采於都。 审此玄赖，完可六魔。 龙章凤炁大梵之文 皆诸天隐讳隐名，见中篇注。 观觉郁褴，寅文。 大明紫灵，寅文。 九神度魂，卯文。 开辟玉真，辰文。 阿奕炜烨，巳文。 飞天流音，寅文。 轮景帝常，卯文。 都灵四指中文。 颐臻，中指中文。 豁落，中指中文。 大宥，中指中文。 庆云启灵，寅至中指中文。 七曜辉魔，恬懀敷荣，离文。 虚 无上首，已文。

**The Chapter of the Profound and Obscure**

The Dao speaks: These are the great Brahma’s esoteric incantations and boundless sounds of the various heavens, their ancient script extending a full *zhang* in length. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign once transcribed their text to establish the correct intonation.

Li Shaowei’s annotation: *The Scripture of the True One’s Five Teeth* states: The Sovereign’s origins in attaining the Dao remain unknown. His body stood nine *chi* tall, covered in dark fur, each strand over a *chi* in length. During the Yellow Emperor’s reign, he dwelled beneath the Absolute Yin of Mount Emei, his abode wrought of azure jade, his seat of gold. Banners of patterned silk fluttered, and thousand-fold incense burned. His attendants—immortal youths and jade maidens—alongside three seated guests, all bore the title of Supreme Clarity’s Immortal Kings. The Yellow Emperor bowed twice to inquire of the Dao, whereupon the Sovereign bestowed upon him the scripture of the Five Teeth and Three Ones.

**The Chapter of the Profound Response**

Those who comprehend these sounds and recite them in purification rites shall have the flying heavenly divine kings of all heavens descend to observe their person, record their merits, and submit them to the heavens. The myriad spirits shall pay homage, earth deities stand guard at their gates, and the great demon kings shall safeguard and recommend them as immortals.

The Imperial Annotation states: One of great merit and virtue shall earn the trust of the Celestial Thearch and the demon kings, who will then recommend them before the Supreme Immortal Kings. With the Dao perfected, they may traverse the Three Realms and ascend through the Gate of Gold.

The Profound Master says: Those who know the sounds of the middle chapter and recite them in purification shall attain the blessings of the eighth rank. These sounds repel all, dispel all, deliver all, and accomplish all—utterances of the heavens’ spontaneous truth. Thus, reciting them summons flying immortals to descend in observation, the Celestial Thearch to chant from afar, the myriad spirits to pay homage, the Three Realms to attend their chariot, demonic hordes to bow their heads, ghostly essences to perish of their own accord, and jade-like tones to resonate. The *You* script declares: The ten directions grow solemn and pure, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, the myriad spirits tremble in submission, and immortals gather in assembly. The heavens are free of defilement, the earth devoid of demonic dust, profound wisdom shines with limpid clarity, and the vastness of the profound remains profoundly profound. The *Hai* script states: The sounds of the middle chapter possess four boundless, majestic, and numinous powers—repelling, dispelling, delivering, and accomplishing. Those who recite them shall receive the sixteenfold auspicious responses.

The above constitutes the main text and postscript of the great Brahma’s esoteric incantations.

Cheng Xuanying’s annotation: This elucidates the power of the inner sounds of the heavens to penetrate and illuminate with obscure wisdom. *Obscure* denotes the unfathomably profound; *wisdom*, the boundlessly illuminating. Wisdom illuminates emptiness, hence the term *obscure wisdom*. *Vast* implies limitless height, while *limpid* signifies radiance above the Three Clarities. *Vast* is emptiness; *limpid* is purity. Without boundary or end, it is called *great vastness*. Within this great vastness dwells true emptiness; within true emptiness lies essence; within essence lies sincerity, which gives rise to true sages. Neither existent nor nonexistent, it abides in serene constancy, subtle beyond measure. To fathom its principle is impossible—profound within the profound, hence *the vastness of the profound remains profoundly profound*.

**The Correct Intonation of the Great Brahma’s Esoteric Incantations**

**The Eight Heavens of the East**
Vast Life’s Lofty Response, Awakening the Origin’s Cavernous Void.
The Nine Perfected of Responsive Origin, Transforming and Intermingling to Inaugurate the Diagram.
The Patterned Spirit’s Constructive Flow, the Ancestral Model of the Primordial Capital.
Comprehending Change in Totality, Majestic Summons Arise Spontaneously.
Verdant Peaks Shift Scenery, the Imperial Dao Embracing Radiance.
Heavenly Forests Gleam with Authority, Qi’s Essence Nurturing the Hun.
Fused Nets Stand Upright, Rounded Splendor Concealed in Brilliance.
The Great Era’s Divine Countenance, the Grand Network Proclaims Tranquility.

**The Eight Heavens of the South**
Flame’s Chapter Spreads Abundantly, Firmly Unfolding the Clarified Ancestry.
The Hollow Image’s Mysterious Flower, the Dragon’s Yang Dancing in the Vault.
Subtle Rectitude’s Rosy Luster, the Profound and Supreme Congealing in Emptiness.
The Mysterious Gate’s Triple Bind, the Great Brahma Soaring through the Void.
Obscure Awareness’s Lofty Benefit, Heavenly Ethics Rejoicing in Manifestation.
The Divine Portal’s Entwined Network, True Origin Dispersing Essence.
Pure Grasping’s Luminous Illumination, Revolving and Converging in Ascent.
Guiding the Soaring Banquet of Clouds, the Numinous Response Ascends to Heaven.

**The Eight Heavens of the West**
Firm Moisture’s Subtle Control, Yin’s Lone Ceremony.
Piercing Qi’s Obscure Simplicity, the Imperial Cavern Unveiling the Subtle.
Encompassing Transformation’s Hidden Response, Clarified Radiance of the Thearch’s Terrace.
Pacifying the Distant to Embrace Emptiness, Expanding the Flourishing Child’s Pool.
Binding Whirlwinds to Oversee Nurturance, Splendor Unscattered and Unfolding.
Yang’s Passage through the Hundred and Six, Submerged Radiance Concealed in the Stair.
The Obscure Expanse’s Silent Stillness, the True Peak’s Assembly of Spirits.
Firm and Majestic in Following the Dao, Proclaiming the Mandate to the Soaring Forest.

**The Eight Heavens of the North**
The Dragon’s Peaceful Cavernous Transformation, Pure Yang Concealed in the Profound.
The Square Root Returning Qi, the Image Subdued in Lofty Perfection.
Divine Transformation’s Benevolent Grant, Refining the Numinous Root.
Crimson Essence’s Pure Dao, Attaining the Title of Majestic Honor.
Beneficial Clouds as Constant Companions, Myriad *Ren* within the Central Mound.
Lushly Forming Jade Ramparts, Melodic Sounds Flowing in Celebration.
Receiving Position in the Jade Chamber, the Great Constitution Penetrating the Obscure.
The Profound Chapter’s Radiant Descent, the Network’s Wheel Completing its Cycle.

**The Central Realm**
The Obscure and Profound Returning Gate, the Lotus-Bearer Giving Birth.
Summoning the Unreal for Eons, the Dharma’s Curse and Prayer.
Farmland’s Crimson Mound, a *Yojana*’s Single Moisture.
Clouds Converging in Floating Torrents, the Central Bend’s Universal Illumination.
The Noble Void’s Fourfold Radiance, Merits Profoundly Retained in the Stomach.
Flowering Awareness Filling the Hollow, Sacrifice Becoming Illustrious Attainment.
The Radiant Heaven’s Crystal Diagram, Tribute’s Cold and Forbearing Compliance.
Lushly Flourishing like the Sandalwood’s Bloom, Parsimony’s Solemn Command.
The Lotus Clarifying the Supreme Obscurity, the Crimson Maw’s Fourfold Delusion.
Northward Journey of Myriad Wanderings, the Spiral-Boned Foolish Dragon.
Each Bearing Offerings to Scatter, Gathering Splendor in the Capital.
Scrutinizing this Profound Reliance, Six Demons May Be Perfected.
The Dragon’s Chapter and Phoenix’s Qi—Text of the Great Brahma—
All are the heavens’ esoteric taboos and hidden names, as annotated in the middle chapter.
